column6: In movements are my favorite workout legging at lulu. They never fall but aren't too tight that they feel like they are suffocating you. They fit true to size.

These hug in all the right places when working out. I don’t need to keep pulling them up at the waist or the legs! These are so comfortable and really feel like I can do anything in them. Love the material as they’re more durable than the naked sensation but still are so light weight and comfy.

These leggings are my favorite style lululemon offers! They are extremely high waisted and hold me in great. I really like them because I change up my workouts a lot between studio, cycling, and training, and in movement leggings can be worn with all of them!
column15: light colored patterns are sometimes see through

column6:
everything I love about lululemon in one pant!
Adore the high rise fit, awesome fabric for weight training and super sweaty cardio sessions, and the perfect length for my height (5'2")!!
these pants have not let me down. they do not snag with my crazy training and they dry fast! I roll out of bed and put these on for my 5am weight lifting/high intensity training sessions.
my only desire is that lulu continues to make these pants in more colors!

column5: Everlux fabric is good. Also - NOT my favorite.
column6: I was tempted to buy In Movement leggings a few times, but ended up returning them. I like the feel of this fabric which reminds me of buttery-soft Nulu. However, these fabrics have less compression compare to Luxtreme or Nulux. I prefer more compression in my workout pants, so I buy my leggings mostly made with these types of fabric. When I say Workout Pants, I don't mean yoga. This is about high intensity activity - with lots of jumps & cardio. I believe the In Movement tight would be great for cycling, yoga and weight-lifting. I do these activities as well, so I kept two pairs In Movement crops (I'm 5'4", 122lbs, size 4 in these). But those are not my favorite, just OK. These 7/8 Tight fits TTS, also roomy, more on a loose side.
These pants were a great fit for yoga. They never rolled down at the waist, and the sweat dried quickly after. I’d love to get more but you are out of my size in the color I’d like.

column5: Love these leggings – don't let other reviews scare you
column6: I tried these on at the store and loved them. It was after I got home that I checked the reviews on the website. I saw so many complaints about them stretching out and attracting lint and hair. I felt super sad and considered returning them. But, I gave them a shot and am so glad I did! I've owned them for several months now and can say 1. They don't stretch out unless you wear them multiple times without washing in between; and 2. These are my least lint-attracting Lulus I own. My cats fur sticks to my Luon Wunder Unders and Aligns WAY more than these. Overall, love them for any activity – sweaty or not. I typically wear them for running and pilates. I plan on getting another pair soon!
I love the In Movement 7/8 tights best of all LuLu tights. They fit great and are very comfortable. The new plum color is great.
The fabric is thicker, and they are running baggy (especially in the ankles) but I can still workout in them.
column14: great seam lines in all the right places

column6: These leggings are unbelievably comfortable. Super soft, super sleek, and definitely a favorite pair of mine!!

Love these pants. I really like that the rise is slightly higher in the back than in the front. I feel like I have full coverage from behind, but the front hits just under my belly button so I don't get the awkward waist rollover when I'm flowing. I'd definitely buy multiple if the other colors were available in my size!

column5: Loved at First - Issues w/ Pilling + Stretching Out
column6: Was super excited to get these after reading reviews. Wore them and loved. After a few wears they started stretching out and I was constantly pulling them up. Two washes later and they're already pilling on the inner seams. Sad because I really thought I'd love these!

I love these pants. They are so comfortable but also have some compression. They are great for an intense workout. They are squat proof and sweat proof. My only complaints would be that I would love if the front panel was wider (more like the align). The other small complaint I have is that the seam on my calf is piling a bit. Would absolutely recommend.

Material is alright, i feel all tights are now see through that i have been buying, they all stretch out after a couple wears. The waist band rolls down when instructing classes or working out. I do like the length of the tight and the softness of the material. They arent quick dry though

We\'re sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 7, 2019'}

column6: These were soft and comfortable and fit perfectly but within 30 minutes of wear, they were all stretched out and wouldn't stay up anymore. I spent the rest of the day constantly pulling them up.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear sk57294,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re so sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 7, 2019'}

column6:
Did I pee my pants? You might think that due to all of the sweat stains that appeared while wearing these pants.
I didn't. But it looked like I did. And this was in the dark olive color. I wore this to a pilates reformer class, not even a high intensity class. I was beyond mortified. I've never experienced this in other LLL olive pants (at least not this crazy level).
On top of this issue the pants just won't stay up. No matter how many times during the hour long class I tugged and pulled (I'm guessing close to 30..) they just roll over.
These are the worst pants I have ever purchased from LLL. I have a closet full that I love, but these, I don't know what happened.
For reference I'm 5-5, 127 lbs, and ordered a size 6. Disappointed as I will never be able to wear these to a class.
column15: sweat stains in a sweat wicking fabric
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey lizski617,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 6, 2019'}

column6: an amazing pair of leggings, fits like a second skin and super duper smooth! I used to love the aligns bc they were soft like these ones, but had to return them bc they were pilling like crazy... the in movements feel the same (dare I say somewhat even better...) and I haven't had a pilling problem so far, so I'm super happy :) the only reason why it's not 5 stars is bc I'm a little scared to wear them to workout-- I try to save them for my yoga classes and more light leisurely outings just in case they end up like my aligns. overall though, I would recommend, esp when they're on wmtm!
column15: logo by the bum lol (i love it on the left leg!)

column6:
I'm a little bummed about these. While the fit and look are fantastic, I was let down by the fact that they REALLY show sweat. I know nothing is perfect, but I did a great deal of research AND visited the store to discuss how I needed something that would breathe and hide sweat. All signs pointed me to this pant.

I lift and do interval training and usually start workouts with a 1-3 mile jog. After 2 miles at the gym, I climbed off the treadmill and walked past the mirror and was a little embarrassed by how easily seen it was. I know we all sweat. But for this reason, I only stick to black workout pants, so when I go for a pant, I try to find a pair that won't show.
Now I have a nice pant that I won't workout in.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey AriBerry1,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" is not performing for your sweaty prsuits. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 6, 2019'}

column6: The material is absolutely wonderful!! I could wear them forever!! But the fit is loose especially as a "hugged" sensation product. I'm not sure what is going on with Lulu as their sizing is all over the place these days. I typically wear a 6 for Hugged but these were just a tad too big. I like wearing them at work all day bc they are super comfortable; I'm in the health and wellness field. But I think I would size down if I wanted to wear them for an intense workout. As a side note, I love the in movement shorts too!
column15: maybe too loose for a workout

column6: Fit like a glove. Very flattering. I’m 5’1 and 117lbs and the size 4 fit perfect. The only thing is they are a tad long, and they are not truly 7/8 on me. They fit over my ankles. Maybe they can make a petite size and be a true 7/8 fit on us short girls!!

These leggings are very comfortable & I love the accent line that crosses behind the calves. These leggings hold everything in and are the perfect length for my height (5’3”). One thing I don’t like is that they slightly bunch behind my knees, but I believe it’s from being short.

I loved these leggings at first for a number of reasons: they seemed soft, supportive and breathable. After very few wears and only a couple of washes they're much less soft and slide down constantly. I don't have this issue with my multiple pairs of align pants/crops or fast and free pants/crops (even without using the cinch in the fast and free). Sadly these sit in the closet, unloved : (
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey secondopinion,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 6, 2019'}

column5: Hate the quality, love the fit... PLEASE repair
column6: I received these leggings for Christmas and instantly fell in love. But after 3 wears there is now a hole in the butt. For almost $100 these leggings should be able to withstand brushes against the corners of tables. LULU please please help me get my leggings fixed. These were my new favs. Now they're ruined AND I have to walk around campus with my butt peaking out for the rest of the day.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear lizlee,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you\'re in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. We\'ll be following up via email to discuss this further. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 5, 2019'}

column6: Love these - perfect middle ground between an align (softer, not as held-in of a feeling) and wunder unders (which feel tighter, more compression-y). The fabric is sooo soft and they are perfect for working out, can't wait to buy in more colors!

As a loyal lulu customer, I was excited when I purchased the in movement 7/8 tights just a couple of weeks ago. After only 2 wears, and 2 washes, some of the seams are fraying and the waist band seems to have stretched out. I am SO disappointed! I only wash all my lulus on the gentle cycle, and hang them to dry. I can't even return them, as they were from the WMTM section online. Do not buy these pants!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Amandatrainer,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We hear where you\'re coming from and I\'m sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" haven\'t held up for you as expected. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 5, 2019'}

column6: they are very very light, although they did collect lint pretty easily

column5: Finally! A regular waist great pant!
column6: I am so happy to have found a pant that is not highrise!! This fits me perfectly. I love the 2 lengths, the fit but, especially, the thing I love the most is that it is not a highrise. I am hoping that lululemon brings back the regular waist wunder-unders but for now, there are these.
column15: i need a regular waist non highrise wunder-undei

column6: I like these pants but the sizing is not consistent. I have 2 pair both the same size and one is much smaller than the other.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Jesg,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us! I\'m sorru to hear about the sizing issues with the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 4, 2019'}

column6: My favorite lulu pants by far! Fit stays great, comfortable and look great. I want these in every color!

Second pair of these, bought them a size smaller than my first and loved the extra compression! Used for 60 min of OTF and didn’t have to adjust or think of them at all. Sign of a great pair of pants!
Lululemon is my go to for pants. As always these fit great. Very happy with my purchase

When I tried these on I was in love! I LOVE the beautiful plum color and these felt amazing! After wearing these pants for about 5 minutes I wanted to order 2 more pairs on the spot. However, I decided that I should wait until these were put to the test. I am so glad because this is the first pair of lulu's that have shown sweat during a workout for me! I could feel the sweat as well so by the time workout class was over I knew what I would see. I will say that the pants dried within the 15 minutes it took for me to drive home.... I was SO disappointed as I have a couple other pairs that feel great and don't show anything. I buy lululemon specifically to work out in and spending $100 on pants that do not perform was a huge bummer.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Heidle,\n\nWe appreciate your feedback regarding the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We want your gear to support your sweatiest pursuits, but it sounds this isn’t the case for you. We stand behind our quality, and we’d like to work with you towards a solve. Please give us a ring at 1.877.263.9300 so we can make things right. Chat with you soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'February 2, 2019'}

column6: I generally don't order online without trying on first in store, but I am soooo glad I did. These leggings are the best ones I've ever owned. They are a perfect fit, and super duper comfortable. I'm short (5'2", 110 lbs) and ordered size 4, which were a great fit and perfect length. Great quality, will be ordering these again for sure!

Everything about these pants is near perfection! The color (plum shadow), the seaming, the feel of the material, the ever so slight compression...loved it all...until I turned around in the mirror and noticed my nude colored seamless underwear completely visible through the back of these pants and I was standing normally...bending over was a whole other story. Completely disappointed that I have to send these back :(

I\'m sorry to hear that the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not performing for you. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 2, 2019'}

column6: I love the align pant but I needed something more functional and a pant that pilled less from my hot yoga work outs so I was told to go with the "in-movement pant". I felt like I was between a size 4 and 6 but the sales lady told me to go with the smaller size because they stretch out slightly. However, I have noticed no stretch in these pants at all and they are way too tight and fold over at the waist when I am doing yoga. I wish I went with the 6 :(. So for those wanting to buy these, go for it but stay true to size.
These tights are great! They stick to me when I'm running, lunging, or anything in between. I don't have to constantly pull the up either. Great buy!

column5: Don't buy if you actually sweat when you workout
column6:
I put these on and was so happy because they were so comfortable and soft! They are advertised as a training and yoga legging, so I wore them to the gym to do my workout. I love to sweat, but these pants show the sweat so much honestly I'm embarrassed and afraid to wear them now because it looks like I've wet myself.
I even bought a darker colour after I had bought the sage (a lighter green) colour, and sweat is still SO apparent. I don't have this problem in any of my other lulus. Get the train times or all the right places pants if you actually sweat when you work out!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear apples2apples22,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. I\'m sorry to hear you\'re having such trouble with your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25"! I\'d love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 1, 2019'}

column6: I love wearing these to the gym on leg day (well, everyday) because they're a) super flattering; b) squat proof; and c) keep my bum looking smooth (and not over-revealing) when coming up from a squat or deadlift. They definitely feel tight when putting them on, but once they're on you, they're like second skin. I tell all of my girlfriends to invest in a pair of these!
These leggings are super flattering and super comfy. I love the style and fit, I’ve only worn them once so I hope they wash well!
Leggings are sooo comfortable and fit so nicely! Perfect length and fabric!
So soft , true to size. Fits tummy area perfectly. Love these
Hugs in all the right places! Waist stays put and doesn’t roll! Makes me look better than I already am!
This is my second pair of tights and I just love the way they feel and keep everything tight. Working out in them is fun! I can move freely and the fabric is breathable.

When the sales associate recommended these to me, I was HOOKED. I loved the way they felt, so soft and perfect for sweaty HIIT sessions.
I was disappointed after about 2 wears to find they completely stretched out in the waist—I constantly have to pull them up in workout classes. So annoying!
I had been a little apprehensive about sizing and now I cannot exchange them for a smaller size as I've already washed them.

We look forward to speaking with you soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 31, 2019'}

column6: I noticed there was a loose string on the bottom area and after a workout it got worse. The seams were loose upon arrival and not sure if I can continue wearing them if they rip. The color was darker and more teal than the photos and not well made. I also sized up from my usual size which is unusual. A bummer because they were expensive.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Irenee,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re so sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 31, 2019'}

column6: I've finally found my favorite leggings. These leggings are incredibly comfy yet really supportive. The high waist seems a bit higher than WunderUnders-- and I love it. It's not too high to be awkward but just high enough. The fabric is super soft but still holds you in at all the right places without "death compression." The only downside is that they are lint magnets.

I love the fit of these bottoms and they live up to the lululemon expectations in terms of how they look, however i was so disappointed that by my third wash of them (and i hand wash my lulus) they have started to pile on the seams which now make them not so cute to look at! I have resorted to only wearing them with long tops etc so you cant see this, v disappointing!

I went to my local lulu store and was recommended these pants as the sales associate said they would be great for HIIT (i do orangetheory). I tried them on in the store in my normal size 6 and felt they fit good. not too loose but not too tight either. however, last night during class I found I was constantly having to pull them up and the waist band was not fitting as snug as I had initially felt when I tried them on. I am not sure if that's due to the waist stretching out a little as you move or what but I now wish I would have sized down to a 4 and unfortunately I have already worn and washed them so I cannot exchange ;(
Comfy and stylish, these fit great for any kind of yoga practice.

I absolutely love Lululemon and most of their stuff. However the material of these pants are too silky, and these pants will slide down on me all day! I find myself constantly having to pull the waistband up throughout my workout. I'd rather the feel of the Aligns, and those stay put all day.

Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 30, 2019'}

column6: These leggings are really cute and fit perfectly! But after wearing them twice they already have a pull in the seam! I'm hoping they don't end up falling apart. I'm also pretty disappointed because in the past all my lululemon products have been great quality.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear soccers1,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We\'d love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 30, 2019'}

column6: I loved these pants when I bought them in mystic green. They were well fitted and the perfect length. I ordered a size 6. Because I liked them so much I ordered them in the dark adobe (which a maroon shade). However when I tried them on they were too tight and fit at a shorter length. I have long legs so the green ones are a good length but there are too short. I returned them and bought an 8. The length was fine on these however the waste was looser. I thought they would work at the gym anyway. But, they do not! I had to keep adjusting the waste and they would ride up and give me a camel toe. I now feel i can only wear them with a long shirt. I am not happy with the sizing and now I can not return them because I have already worked out in them.

We look forward to speaking with you soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2019'}

column5: Great pants but not true to size
column6: I was so excited to order these leggings for my HIIT classes! I'm typically a size 6 and ordered true to size. I've only worn them for about a week and a half and I spend almost 1/2 my class pulling them up. Unfortunately I don't think I will be able to wear them anymore. I love Lulu and have been wearing them for all my workouts for YEARS, might be time to look elsewhere for something that won't fall down?

Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2019'}

column6: These are decent for training and fit TTS, but if you have a cat/dog/child/dust/dirt in your life, be prepared because these are like Velcro for anything around you. Really wish this fabric was more like luxtreme because it’s def comfortable for strength training and fits well. I won’t buy more because I can’t keep them clean and they aren’t cheap. Bummed!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey KMF480,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we'd love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2019'}

column6:
I bought two pairs, one in mystic green and one in nocturnal teal. The nocturnal teal fit me perfeclty -- nice compression, great tummy control, not too tight or too lose. The mystic green was much smaller. Caused spillage over the waist band and major camel toe. I ordered the same color in one size larger and it resolved the tightness issue, but now they are very loose around the ankles and causes some extra fabric behind the knee and in the pelvic region. I tested out the larger size in the gym and had to constantly fidget with the waistband and roll up the ankle (which feels counterintuitive because I like the 25" inseam so I don't have to roll up the ankle, but now I have to because it's too wide, not because it's too long...). Can't return them now since they've been used so I'm very sad about these.
Beware, mystic green fits smaller than other colors! I love the fit in noctorunal teal so I'm very disappointed mystic green isn't the same in sizing. I'm 115 lbs 5'2 24" waist 34" hips. I wear these for cardio and weightlifting. I wear size 2 in all Lululemon leggings, except this one in mystic green in size 4.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey soleggings,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It sounds like your Teal In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux is not providing the right fit. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2019'}

column6: I am pretty disappointed in these pants. I have the same ones in the same size (6) in black (I got the dark red) and they were so loose at the waist when putting them on. I thought maybe they’d be better once I’m working out. During my HiiT workout, I kept having to pull them up. At one point it felt like I was sagging...! I’m not sure if because the color is different than black, then the material fits differently too…? Either way, not stoked on them!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Mws552108,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux is not performing for your sweaty pursuits. We stand behind our gear and we'd love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2019'}

column6: I just received these on WMTM in mystic green and they are so good! My new fav gym leggings & nice to have a change from my everyday black. The only issue I had at the gym was sweat showing in the crotch area which isn't attractive but only at the end of my workout (& it was a sweaty one!) Love them!

I got the plum shadow color and it’s a beautiful color! The fit and feel is wonderful. They passed the squat test. HOWEVER, I really recommend getting black if you are going to be doing intense cardio exercises or anything that will make you sweat. Even though it says, “wicks sweat fast”, it’s still no fun to finish a great workout and be embarrassed to go anywhere but your car! No woman wants embarrassing sweat stains! Absolutely love the color, but disappointed that I won’t wear these for cardio workout.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Newre,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux is not performing for your sweaty pursuits. We stand behind our gear and we'd love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2019'}

column6: Love these tights so far. The size is a bit snug, I’m 5,5 and 128lbs. Ordered a size 4. I think I will hand them down to my Daughter, who weighs in at 103lbs and is 5’2”. Should work better for her. Did I say I love this blue pattern?! Make more please :) As always I wash on delicate and hang to dry on my drying rack I’ve had for years.
column9: THE MOUNTAINS ON THE WEST COAST.

column6: I bought these for running in moderately cool weather - 40 to 50 degrees. They are perfect. Fit like a second skin, but not too tight. Long enough to cover the ankles. Super soft. They're great.

column5: Super soft and great for all the sweat
column6: I bought my first pair of In Movement tights off the sale rack last year because they were a good deal. I hadn't tried them prior to that, but they soon became my go to pair for working out. They have nice tummy control and aren't too tight. I wear them for just lounging around the house as well as intense weightlifting sessions in the gym. I just bought a second pair because I am super impressed at how well they've held up over the last year considering I wear them at least once a week for working out.

Love lulu and a loyal customer for years, HARE THESE! Would not recommend purchasing these terrible leggings. The material ate away at one of the knees out of nowhere. I have had other leggings that are 6 years old and are in nearly perfect condition. NONE of my other leggings have ever done something like this. Faulty product.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear cherry567,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We’d like to get to the bottom of this and work towards a resolution, so I\'ve sent you an email to follow up.', 'LL_response_date': 'January 27, 2019'}

column5: Loose waist band falls down constantly

But it was after a few wears i noticed them getting looser, but would wash them and they would be back to a nice fit again. Until the washing stopped helping the looseness at all. Now they are just so over stretched and not fitted one bit. Sad and very disappointed in these pants.

column5: Great fit but problem with fabric
column6: I bought my first pair of In movement leggings a couple months ago, I will say I love the fit, and they are very flattering but I bought these on sale and did not try them on, which was a mistake. I took them home, ripped off the tags, put them on and there seemed to be what looked like was almost like long stains running through the pants on both thighs. I'm not sure if the material stretched out weirdly when I put them on, or what happened. Nonetheless, I don't wear them very often due to what they look like on with the "stains". I do love how these leggings are designed but disappointed by how the material looked when I put them on.

column6: Just bought my second pair of In Movement tights. They are extremely soft and comfortable, yet they are supportive enough to wear for almost any workout. I wear the same size in these as most of my other Lulus. I have worn and washed them several times and they seem to be holding up well.

column5: My new favorite pants! Super comfortable to work out in and look perfect on!
column6: This guest did not provide a text review.

These are my new favorite tights, and I have basically every tight LLL makes. I love the tight stuffs for their compression, but I still have to yank them up. These just stay up, and the material is butter soft. Thick enough to hide some of the lumps and bumps, and tight enough to keep you feel locked in. I wish I knew about these before as I would have bought them in other colours and skipped on all the other LLL tights I have. They fit the same as wunder unders or other tights, so get your usual size. Total winner!

J'ai acheté ces leggings pour l'entrainement en salle. Je les adore. Ils sont très doux et confortable. Cependant, j'ai pris la grandeur 2 au lieu de 4 qui est ma grandeur habituelle. Essayer les en magasin avant de les acheter en ligne.
Love these leggings, great material and perfect length!

When I first got these I absolutely loved them!!! The material is so soft and beyond comfortable! I actually bought a second pair bc I loved them so much! These are the type of pants you want to live in ... until you realize that only after two wears and the recommended washing technique they began piling and I even found a small hole on the knee!!! So heartbroken over these pants bc I only got to wear them twice before I couldn’t anymore :(

column6: Love these - I would say these are a cross between aligns and luxtremes. I usualy size down to a 2 in aligns and a 4 in luxtreme (I'm 5'6",135 lbs) and I decided to get a 4 in these and I'm so glad I did because sizing down would have made them far too tight and uncomfortable.

These were my first Lulu purchase and now I understand what all the fuss is about. So soft and comfortable you can wear them all day and forget they're still on you. I originally bought them in black which does show a bit of dust but you just wipe off, no big deal. I subsequently bought them in the dark shadow. Beautiful colour and doesn't show the dust. Love them.

I loooooove the fabric of these leggings. they make my legs and butt look great but I am disappointed with the fit. I've only had them for three days and I'm already pulling them up every five minutes. I'm a true size four so that's what I bought but I wish I would have gotten a size 2. I cut out the tag as soon as I purchased them so now I can't exchange them:/

column6: This is my second pair of this tight I love it it’s light but still hides well my only thing if u go a size down it won’t pass the squat test but I have 2 each one is different size and both fits perfect.

I pretty much live in lululemon- for class, work, and gym and i’ve yet to be disappointed until now! I was excited about the In Movement’s, but the second I put them on (or even took them out of the package) fuzz and lint immediately stuck to them- everywhere. It is so hard to get off, and even after you wash them stuff starts sticking (and I don’t even have a pet). Perhaps black might not be the best bet here, better to go with a lighter color.

column6: Hands down my favorite pair of lulumen pants I have ever owned. I wear these for working out and know I don't have worry when doing squats or deadlifts. Super soft with a second skin-like feel, I almost forget I am wearing pants!
love this tight. I have it in dark shadow which looks a little bit purple but I still like it. fits well, and length is perfect for me
These leggings fit just right and they are so comfortable. They are completely unlike (and better) than any other leggings I've ever owned.
Perfect fit and I love the olive green color.

column5: It's a Bitter Pill to Swallow
column6:
The upside is these pants fit great thus far, I've only washed them once but I haven't had any issues with them stretching out as I've read has happened with others. (For reference, I vary between an 8-10 and purchased these in an 8) I've worn them for yoga and just casual home lounging. However, the pilling on these is ridiculous. As I said, I've washed them only once with like-items and I've never experienced so much pilling with such a new item. I'm nervous to see what happens with them over the next few weeks ... :/
**Unrelated, but I would love for Lulu to come out with more styles of pants with that classic, thicker Luon material! I have a pair of crops from years back that did me so well on a worldwide backpacking trip and I would've picked up at least one or two backup pairs had I known that I wouldn't be able to find something similar now.

I was hesitant about branching out and trying a new style of leggings since I’m a die hard fan of the speed up tight, but I decided to take a risk and try something new! The high rise waist and large back pocket are both fabulous features and the stitching makes your bum look AMAZING! Unfortunately they stretched and are way too big to wear for any activity now.. I am 5’11 and ordered a size 8, I would recommend sticking to the speed up tight as they stay up, are true to size and have a waist band!

I love these pants, they do not restrict in any way and I can move so freely in them but at the same time they give great support!

I'm so glad I finally talked to a sales person and found the right size and right pant. I had trouble with loose waistbands and discovered I needed to go down a size. This is also a perfect waistband for me. I didn't want an adjustable tie in the waistband so this pant was recommended to me. It is perfect. It has wonderful support but it is also so soft. Personally, I like the outside seams on the legs.

I reallllllly wanted to love these for running but sweat showed more than I was expecting (I bought the olive green color) and the other disappintment was the key/phone area - I kept having to pull the waist up in the back when I put my phone or keys in the slot. column6: My new favorite pair of leggings. So comfortable perfect for yoga and my boxing class. Would be awesome for hiking. Sweet dries fast.

Good quality, only issue I have with them is the placement of the back pocket tends to scratch my lower back. This material seems to hold on to dog hair more than others I’ve purchased in the past. Great color, I get many compliments.

I was super excited when I tried these on in the NYC store and purchased them right away. They fit perfect and were sweatproof as promised. Unfortunately, after a few wears they stretched out to about a size too large in all the wrong places. By the time I realized this I had already tossed the receipt and tags. I wish I had read the reviews before purchasing as it seems like many others are having the same issue. I will be sticking with my wunder under and aligns in the future.
They looked and felt fine until I did jumping, burpees, or mountain climbers. They kept rolling down and I pulled them up the entire workout. They were great at a slow walk..

I just purchased these leggings in the 'Dark Shadow' color. I was SO excited when I purchased these. I wore these leggings a total of TWO times before the stitching started to unravel. I have ALWAYS washed my lululemon clothes as stated on the tag. NEVER once have put my leggings in the drier and I ALWAYS wash them in COLD! I own several different styles of lululemon leggings, and this has never happened! DO NOT buy these, save your money. I am so disappointed because these leggings had so much going for them, but they do not hold up.

I was so excited to wear these pants to spin, however I regretted it about 10 minutes into my class. I was constantly having to slow down/stop to pull them up, and after class they were stretched out. I have other pairs of lululemons that I love, and I was hoping to love these too but unfortunately they’re my least favorite pair I’ve ever owned.

I really love these leggings but after not having them for long I noticed a hole in the thigh that has been driving me crazy. I didn't catch them on anything or do any crazy activities other than running. The hole seems to be getting bigger which is such a bummer because I really loved these. I guess it is just due to the material of the pants unfortunately since they are so thin and lightweight. They also do pill a bit along the inside seam of the thighs. Otherwise these are pretty great with how light and high waisted they are.
These are hands down my favorite leggings ever. The fit is perfect ( I am 5'5" and 125, I wear a 4), they melt like butter on my skin. I will be purchasing in every color.

I was so excited to get these as I used a gift card from Christmas. They arrived and put them on and the felt great but I noticed right away there were discolourations in the fabric. I bought black... but parts looked like there were thick scratches in it. I was a bit bummed as I paid over 100 for them but wore them to my workout anyway. I kept having to pull them up as they were slipping throughout my workout. Then I looked down and noticed all my sweat was showing...ugh... the whole reason I bought black and moisture wicking...Then when the pants dried, the were was outline of my sweat dried onto the pants. I won't be wearing these again for a workout... so sad.

I absolutely love these pants! First off, they are so cute. They are very comfortable and one of my favorite pairs of lulu pants to workout in. I have three pairs of these and plan on buying more. They are very fitted, but I wear these in the same size of all of my other lulu leggings.

I have these in solid black, but saw the same style in a blue pattern on sale and immediately grabbed them up. These are probably my favorite leggings. The seams/stitching are very flattering, I love the 7/8 length, and a high-rise waist is a must for me. I wear these during yoga, strength training, even running and the pants stay in place and the waist band does not roll down. Everyone should have the In Movement leggings in their wardrobe. Such a great purchase!

great fit and really comfortable, only didn’t like the material because everything sticks to it-lint, pet hair, etc. and dirt/dusk marks show easily and are hard to get off without washing the leggings.

These pants are probably the most comfortable pair of leggings I’ve ever put on in my life. I will for sure be ordering them in all the colors. Some serious magic was put into making these pants!
My favourite workout pant. So comfortable, they feel very light, stay on while working out.

These pants are so comfortable, however the inside back pocket's lining is tearing off, and they are pilling in the area between the legs. I really like this material, however I'm not sure if it worth it due to the lack of durability.

column6: These are my first pair of lulu's purchased Dec 2018. I absolutely love these pants, love them so much that I purchased another style. The fit is perfect and love the color. column5: and it's lululemon for the win!
column6: i am SO thrilled with these pants, and even more thrilled that lululemon is finally making a comeback! i've been really frustrated with lulu's selection lately...everything is high rise (uncomfortable) has mesh panels/cut outs (like a cat slashed my tights before i put them on), or seams in all the wrong places. all i wanted was a simple, no frills black legging for yoga that fit well and held up against anything, like lululemon used to sell back in the old days. i was ready to give up and start looking somewhere else, but then i tried these pants and now, i'm a believer once again! great amount of compression, not too high that i feel suffocated, and an amazing fabric that combines the best qualities of luxtreme and luon. i will absolutely be purchasing more!
column14: fabric flattering fit not too high-rise
column15: a mid or low rise option would be nice!

column6:
As much as I love to spend money on leggings and gym wear, I am hesitant to drop money on things that are too delicate because I like to do a variety of workouts (gym, hiit, mat pilates) and my leggings need to be able to stand up to it all. I have a experienced the nakedness of the aligns, which is alarmingly soft and I gingerly wear them around the house however the in movement tights are feel just as soft to me but give me slightly more compression and material is thicker, so I am comfortable to do my workouts in them. Only draw is the seam that goes around the shin, it is not the most flattering. Wish this Nulux material would be adopted in more legging styles!
I'm 165 cm, 53 kg, wear a size 4 in these leggings.

I was so excited to receive the dark adobe in the mail. The color is beautiful and just what I was looking for. The material is so soft and the fit is exceptional. However, after just one wear I was told that the behind is completely see through!! I bought my normal size and own several different styles of Lulu leggings and have never had this problem. I was so disappointed, especially for a $100 pair of leggings :(

column6: I love these Leggings there have far become my favorite. I switched from the Allign pants to the new fabric and I love them. The fit in all the right places but still hide the imperfections. Would definitively recommend to my fellow students who live out their leggings. These are a must have!

These pants are so comfortable. They’re fitted and hug in just the right places so they hold you in well but the material is soooo comfortable I would prefer having the pants on then being naked just because they’re that great. I bought two colors and had to stop myself from walking out of the store with every shade after trying them on. Lucky me I get to wear athletic gear to work; and I am so stoked to find something so cute and functioning. I regularly get lulu gear and these are my fav thing I’ve ever gotten from them. Get these pants, you will not regret it!

I loved my first pair so much so that I asked for a second pair for Christmas. Unfortunately the second was extremely disappointing as it feels like they are different material and the pants are already pilling and threading. I haven't had any of my other lulu pants wear so quickly and it's a shame since the colour is super nice, I think it's the dark plum. I probably won't be purchasing these anytime soon.

column5: Good buy at the sale price
column6: I bought these on sale and really like them. I am 5''5, 122lbs and always buy a size 6 in Lululemon. I'm not sure I would have paid full price for these as they are thing, but at the sale price, definitely.

I bought these online with the hopes they’d fit well and be comfy, having never bought this type before. They ended up being so comfortable and cute my mom bought a pair too (after trying on mine). They’re perfect for a light workout as they will show sweat, but even more perfect for just wearing around (airport?). They’re stretchy and soft but still tight and hold their form.

I can't speak about these enough. The fit is perfect, they are comfortable to workout in, lounge in and run errands. They are not skin tight in the belly area. Overall the best pair of pants I have encountered so far. You will not regret buying these.

I just received these yesterday and was so happy. They fit amazing. They are so soft! I wore them this morning for my class and they felt so comfortable during my workout. I might need to get another pair....or two!!!
these leggings go with almost everything in my closet. they never pill because of the type of fabric which i absolutely love its worth the price!
I love these pants! They are my new favorite! I can dance, do yoga and run errands in these! Absolutely the best!

I LOVE these leggings! They fit me right in all the right places! They’re high waisted & provide good tummy control, and I have shorter legs so the 7/8 length is the perfect length for me! They are so soft & smoothe! These are great for my morning runs to running errands during the day to my afternoon pilates! All day, all purpose legging, and I LOVE THEM!!

I got these in the WMTM section and I honestly don't know why they were there. These leggings are great! The only reason for a 4 is because they seem to slide down a bit, but I think part of that is my body shape. The material is great, just compressive enough, and soft.

I may have tried every single pair of leggings Lulu makes and I have finally found my favorite!! These are not only flattering but they are comfortable, just the right combination of snug/compression and soft/buttery feel. They aren't too high waisted, don't cut into you and most importantly they don't fall down and I'm not constantly pulling them up! I wear them for running errands/casual leggings...once made the mistake of wearing my olive green pair to the gym....they def show sweat! That would be the only flaw. I want every color!!

I got size 4 - 25 waist, 37 hips, 130 Lbs, athletic legs.
I just got these pants in the blue print and tried the squat test and everything... they are awesome. The fabric is great - smooth, second skin, light and pet hair doesn't stick :) Also, the pattern of the pants doesn't stretch out when i squat... I hate when some pants that do that.

These are great. They hug you in all the right places, they are very high rise, no sagging or bagging and no shifting around when you move. I'm really happy with these leggings. I've washed them several times and they still look new.
column11: I KEEP MY AGE ON THE D.L.

column6: I love the colour, look, and feel of these leggings but I'm extremely disappointed in the quality especially for the price. I went to Lululemon I asked for help picking a legging that would be good for lifting in the gym. The girl working said these leggings would be perfect for what I wanted, she said they were durable and didn't pill easily. The first time I wore them I did deadlifts and noticed that where ever the bar touched my shins there were marks on the leggings. I thought maybe it was dirt so I washed them and still the colour is missing from the leggings and they look super worn. I could see them looking worn if I had them for a long time and always did deadlifts in these leggings but not after wearing them just one time.
They fit amazing and feel great! 100% recommend them!
These tights are very comfortable. They fit true to size for my usual size 4. I've worn them for running and crossfit and they've performed well for both. I would buy again.

Bought these leggings for my 15 yr old daughter. All her friends have them but I couldn't imagine spending that amount for one pair of leggings. Well, they look fabulous and fit beautifully. She is so happy with them that it was worth every penny. Wish I could afford to get her a few ore pairs.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Serenay,\n\nWe're sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. Please be sure to give us a call at our Guest Education Centre on 1.877.263.9300 or you can always start a Live Chat with us on our website. We look forward to hearing from you.", 'LL_response_date': 'January 13, 2019'}

column6: I used this leggings once and the waistband keeps folding on me. It does not fit snugly enough at the top for it to stay in place so I need to keep pulling it up. It is not at all flattering. I bought in several colors and will be returning because of the performance.

I am leaving this review only because it was solicited through "Tell Us How You Like Your New Gear" emails from you. Since you asked, I couldn't possibly DISLIKE these tights any more. I purchased these as a Christmas gift for my daughter. Felt the fabric was substandard and unlike other Lulu tights or leggings we have purchased. They began to pill after the FIRST wear. Extremely disappointed, especially at this price point!!!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear mmoore,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. We\'d love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 8, 2019'}

column6: I love them for yoga, barre, training, AND lounging. They are so soft and flattering
These are so comfy and soft. Love them!

These leggings are so soft and comfortable, but unfortunately after only one workout, it was already so loose around my calves. They definitely don't fit like 7/8 crops - about two inches longer and I am 5'3. Lulu please fix your length issues!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear LisaMarie1313,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We hear where you\'re coming from and I\'m sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" haven\'t held up for you as expected. We\'d love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 8, 2019'}

column6: The fit on these pants are perfect for petite frames. I''m 5'2 and my inseam is 25". These fit like regular size pants. The quality is excellent. Soft and thick . No Camel toe like some other brands.

At first, I thought these would become my most favorite Lululemons. I wondered how I had never tried them before. However, I bought them, wore them about 2 times, washed them only once and they have already loosen up and I need to pull them up all the time. Here's the kicker, in the store at Lululemon today when I was about to buy more - I noticed these had already snagged! I don't know how or where as I have only ever worn them WALKING. All of my other Lululemons this has NOT happened to and I'm very disappointed. I was ready to LOVE these and was so happy with them at the store. I'm just upset that it was only 2 wears very light wears later that these bagged out and snagged.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Petra,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". I\'m sorry to hear your gear isn\'t performing as expected—I can understand the disappointment. We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix. We\'ll be following up via email to discuss this further. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 7, 2019'}

column6: I really love the fit and feel of these leggings, I got them in the antique bark. But, the color I received is much darker and more purple/gray toned than the one in the photo.

I have these leggings in black in a size 6 and they fit great. No slippage and I never have to pull or tug on them. I loved them so much that I ordered another pair in green. I got the same size but they are so much bigger and fall down with every step. I am disappointed because I already cut the tags off, otherwise I would have exchanged the green ones for a smaller size.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear JGVi,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear that the In Movement 7/8 Tight is not performing for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 5, 2019'}

column6: This is my second pair of In Movement tights. I bought the black in September and then recently grabbed a pair in olive (lovely color) Have to agree with the other reviews. The material is fabulous, but the fit....I am constantly pulling up the waist and fabric bunches up right around my knees during yoga and barre class. Friends commenting that this shouldn’t happen w/Lulu tights. 8 is slightly roomy, 6 is too snug. I’d buy one in every color if I didn’t have to fidget so much. As much as I’d like to recommend for fabric, not so much for movement (which is the reason I wear them)
column11: I KEEP MY AGE ON THE D.L.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear MMK1114,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear that the In Movement 7/8 Tight is not performing for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 5, 2019'}

column6: These were a Christmas present for my daughter.They are durable yet so comfortable. They are she’ll wear and she never tires of them so with the price.
After wearing and washing roughly 10 times, the seams all split open with holes everywhere and pilling on the fabric.

These fit true to size. They are the BEST color. I got the Nocturnal Teal. I have never seen this color before. It is honestly the BEST color they have ever made. I have a hard time taking these off. I had a rough time with the shipping before the holidays. Disappointed with that part, but the pants are exceptional.

I got these in a 6 (my normal Lulu size) and they were SO tight I felt like a can of biscuits. I returned them for an 8 and they stretched out so bad that they don't even look like leggings. Disappointed because they are a great color :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear CColombo,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We’d like to get to the bottom of this and work towards a resolution, so I\'ve sent you an email to follow up.', 'LL_response_date': 'January 3, 2019'}

column6: I'm disappointed in these leggings. I was so excited about the sweat wicking fabric and color initially, but after owning for just a few months I can't do a pilates class without repeatedly having to tug them up. They just stretched out so quickly.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear hl47,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I am sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not performing as you hoped it would be. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 3, 2019'}

column6: I was a little bit disappointed. I tired in store, the staff recommend me size 2. it fit okay, but during working out, I have to pull up again and again.But if I go size 0, it would be too tight. It was not that comfortable... I got leggings from Uniqlo for $20, it was more comfortable.

I bought these leggings to wear around casually and occasionally workout in. They are very flattering to my figure and the fabric is very soft. However, I am a little disappointed because the high waisted part of them is not as snug as it should be and I find myself after extended wear having to pull at the waist band to pull the leggings back up to make sure they stay in a high rise position.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear afcrungoblue,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We’d like to get to the bottom of this and work towards a resolution, so I\'ve sent you an email to follow up.', 'LL_response_date': 'January 3, 2019'}

column6:
These are really flattering and the fabric is so comfortable. Absolutely love the stitching. That said...these would be perfect if only:
-the waist was smooth like the Aligns. I find the pocket really uncomfortable- it has almost like a rubber on the inside that rubs against my back and feels like it is scratching my skin at times.
-the waist digs in- I wish it was like the waist on the wonder under or aligns. This waist is more like the Train Times- it just sits at a bit of an awkward place and digs in.
-material is really comfortable but it attracts so much dust and lint and hair...not a dealbreaker, I have dogs and am used to using a lint roller but any dust or lint is really noticeable on the black after wearing for a few hours. I've accepted this as the tradeoff to the soft fabrics like Nulu and Everlux and I still love and buy leggings in this fabric despite this.

I loved these pants when I purchased them which has been 4 pairs since the summer and I have to say I am disappointed as they have all started to stretch out. I did a work out today in them the were falling down and it was just a circuit work out then went for a run and they were falling down off my waste and in my legs leading to a very uncomfortable run of having to pull up constantly. I love these and the fabric but so disappointed that I now own 4 pairs that have stretched out making them unpleasant to wear and having to pull up constantly.

Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 8, 2019'}

column6: The waistband has a stitch in the fold that makes them roll. They do not stay up and one side always looks higher then the other due to the stitching in the waistband. I was told by the staff that these would be a great option for me for my job since I sit so much at a desk but they just roll awkwardly and are very unflattering
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear sitallday,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I am sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not performing as you hoped it would be. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 6, 2019'}

column6:
love the design and fabric but have to return it.
as a petite with short legs, I can not wear this crop as full length, since the crease/folds(the ones designed to be on the calves) are too low on my leg, making me look shorter.
I will more than happy to buy if there is a petite version.

These leggings look great. They're very simple and sleek. But my biggest concern with leggings is that they will become see through when doing certain movements. These leggings definitely start to those their opacity when bending over or squatting down. Disappointing because this style definitely would have been my go-to legging.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear MWilson984,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". I completely understand why you\'re disappointed with this and I\'d love to help turn this around. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 7, 2019'}

column6: I've been wearing the capri version (which is actually a capri for us shorties and not 7/8) and thought I would try the 7/8. I am about 5'4", 150 athletic and usually 7/8 are too long, but a size 4 made these the perfect full-length fit for me. The only part that bugs me sometimes is the lower back pocket. I think its just the way its made, sometimes it gets a little itchy, but I usually don't notice it. These are so soft and provide full coverage for my thighs and butt (no see-thru-ness here!!)
The feel, comfort and design of these leggings is amazing! Definitely worth the money.
Great pant for run or yoga. Love the fit

I bought these leggings back in August and I wear them constantly. They are super light weight and comfortable. The stitching on them is also very flattering. I was going to purchase another pair however, recently they have been leaving dye or something on my skin.
So cute just go down a size or 2.
Feel fantastic on

I am 5'4 110lb give or take a pound or two.. I am an exact 24in waist and 34 in around butt... the smallest size possible and it still gets all loose on me in the butt, I am constantly tugging on these to keep them up and then high rise folds down on me. The most annoying part though is that it feels like a sagging butt by the end of my workouts. I buy from multable workout shops(cheap to expensive) and would say as a first time buyer of Lulu I don't wear these!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear tdogt,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. We\'ll be following up via email to discuss this further. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 31, 2018'}

column6: These tights are great for all of my activities—HIIT class, running, hiking, walks with my dog. I love the side pocket to place my cellphone during my runs, and it never feels like it’s in danger of popping out. The high rise is what I live in now, and I don’t even bother looking at the other styles. The hugged sensation makes one feel supported without feeling restrictive. Would definitely recommend!
My favorite pair of lulu leggings because of the fine weave of the material and the placement of the seams and the pockets. I’m 5’1” so the 7/8 fits perfect like a full length.

column5: Fits Like a Glove but Unraveling
column6: I was absolutely stoked when I got these leggings cause they are great and don't move when you move on high intensity workouts. However, I've only had them a week and the seams are already unraveling. I'm upset because these fit so well and are so comfortable, but the quality isn't holding up like it should for such a high-priced legging.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey ClimbingBunnies,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 30, 2018'}

column6: I love these leggings so much-- unbelievably comfortable and perfect for my workouts. No need for hiking up constantly! I can focus on my workout and not my attire. Wicks sweat perfectly-- highly recommend. I am mad I spent years shelling out money for cheap leggings that don't meet my needs-- wish I had invested in these leggings years ago. I'm 5'6 130 lbs with larger calves and the size 4 was perfect.

I bought my 14 year old daughter a pair for Christmas. She is in love!! She wants more!! This mama could use some coupons! Lol. Wonderful product and my daughter adores these leggings. She said they are the best leggings she has ever owned.

Received these leggings in the "dark adobe" color and absolutely love them! They have great compression, and are perfect for heavy lifting and intense activity. Be aware that the waist band of these are more snug than the Align Pant II! Great color, look and feel! 10/10 would recommend

I really like the way these look, but am disappointed with how they hold up. They stretched out after 30 minutes of wearing them, and now I'm constantly pulling them up. I will probably go back and buy another pair size down because I like the material. Disappointed that I cannot exchange these as I bought them on sale.

We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We\'d love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 29, 2018'}

column6: i recently bought these pants in store, expecting good quality, because i have other pairs of lulus that i wear tons, and work great. when i got home, and put them on again, i was walking around, and they kept sliding down. these pants will not stay up, even though i made sure to buy the right size, and within 2 minutes they were covered in dog hair. i have two dogs, but they arent shedding right now, and the only place that i sat down was on the couch (where the doggos arent allowed) so i was confused as to why this was happening. would not recommend.

column5: Love these tights have them in numerous colours
column6: love these tights own them in multiple colours. seem to have an "off" pair thought, lots of pilling and fraying of fabric...

column6: I just bought a second pair of these pants in the olive green color. I’ve had a pair in black for a few months and they’ve held up great. Love these pants! I’m about 5’5, 125 pounds, and the 4 fits well. Since I have shorter legs the 25” is actually a full length pant for me. Very comfortable pant for cycling class, running, etc. I highly recommend them!

I was hesitant to spend the money. Let's face it, they are not cheap by any means and I'm not used to paying this price for a workout pant. However, I love the feel of the fabric, the comfort and fit. I can wear them all day long comfortably. Also, the fabric has memory so the knees do not get baggy and the fit remains taught.
I LOVE this product!

These look great but they stretch out big time and they sag at the crotch for some reason. I find myself pulling them up during my CrossFit workouts and even just walking around the house. I like the fabric and length and waist band, but I wouldn’t buy them again based on them sagging in the crotch. They aren’t too small and it’s not because they are too big either. Ugh.
column15: sagging crotch loose threads after 1 wash?

column6: I bought the mystic green colour online and love it, bought the thunder blue in store, it's a different fit even though i'm a size 4 in Lulu pants. I love the thunder blue colour and was looking forward to wearing it as an alternate to my other lulu pants since I go to yoga and pilates everyday. But its so much more looser. Disappointed.

column6: I absolutely fell in love with the nocturnal teal color, and the material felt great against my legs however the waistband dug-in in a way that the wunder unders never do, which made it really uncomfortable to sit and squat in. Also please heed the warning about pet hair! Not even a thorough lint rolling can save these.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear saralauren125,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I am sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not performing as you hoped it would be. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 27, 2018'}

column6: Bought a pair last March and love them so much I just bought a second pair today!! Wear them at least twice a week and to workout in and they still look brand new! Waist band has gotten a tad looser but is still very snug and doesn't move when I squat or am active. Love the sleek look, 7/8 length and the high waisted fit. I always get compliments about how good my butt looks in them as well

I absolutely loved these pants when I bought them less than 10 months ago. I wear them for the gym (cardio) and I didn't use them for 6 weeks during the summer because I was out of town. I am noticing recently that there are at least 2 small tears in part of the first layer of fabric on the thighs but no snagging or pulled material which is strange. I have a hard time recommending these pants since it holds a $106 price tag attached, and I have only owned them since March with moderate usage.

These leggings are great. I like them for lounging around and they're so incredibly soft. Seriously the fabric on these leggings are absolutely amazing. I wear these leggings probably 3 days out of the 7 day week. Good for workouts, they don't fit too loose or too tight, they also have an amazing hi rise. I am constantly wearing these. But there is two major cons with them. First if you have any kind of animal living around you, you WILL see hair all over these leggings. And they stay there. I am using my lint roller at least 3 times a day when I wear them. I always get a little dissapointed when I haven't been wearing them for that long and I see hair everywhere. So be warned about that. And the threading on the leggings can get easily snagged. If you don't mind the attraction to hair on lint, and you need a soft fabric for your leggings, I'd get these. They have a couple of cons but I do really like them a lot.

column5: Holds Up Against Sweat & Rough Activities
column6:
New favorite legging line, only disappointed that my local store doesn't carry this style! It fits true to size with a slight compression. This legging is perfect for running & lifting, I have taken these climbing as well with no pilling or tearing. I have had these for several months without any significant signs of wear. I do not recommend sizing up in these leggings, they do not fit quite as snuggly when I first purchased them.
5'5 / 165cm, 115lbs / 52kg, Size 2 fits perfectly for a bit of compression

Ordered these leggings in my normal size (size 4) and were way too tight in the waist. I wear a size 4 in the Align pants, but these pants are sized much smaller than the Aligns. Very disappointed, as I purchased these in August and received them as a present, and now I cannot return them.

column5: Great at first, ok by the end
column6: I really really loved these pants when I put them on at first. I went for a short run and then did body weight exercises. By the end of my workout the waist band had unfortunately stretched out A TON. It barely fits around the top of my waist anymore. Very disappointing for the amount of money you pay for pants and then to have them turn out like that. On a good note, I absolutely love the colour and look of the pant! Maybe I should have gotten a strict running pant?

column6: I bought these leggings with high hopes as they were my first pair of Lulu's but these were totally disappointing and fell down with every step just walking in my grocery store. I am very disappointed with these leggings and the quality.

', 'LL_response_date': 'December 24, 2018'}

column6: These are my favorite go-to for all my favorite activities - the gym, indoor rock climbing, hiking. They’re snug and fit perfectly
I love the material and fit of these leggings. The leg seams make the pant more flattering. I have them in several colors and will likely buy again.

These leggings are my favorite by Lulu! they never fall down on me when I run and retain their shape/fit and will not pill as long as you air dry them! I have two pairs and am saving up for more because no other workout leggings compare to these! very flattering and a think, non see-through material! I also find these more "forgiving" than the Aligns and Wunder Unders if you are not in perfect shape!
The best hugged fitted beautiful leggings ever! They have a very nice curvy inseam on the sides! Planning on getting more colors for sure!
i love the 25" length and that there high rise, but they slide down every step. kind of disappointed that I got them when they were final sale and cant return.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear shay31youngman,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. I\'m sorry to hear you\'re having such trouble with your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25"! I\'d love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 22, 2018'}

column6: These seem more like lounging leggings than active wear. Everlux is extremely soft but it will show everything if you aren't in the best shape. The sweat WILL show. I am constantly pulling up these leggings. It is not worth your money at all.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear champagnemoni,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". column6: Great tight, fun & snug. Love wearing them

As a student, I have been saving to get this legging in dark shadow for Christmas. When it arrived in a broken package, I didn't want to return it as it fitted me perfectly. The color was a bit lighter than the picture, but I still like it. Then I started wearing it both at home and during my yoga practice. However, I noticed that it started piling and especially along the seams. It was only my 2nd wear! I would definitely expect better quality for the money I paid :(

column6: After owning numerous pairs of lululemon pants, I was very excited to try these out. however, after maybe one or two wears, they have become very loose on me and won't stay up! I ordered the sizing i have been ordering for the past couple of years, but for some reason these seem to run differently. Definitely disappointed, they are of good material but the fit was not as expected and i can barely wear them in a casual setting, not to mention not being able to work out in them

column6: I had been considering buying these for a while based on recommendations from friends and finally pulled the trigger. I really enjoy the fit and contour of these leggings!

This fabric is just perfect for me, super soft with right amount of compression and stretch. The design complements my legs so much that I keep staring at myself :D It is so soft and stretchy that you forget you are wearing something. I have already used it twice for cardio and weight training and it stays up and in place. The waistband is comfortable and doesn't fold. It is slightly looser than the same size leggings I own in full-on luxtreme. But I wouldn't size down for that matter as it still fits me well. I have a cat and the fabric (black color) attracts some lint but it is not to the extent that shows or annoys me. I still didn't use the legging for a run as they don't have side pockets to hold my phone while running, but so far this is my new favorite legging and fabric. I wish they use this fabric on align pants too as I'd love to have this fabric in a simpler cut.
Ordered my usual size 6 and these fit like a 2! There is no give and they’re super tiny. Very disappointed!

column6: I used to love these pants, and they hugged my hips and waist so nice, but only after a couple of wears and washes they just do not fit anymore. They have stretched out so much its like one or even two sizes bigger now. They are too loose and do not look or fit nearly as good.

column6: I love everything about this pants except for it shows sweat spots around my crotch area after a workout. I have owned different colors of the same pant, same material and didn’t have any problem before. Since it is a final sale, I can’t bring it back. Not recommended.
column14: fit thick enough material and color

column6: I really love these leggings! I bought a pair in the adobe color and then got a second pair in black. I have worn them for hot yoga & orange theory. I have left both soaked, and the leggings were basically dry so I could go out and run a few errands afterwards. The waistband stays up pretty well, which is something I find an issue with in many of my workout leggings. would definitely recommend :)

These are by far my favorite Lulu leggings! They are thick enough for great coverage (not see through) and so soft. The waistband is high but not too high and they hug you in without squeezing. I own 3 pairs and they’re the only thing I wanna wear for my workouts now. I’ve done yoga, HIIT, and lifting in them.

I loved these pants at first & still love the overall fabric & design but they definitely don't keep their shape. I bought the same size I buy in all my other leggings from Lululemon but after a few wears they're so big on me! I realistically can't wear them to workout or even as casual wear because I have to keep hiking them up as the fabric starts bunching & they start sliding down. If these kept their shape they would be amazing.
column15: not true to size after a few wears

column6: This was my second pair of this pant because I loved the fit and material so much (I use these at the gym). The length and cut is very flattering and I am tempted to buy a third pair!!! The nocturnal teal color is unique and I would definitely recommend

Moves with your body. Extremely comfortable,
I love the fact that the seams are sown in such a way where it hides those unwanted areas that we would not want to show...
A little pricey tho
These leggings fit well, feel amazingly comfortable and look great.

I was really excited to try these out because I love the 7/8 length and always need leggings for spinning class. I bought them in my usual size and after a couple of wears they slide down during my workouts. Really not the greatest lulu pair of leggings I own, I usually only end up wearing them when I haven't done laundry :(
