column6: Great product and easy transaction. Shipped quickly. Definitely will purchase again!

I love these! I have a couple align pants that aren’t the greatest material that pill and get pulls a lot so I was looking for something a little more solid and reliable and so far these are amazing! They stay up during workouts and look great to just wear to class

It's so comfortable and supportive at the same time. Lines along the side make your leg look leaner and longer. I love wearing them. The material does collect dusts and hair, but it's soft and comfortable to skin and I like wearing them in winter as it's not cold to touch. The dark burgundy color I have is beautiful and not shiny. I wear 6 in most Lulu and this one fits well (5'4'' and 120lbs)
Besides the divine color these pants are so soft yet supportive (cute tush!). They stay put for my workouts. I need more!

I love these tights! They have held up to all my squatting, running, and jumping thus far. They fit great (I've tried on other Lululemon tights that are the same size and they were too tight) and I feel secure and don't have to keep tugging on them. It almost feels like I am wearing nothing! I have worn and washed them about 6 times. I always lay them flat to dry. My Christmas list now consists of mostly these pants!
So great, very comfortable and not see through at all!!!
My brother got these leggings for me for Christmas last year, and they are the comfiest leggings I own! Amazing for long flights and working out. One hundred percent going to buy more pairs.
I love the material of these pants. They have quickly become a favorite! The compression is great making them perfect for working out.

I was excited to workout in these leggings but I noticed after two washes there was many little pulls on the seams! So they have become my hangout leggings to reduce further damage!
They are extremely breathable and comfortable!
**I washed on a cold cycle, inside out, hang dry

column6: These are my favorite pants! I cycle a lot and these stay in place and are comfortable to wear all day if i wanted too. I have like 5 pairs
These are the best leggings I've purchased. They stay in place while working out and are high enough to keep the tummy tucked in :) They are so soft you barely notice you're even wearing pants.

I absolutely loved these tights when I bough them. Just the right amount of compression, the waist was the right height, they stayed put when I worked out, loved them! Two to three washings later (I always put my lulus on delicate and hang to dry), the seams have unraveled in several places. So disappointing! My daughter loved them so much, I bought her a pair for Christmas and I am hoping her pair will be better quality. A very expensive pair of leggings when they can't stand up to a few washings.

column5: Great for the first few months
column6:
I've had Lululemon pants in the past that have lasted me YEARS without much wear. I purchased these leggings a few months ago over the summer and I have already noticed the fabric pulling and fraying on the butt, where the fabric would have friction from sitting on a chair.
Pretty disappointed in the quality of these leggings because they are super comfortable otherwise! Fabric is soft and they are great for spin as I definitely feel like its breathable. I would buy more but for the price I can't have it wearing out so quickly.

column6: They are the perfect balance between being lightweight but not too thin - still have great coverage. Love that they stay put for all kinds of movement, including running.
I'm barely 5foot & the right length for me

I had spoken to an educator about wanting something that would be good for my group fitness classes. she suggested that these are pretty durable and good for high intensity classes. When I purchased them I got guidance on picking out a size and initially they fit great and held up perfect in my classes.
It has been about two months now and I'm pretty disappointed that they have already stretched out. I feel like I'm constantly pulling them up during the classes to avoid the crotch getting really low. I have followed all of the washing instructions, so I'm not sure what went wrong. Aside from them stretching out the color has not faded and they have not pilled, but the loss of shape makes them uncomfortable to wear to my classes.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear walkingmommy88,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We’re sorry to hear you're having such trouble with your pants! column6: I've only had these for about a week or two but they have quickly become my favorite lulus. They are a bit tighter fitting than others I have in the same size (wunder under, align) but their description of hugged sensation is correct as they are tight in the right places.

I loved these leggings until I had owned them for about five months. I used these leggings to train, I liked how they were not as fitted as my beloved Speed Up tights but still have more comprehension than the Aligns. However, with about five months of semi-regular use, I noticed that the side seams were just not holding up and beginning to fray. These leggings were such a great middle ground for training. But the quality of these side seams is not up to par with my other lulu leggings. Very disappointing.
Also, these tights do collect a lot of lint so be prepared! I do not own any pets so I did not mind this as much as others might.

I've been looking for a high rise pant that I did not have to pull down every second, they fit great, look great, snug fit and has pockets! They're my go to, although I've only had them for 6 months and they're starting to pill and a few seams have become undone. I still love them though.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear leil15,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We'd love to hear more of your experience with your In Movement 7/8 Tight*Everlux. Hang tight for an email coming your way!", 'LL_response_date': 'December 10, 2018'}

column6: Good quality but too expensive

Love everything about these tights! The first time I wore them was to spin and sometimes I have to tug a bit to adjust my pants but these stayed in place perfectly. The fabric is a cross between a soft Align fabric and sweat wicking that makes for the perfect combination.

column5: nice material but need to size down so they don't slip during workout
column6: Overall I do like these pants, the material is great but the sizing is off. I purchased my regular size 4 and they fit nice and snug in the store but during first workout they did loosen up a lot. I should have listened to other reviews and ordered a size down but the 2 felt snug when I tried on. I am hoping I can exchange my 4 for a 2 and then they will be perfect. I use for crossfit type workouts and the material felt thick enough they wouldn't tear but not so compressive like the luxtreme.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear LilJay,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We'd love to hear more of your experience with your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux. column6: I bought these leggings because I was talking to an educator about wanting a legging that didn't pill like the align and was more high intensity and they recommended these In Movement leggings. When I tried them on, it was love at first feel! they felt nice and silky and fit at the perfect length. The seaming was very flattering and I had to have them. Sadly, they just didn't hold up to my expectations. Within 30 minutes of wearing them, I noticed them starting to slip down and bunching at my ankles. They were the perfect 7/8 length when I first put them on. When I work out in them they fall and sag. So, they almost turn into a drop crotch. They just don't perform. No matter if I'm just walking to class or doing HIIT at the gym, they stretch out. I'm pretty disappointed, I thought they were going to be the perfect pant. So, BEWARE they stretch out, bag up, and sag in all the wrong places!

column6: These leggings are light weight and durable. They really move with your body. I would not suggest them for cardio as they don't stay in place, but wonderful for yoga!
These are the best leggings ever! I fell and cut both of my knees wearing these leggings and my leggings didn’t rip! 10/10 would recommend.
I love the way these pants fit, until I try to run & they fall down. So disappointed.

column6: LOVE love these pants! They feel so smooth. The day i got them I immediately went for a run in them to see how they would hold up. I'm always in need for good running pants that don't fall down and these did the trick! Weren't too tight but never had to adjust them once they were on. Couldn't recommend these more!

My daughter raved about how much she loves these tights, so I bought her another pair for Christmas and splurged on myself as well. I love the fit and feel of these tights, and they feel great for working out or for Pilates, or for wearing all day. I highly recommend these tights for the quality of workmanship, style, and fit.

Love these leggings for weight training and cardio. The cut and seaming is really flattering. The fabric is nice and snug and holds you in well, more so than nulux leggings.
I do wish that Lululemon would add an adjustable waistband to this style, as I always find that I need to cinch in the waist. Since it’s not adjustable I do find myself pulling these tights up when I run.

these leggings are so soft and comfortable and I am obsessed with the color! (I got them in Black Satin) I wear them all the time. just remember to read washing instructions carefully, and don't do intense workouts in them and you won't have any problems! The only thing is I'm kinda petite (5'3) so they were just a tad long & slightly loose in the ankles, so I might get them hemmed or something. But other than that, great leggings, totally recommend!

I love these, the 7/8 hits right above my ankle ( I am 5'9") and the material is cool to the touch, no piling. My only complaint...... they are not "Satin Black" not even close! They are more of a deep plum. Love them anyway. Squatproof, high on the waist
My favorite leggings by far. Feel like a second skin and are so so so flattering. They fit so well and never fall done. I want to buy them in every color!!

I like these. I live in luxtreme hi rise wunder unders so these are a nice but familiar change of pace. The fabric is nice and cooling which will be lovely in the summer. A little chilly in the winter. I hope they are durable.

My favorite style Lululemon makes! Perfect for workouts that involve lots of cardio. These don’t fall down or feel stretched out once the workout is over. I now own four pairs of the in movement 7/8 tight and I’m certain I’ll buy more!

I REALLY loved these pants when I first put them on. Great length, high waist, cute color, crazy soft... But after wearing them for an hour long workout, I looked like I peed my pants- the sweat stains were unreal. How these come from a company that makes leggings specifically to sweat in, I’m not sure.
SO, I still love the leggings, but they’ll end up being expensive wear- around leggings, instead of workout leggings, I guess.
For reference, I’m 5’11 and these were actually a few inches longer than my other 7/8 leggings.

column6: I love these pants! I use them for all kinds of workouts since the sweat dries so quickly! They are comfortable throughout the day and feel like butter on my skin!

I followed the advice on some of these reviews to order a size down and I am so glad. Even though they're very tight they are not too thin and hold everything in perfect. I can workout in them and not worry about them slipping or being see through. Love them!

First off the color was not what I expected, Black satin= Brown. When I first put these on I thought how great they felt and fit perfect besides the hideous color. After wearing them for a few hours they stretched out and were very saggy. The second time I wore them it was like they were completely different pants they lost their shape and were very saggy in the butt area and around the ankles. I got the same size as I always buy, these are my first Lululemon pants to do this, I am pretty disappointed in them.

column6: These were so soft and buttery. Fit perfectly. Sucked me in all the right places. Good length for a shortie

column5: DONT BUY ONLINE - try them one
column6:
I absolutely adore this fabric - I felt it in store and decided I needed it in my life ASAP. I then purchased a pair online. This was a mistake.
First of all - I'm a size 6. I know I'm a size 6 in pretty much every single pair of Lululemon bottoms that I own. I have 2 pairs of the In movement shorts, and 2 pairs of the leggings. One of the leggings is fine, a size 6 fits perfectly. However, the other pair is weirdly saggy in the crotch? I don't know why. I purchased both pairs at around the same time time, and I've only worn the saggy crotch pair once. It's incredibly unfortunate because the fabric is the softest thing I've ever felt, and it dries so quickly. I'm a fitness instructor and I've taught three classes today, and these have stayed dry and fresh-smelling all day (Note: I sweat A LOT)
So I have no idea why the crotch is weirdly sagging on these one pair of leggings. Maybe it's a manufacturing thing? I recommend trying them on in person to make sure your pair is a-okay.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Sosha,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your In Movement tight didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'December 6, 2018'}

column6: Not the quality I expect from lulu. The fit is nice and the fabric is soft, making them feel great for working out in, but after 2-3 wears they are absolute magnets for any dust or lint. I bought them in black, so they look really cheap and gross now and it's made me stop wearing them. It's just too much work to lint roll the entire pair to wear them. Disappointed. Maybe the lint is less obvious in colours instead of black?
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear jloves2sweat,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your In Movement tight didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'December 6, 2018'}

column6: LOVE these tights! The fabric is just amazing. They somehow fit snug, never pinch, stay put in the waist, allow full movement, AND dry super quickly. I really like how the outside feels sleek, but the inside is soft. It's really the perfect combo. I own three pairs and are tough on them and they still look new. True to size; I wear my normal 10 (5'3", 150 lbs). These are full length for me unlike some other 7/8s.

These were recommended by a friend of mine. I bought them online a week later at full price. I loved them for the first few weeks! They were so cute and the stitching on the calves gave a lot of definition. I weight lift every day, so i like the everlux and luxtreme fabrics. About 2 or 3 weeks later, my leggings were falling apart at the seams. I have already worn them and I threw away the tag and recept. I guess I'm going to have to throw these leggings away too. I was really disappointed with lululemon with these leggings. I have owned dozens of pairs and these ones are the first to fall apart :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear weights4life,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your In Movement tights didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'December 6, 2018'}

column6: These are my second-favorite leggings behind the Align. This fabric is much sturdier than the Align, and therefore, better for more intense workouts. No pilling noticed after a month of heavy use. Still light enough to get super sweaty in.

I now own two pairs of these, and they are my favourite lulu tights so far. Over the align and wunder unders (multiple fabrics).
I have felt my first pair begin to stretch a little bit after two washes, but nothing major so far and no pilling.
I have worn them for both weightlifting and hot yoga with no problems.

The color is beautiful and I like that it is high rise but that's about it... No compression or support and just too thin! Not worth it at all-- probably can't wear it since it is so thin and not appropriate for even working out.

column6: Nothing beats these on the comfort scale. Just. So. Comfortable. Don't ride down, don't squeeze you in. If you are used to compression, they may take some getting used to, but it is worth it. I have the more butt-flattering lulu leggings, but I find I always reach for these and choose the crazy comfort over the slight butt boost. They do pill, but a simple run-through with a cheap razor every few months does the trick. Also, great customer service. I bought my first pair while pregnant and was advised that they would not stretch out. They did, but I was issued a new pair because of the incorrect advice.

the length and cut of the pants were great. the fabric was pretty, but too thin. i was not comfortable in such thin tight pants...so i returned them to the store and got a pair that i was comfortable wearing

I just received these tights and absolutely loved them at first! After one wear the seams on the sides of the tights started wearing out and I already have one part where the threading is coming out. I am very disappointed as I have other leggings from Lululemon that I love, but these just did not do justice.

column6: Great fit, Great quality. Color was exactly as promised. Price was decent for this product

Favorite leggings! These have a great high rise waist bad and hug you nicely-- you don't have to worry about yanking them up all the time whether you're in the middle of teaching a class or throwing down in a metcon. These stay put! They look good, feel good, and don't stretch out! I love the 7/8 length.
column15: i can't think of anything they really are my fave

column6: I LOVED these pants when I first got them. So much so that I had to buy 3 additional pairs. Now, they have stretched out so much that it's a hassle to wear them. They shimmy their way down my body as I'm attempting to exercise, which is uncomfortable and annoying. I'm disappointed that I spent so much on leggings that had such a short lifespan.

column6: These leggings are SO comfy. They have a light bit of compression but so buttery soft that they just smooth out anything that you would need smoothed. They are like if the Align and the Fast and Free had a baby! I like the nocturnal teal color, it is more navy blue than I thought it would be but still pretty. great with whites, grays and other blues/teals. Haven't worked out in them much so I will update later but I have done light yoga and A LOT of casual wear I am for sure going to get another pair.
column15: wish there was more green to the teal

column6: So I really wanted to love these pants. I went against my better judgement and chose these instead of the HR align pants. Only because the educator was hardcore pressed for me to purchase these. She was trying to help based on me engaging in strength training as my main form of exercise. However these pants just fall right down my waist because of the lack of elasticity around that region. Im extremely unhappy with these. Plus they just collect lint like no other.

I bought these in a dark grape color about 6 months ago and I have noticed that they stretched out so much that I have to keep pulling them up which bothers me a lot. The material was not the same as the black ones I have in the same style. So disappointed! For $98, I expected more.

I purchased these leggings about 6 months ago in nocturnal teal and fell in love. They can be dressed up or down and are extremely soft. After a couple of washes (and never machine drying), the seams around the waistband and along the legs started to unravel. I don't expect 98 dollar leggings to wear this quickly, pretty disappointed.

column6: I got the nocturnal teal, and it is such a beautiful color. Dark enough to be a neutral, interesting enough to be a nice change in a workout wardrobe that is mostly black. I'm 5'6, 140lbs, athletic build, and the 6 fits perfectly. I do have to give it a tug up as the day wears on, but overall the fit is nice, snug, and flattering.

column5: Great in the beginning but stretched out:(
column6: I bought the In Movement Pant at the start of the summer and I fell in love! They were a perfect mix between the Align pant and the luon fabric (but didn't pill), and perfect for training and yoga. I loved them so much that I even bought a second pair during the black Friday sale! That evening, I wore the pair I already had to the gym and noticed that I kept pulling them up and that they stretched over my hips and crotch area. I was so disappointed I couldn't reorder the same pair because they had gone out of stock and even though I always washed them on cold/delicate and hung them to dry, they still stretched out.

column6:
I wanted to try the everlux fabric and was ECSTATIC when I saw these were in the nocturnal teal color- I’ve wanted a pair of leggings in this color for so long. The dark, vibrant green colors were what had sucked me into Lulu to begin with..
That said, they’re ok to walk around in- but not too much bc they gather dust/lint and, if you have pets, hair so badly!
They feel fragile, so they don’t encourage me to do anything too demanding in them, I did try them for cycling and they didn’t tear (though that shouldn’t even be a concern with the price of these things).
The waistband rolls down and I often find myself pulling these up even when I walk. Unfortunately I don’t see myself getting another pair. :(

I bought two of these pants about 4.5 months ago and was obsessed with the fabric, the tight fit, and how quickly they wicked sweat in my workouts. I've washed them and air dryed, kept them with like fabrics, and basically comforted them like my own children.
Recently, both of these pants have become very itchy, and started to stretch out. My size 6 now falls off my body during workouts, and I am constantly hiking them up. Additionally, they are pilling near the groin area, and are no longer comfortable but itchy on my skin.
I love these pants, but the general wear and tear leaves me questioning the durability of the fabric

column6:

However, the last two colors I have bought(olive green, the light blue ) have been disappointing.
For some reason the material is way different from when they first came out. I usually wear a size 4 and before they would loosen up after a few wears but the material was thicker and softer. Now, they are super thin, when you bend over you can see through, the seams are unraveling and they are fading after one wash! I love these pants, please fix them:(

However during my first workout I decided I never wanted to wear them again. I do a lot of high intensity workouts & lifting and with every squat the top band rolled over. I spent my whole workout pulling my pants up and unrolling the top band. So inconvenient for quick moving workouts.

They are very soft and feel so light. I have worn them with boots as well. These are my favorite leggings now and plan to order other colors as well.

column6: The fit of these leggings is amazing! The hold snug in all the right places and feel so good against my skin. I'm 5'4 and the 7/8 length is just perfect for a normal length on me without the extra material at the ankle. I only buy 7/8 length now since normal length is always too long for my height. I loved this pair so much that this was actually my second purchase in a different color. they are just as great!

these leggings are like a second skin. they arent too tight and they dont fall down off the waist like some of the others tend to. but if you just wear leggings as your everyday look, then i would definitely recommend.
Loved these leggings. I got my normal size but I feel that they were a little loose in the butt area. Still great but I recommend maybe a smaller size than normal

Hard to say how great these are limited space. Extremely comfortable lightweight high-waisted. The best for every type of training. They're comfy like my aligns but way more durable! I will get in every color. Great for everyone for any activity. Would like a version with pockets
I love them. Enough said. Using them for indoor cycling. Soft and weightless like aligns with the high performance of lux fabric. LOVE!
These are so soft, good fit, and great quality. I wear for yoga, exercise, and casual running around. Love these leggings!

These tights are a great material for someone who sweats a lot! Have worn these for a few months so far and love how dry they keep me during workouts. Also, no pilling between legs! Have worn for both running and strength training. The only downfall for me is they definitely run big (I'm assuming bc of the stretchy material?) so I should have gotten a smaller size. I'm constantly pulling them up until I get a little sweaty, and then they stay in place. Overall a good tight!

I got these leggings online not really sure how they’d work and I absolutely love them! They’re a little snug but just enough to feel like they’re keeping everything in place! They’re super soft and smooth, would definitely recommend to everyone

I wanted to love these so much! I bought them about a month ago after trying them on in store and falling in love with how comfortable they are. Unfortunately, after wearing them 5 or 6 times they have stretched out to the point that I can no longer wear them working out (i have to keep pulling them up every few minutes). Would have gotten a size smaller if I'd realized, because they are the most comfortable lulu pants I own!

I’m a little disappointed. This was my very first purchase after many friends suggesting I give lululemon a try and I don’t love them. I’ve worn them a handful of times now to workout and they seem to get looser as the workout goes by and I don’t feel like they are good for anything but lounging. column6: In theory, these would be a great pair of leggings. I love the fabric and the seams. These leggings also don’t pill. However, I am so disappointed by their inability to keep shape. I am 5’7 and athletic build and fit perfectly into a size 8 for all Lulu leggings that I own. However, these leggings started to loosen up after their first wear, and after their first wash they are barely tights. Constantly falling down my waist and thighs and are not at all flattering. They’ve become more of a hassle than anything and are very disappointing for such new tights.

column6: I loved these pants since the day I bought them! They fit great and our comfortable for any workout. I look forward to getting more!

I love these leggings, I really do. The fit and style of stitching is very flattering. However, I am disappointed at how easily sweat shows through with these. I bought them in pink (I forgot their name for the color) and thought that they would be just fine because I have other lulu leggings of the same fabric in a greyish/blue and have never had a problem with sweat showing through. I work hard in the gym and need leggings that will actually be sweat WICKING or at least "dry so fast it's like magic" as they claim in the description, but the first time I wore these, I had embarrassing lines of sweat around my crotch. Since the return policy is so strict, I can no longer return them for exchange of a different color, which is disappointing when they are so expensive. Overall, I recommend the leggings, but I would stick to black if you work hard in the gym.

column5: All Time Favorite Leggings But Stretch Over Time
column6: These used to be my favorite lulu leggings! I love how comfortable and soft they are, however, recently they have stretched out and now they keep falling off my waist throughout the day and especially if I work out in them. Very disappointed in this! The seams have also been unraveling near the crotch which worries me about their overall quality!

If you are worried about buying the align because they pill, buy these! They are still a super soft fabric and fit comfortably, without the worry that they will pill!! I have these in light grey and I love the color and they are so comfortable!! The only downside is that I am pretty short and they are a little longer than I would have liked but I really love them!!
Have been wearing them for boxing training. Love these, they keep me cool and dry super fast. Great fit, doesn't sag or slide down as I'm training.

column5: Not Very Flattering for My Body & Age
column6: Since everyone at the gym wears leggings/tights, I finally broke down and bought a pair. I always thought, I'm 58 and didn't think I had any business wearing these at my age and was I right. I'm 5'6, 128 lbs and am proud of the body I have worked so hard for but these leggings didn't do a thing for me. They were so unflattering and I felt like I was wearing thick pantyhose. I just felt they are too tight and I felt too exposed which made me feel very uncomfortable. I hope this popular trend of leggings goes out of style quickly and gets replaced with something more flattering. Most women I see in leggings look terrible, myself included!

column5: Love them except for one thing.
column6:
First, these are the only leggings I find comfortable yet supportive to run in! I run everyday, so having a pant I know will withhold a 10 mile run is a must! I bought my first pair about a month and a half ago in a size 8 (regular jean size) and they fit just like a glove. Within a few wears they stretched out to what seemed like a size 10, so I exchanged them for a size 6. Again, after a few wears they have stretched out to what seems like a size 10. I always wear a size 4 in aligns (as they say to) so I am kinda questionable about sizing down to a 4 in running pants! These pants are so big on my waist that I don't think I wouldn't have a problem getting the 4 on tbh.
I have yet to try the fast and free because these "in movement" ones, are just like thick aligns (basically perfection), yet Im thinking I might have to after having some problems.
If I were you, size down 2 SIZES. Yes this might sound crazy but trust me. It may be stiff and super tight at first, but after a few cardio sessions, they will be fine. These are the "running version" of the aligns 100% so sizing down twice wouldn't hurt.
my measurements: 5'6 / 160lbs cup: C/B pant:6some/8mos

The material is super comfortable and this fit really well. I got my regular size 4 and have been fine the first couple time wearing them. I read reviews about them stretching out but i feel like every single lululemon tight does stretch out therefore thats why you always go a size down...it's supposed to be very tight at first. They do collect dust/etc but that is just like any other tight this material. If you want something that feels between the luxtreme and align I suggest these.

column5: Love the feel.. but stretch out
column6: I have many lulu pants and have never experienced any of them stretching out as much as these have in the first hour of having them on. These have stretched out in the butt and knees. I took my normal size 4 and now regret not sizing down although they are tight around my waist. I have a muscular bottom half and smaller waist.. so this is opposite of normal issues. I will give three stars to the feeling of the fabric on my skin though as it is very soft and comfortable. Disappointed in these and wish I would not have wasted the money...

column5: I thought these were amazing!... Until..
column6: I bought a pair in September (Garnet) after months of debating between pairs. My Lulu leggings purchases over the last 3 years have all been of styles with mesh panelling and tbh I haven't paid attention to which styles they are but they've been amazing. This pair in the store felt the most similar. The garnet pair was really great & met all expectations, I enjoyed them so much I bought another pair in Nocturnal Teal. These have been a HUGE letdown, they feel like a completely different style, I had to double check the tag after wearing them for a day. They collect fuzz like no other, which the garnet pair didn't do and the material feels less smooth. AND I've worn these 3 times now (only once to work out) and the thread has come loose at the front pocket!! For consistency issues alone, don't buy these online! I'm really upset that I can't really wear the gym unless I want to be covered in floor dust

I love these leggings , they are so soft and hug all the right places .

I got these leggings a couple months ago and they are honestly the best pair of lulu leggings I own (and I have a lot ) I'm getting my second pair soon! They are such good leggings to workout in but also wear for casual purposes. LOVE LOVE LOVE!
- I wish lulu would make these leggings in patterns and more colors

I love lulu (always) and this is not a testimate to all of their leggings that I keep in my rotation - however these leggings provide no support. They are loose in various parts of the leg and are nowhere near 7/8th. I rolled them and hoped for the best at the gym but they were a sweaty mess. column6:
As someone who loves and owns nearly every color the in movement pants come in, I never understood the people who commented on how their pants kept pilling. The material on the pants I received in the past were not the type to pill, but I understood the comments once I received the pants in the color Nocturnal Teal. As soon as I put it on, I knew the material was different. It was slightly stiffer than usual, and the fabric itself didn't have the usual smooth feel. I'm sure it's not all the nocturnal teal color pants that is made from this stiff material but just several unlucky batches for the other colors as well. I'm honestly quite disappointed that Lululemon is not consistent with the fabric they use, and I will definitely be returning the pants I received.
As a side note: I've noticed that the sizing on Lululemon pants slightly vary and are not consistent as well. I wear a 4 in the in movement pants, and some fit quite snug while others need to be pulled up every once in a while.

Every particle from your surroundings clings to them, making it uncomfortable to be out in public when constantly worrying about what is attached to your leggings. column6: I absolutely love the In Movement leggings! The material is awesome, with a very subtle sheen to it. I love these so much that I have them in several different colors!
These pants are awesome. Definitely worth every penny. Might have a problem wearing anything else due to the amazing comfort level.

Recently purchased these pants and love them so much already!! The fit is so flattering and I love the detailed seams. The sales associate told me that they're not the best for everyday wear so I plan to wear them mostly to hot yoga & barre which is perfect as they're sweat-wicking. Only small issue with the pants is that the seam seems to be coming undone in one section after one wear, and they are a magnet for fluff/dust (so you just need to keep a lint roller handy), other than that they're awesome!

literally the best material ever. It's so breathable, but also fits your figure perfectly. I am 123 lbs, 5' 8", and wear size 4...I would wear pants size 0-2 anywhere else, but size 4 is what I go by for lululemon because they always run small.

column5: FINALLY PANTS THAT STAY UP please restock dark shadow!!
column6:
I am so happy that these pants actually stay up. My only complaint is that the fabric is shiny... Almost sheer. When I bend over I am concerned someone can see through. I could see the tag easily bending over, so I took it out. I know if someone Is really looking they will see through. I tried a size up but it slides down.
But I will honestly deal with it because the wunder under is a horrendous fit on me, slides down like crazy.
Also disappointed as I want to purchase in dark shadow, but my size Is NEVER in stock. It seems only sizes 10 and 12 are restocked. Lulu please restock !! and more colours please... everlux pants are already less available than other styles. It would be nice to see some of the align pant colours in the in movement pant.

From the moment I tried these leggings on, I thought they were going to be my favorite pair, however I am sadly disappointed with this purchase. The main reason I buy LuLu gear is for the compression fabric but these leggings stretched out after just one wear :( They’re also a bit long for 7/8 so I had to get them hemmed (twice) which is odd since I’m 5’6” and I can only pull them up so far. The fabric is very soft and super comfortable but it holds on to every piece of lint.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear LuluLil,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your In Movement tights didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'November 4, 2018'}

column6: I bought these leggings and they fit perfect at first. After wearing them only once they stretched out so much. I have to constantly pull them up and I can no longer wear them because they do not fit at all. I am super disappointed.

I purchased these a week ago after wanting the Align pant but was warned by a lulu employee upon purchasing that they would definitely pill. I was recommended to get these instead. I am so happy I did! They are a little bit hardier than the Align but still so soft! The lines on the fabric are so attractive and they look and feel great. Although I haven't washed them yet, I highly recommend!

column5: Good at first, but then too roomy
column6: I bought these pants directly online by choosing my usual size (size 6). They are super comfortable and soft. I really like the high rise! At first the sizing was good, but then they stretched after only a couple of work out. Now, the are loose and because they are so soft, they slip very easily.. I really like them, but now I only wear them as normal legging during the day...
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Lotus1995,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your In Movement tight didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'November 4, 2018'}

column6: I have every single different lululemon tights... THESE ARE THE BEST. They are best of all worlds... You get the feeling of the align, and comfort and tummy control of the wunder under and the beautiful and flattering stitch work. These are a must. I will be purchasing in every color!

Fabric of these leggings feels amazing! Soft like aligns, but not too delicate which is awesome! They fit true to size and are very opaque. My only complaint about them is after about a week of wearing, the threads around the waist and bum started to unravel is too bad because i love these pants so much, but with the unravelling of threads, im too scared to wear them in fear that they will rip even more.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear FerreroRocher,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your In Movement tights didn't work out for you. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre at 1.877.263.9300 or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon.", 'LL_response_date': 'November 1, 2018'}

column6: I am in love with these pants. They are so soft and wick sweat better than any other pant I have bought before. I cross train between strength training and HITT training as well as needed a solid pant/yoga tight that I could also use for ballet class. These pants work for all my activity and I love them.

I first bought these pants in store and I was in love!! The color was beautiful and nothing like the other lulu pants I own. I tried on my usual size and it fit nice, and how all my other ones do. However, after 1 wear to the gym I noticed they had stretched out a lot. The legs and butt are now baggy and very unflattering, I have to constantly pull up the waist and they aren't worth it. I have never had a pair of lulu pants stretch this much, I am very disappointed.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Worker,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your tights didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'November 1, 2018'}

column6: I have 3 colors of these pants. They are soft and velvet. I can put on it in every activities. Love ^^

column5: The best all around gym leggings!
column6:
I have these in 3 colours now. They are not compression, but still manage to hold it all in. The high rise is awesome and I don't find myself pulling them up at all. They stay in place!
I haven't noticed any pilling or seams coming apart and I wear them weekly - the oldest pair being used regularly for 6 months now.
I've used them to run in, bootcamp-style classes (including push-ups on my knees), and weights and they have stood up to it all.

column5: Turned out disappointing in the end
column6: Initially was so excited about this pair!! I tried several pairs in store and this material was the most comfortable, and since the shop assistant told me that this was suitable for all activity types I bought both the 7/8 as well as the crop. They were great at first, but after one wash started to pile especially at the crotch. The waistband was also initially tight, but after a couple of washes started to fall down which is really distracting during a HIIT workout. Disappointed given the price of these pants
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey quekyh,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 31, 2018'}

column6: Love the feel of these pants! They are soft, but yet they still hold you in.

I got these pants a couple months ago in a dark plum color. They felt great and fit well, but after about a month the seams on the inside of the pant started to unravel. I am very disappointed in the quality of these leggings. They couldn't even hold up for a month :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey runner100,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear the seams of your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" are not lasting. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 30, 2018'}

column6: These are the greatest pants! They stay put, I didn't have to pull them up once. I have never felt so comfy in a pair of lululemon pants, I will definitely be buying more!!

I love the in movement tights. So much so, that I have almost bought every color.
However, I have noticed and feel like the last two I bought in the olive green and the burgundy seem to be thinner material and tighter fitting. I’m not loving them as much as I did previously. I just feel like the fabric was thicker, softer and stretchier before.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey kristieA,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 30, 2018'}

column6: Incredibly flattering, perfect fit - no falling down, no transparency. These are my new favorites!
I love all Lulu stuff and these pants are more than worth the price tag!

column5: Great until you wear them in day to day life!
column6: I recently purchased these leggings at my local Lululemon and I thought I loved them. The fit was great, the length was perfect, and everything was super comfortable. I got home & removed the tags and wore them for the first time. Within an hour I was full of lint. These leggings grab onto everything! They looked like a mess! The only way to wear these without looking silly is to use a lint roller every five minutes! None of my other Lulu leggings do this & I am very disappointed as I am not sure I can even wear them anymore because I hate having lint all over and looking like a mess. Don't buy these and instead opt for one of the other fabrics that does not cling to everything in sight. Disappointed that a $100 pair of leggings would do this :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Syd2,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience with the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" and would love to discuss this further. Hang tight for an email coming your way! Chat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'October 29, 2018'}

column6: I love the fit of these leggings and they don't loose stretch. However, some of the seems are coming apart. I'm not sure why because I take great care of them and only wash them with other leggings and let them air dry.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear LaurynS,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We want your gear to support your sweatiest pursuits, but it sounds this isn’t the case for you. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 29, 2018'}

column6: I genuinely was very excited to get this pair of leggings considering I was having so many problems with the aligns. I wore them once and the stitching was coming apart on the bum area. Now It just looks like there are loose stitching areas and loose threads every where.

column6: Great fit. TTS... fabric is butter soft. I’ve worn them at 85 degrees And 54 degrees, was cool when needed and warm as needed. Great weight and I love the bark color.

I fell in love with these leggings in the store. But as soon as i started working out in them they stretched out everywhere! I've only worked out twice in them and have noticed a significant sloppiness in the look of them. So sad!!

column5: Was really impressed at first but one wash in the laundry and they are ruined
column6: Loved the fit of these pants at first, don't stretch at all after wear, which I love. But I put them through the wash on a delicate cycle and hung to dry. I put them on and realized 3 different seams had come undone as well as some pilling.
column14: hold shape after a days wear don't bag out

column6: I thought I'd found a new favourite and loved the feel of these for the first wear. Unfortunately, the shape was not retained and I was very dissatisfied with the performance of this pant in yoga and spin class. Disappointed with this purchase.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey edub,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear the In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" has not held its shape. column5: Tight at first but really nice
column6: I got these because my align pants pilled, these are pretty similar but don't have any pilling. they are tight at first but they definitely stretch out quickly. Overall I'm happy I bought these pants!
Dissappointed with the color of the red bronze, looks so much lighter online and it is actually very dark color

These were my first pair of Lululemon leggings and I was beyond excited! I went to the store and spent over an hour with the specialist picking out the perfect pair for my workout style. I told them I love pilates, P90x classes, and so many other group classes at my gym and they picked out these, which they felt were exactly what I was looking for. When I tried them on in stores they were the comfiest, stretchiest leggings I had ever tried and I was instantly in love! The first day of wearing them I went to the gym and did a pilates class. As many of you know pilates uses a lot of floor exercises and body weight. When I got home I was disgusted by how much lent, dust, and who knows what was ALL over my pants. Any time I wear these pants I have to bring a lint roller with me to clean my pants after driving, working out, or just lounging on the couch. I no longer wear these pants due to the work and effort needed to make them look like you didn't just clean the floor with them. I was so disappointed by my first of leggings I have yet to buy another pair.
column14: feels like a second skin! sucks everything in.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey kcmovegan,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix. We\'re eager to work out a resolution, so I\'m sending you an email to chat more.', 'LL_response_date': 'October 23, 2018'}

column6: I like these. They are a good fit, very soft and comfortable. As in you almost forget you're wearing them. I thought they would be more compression-like and form hugging than they are, which is why I give 4 stars rather than 5. I will still keep them and wear them often. Good buy, I do recommend.
These are my favorite! I had the crop and bought pants for winter! They fit great and the fabric is wonderful also.

I have several pairs of Lululemons I bought a few years ago that I love. I’ve heard rumors that the quality as gone somewhat south but I gave them the benefit of the doubt . I decided to buy two pairs of pants. I really liked these at first but they collect absolutely everything and with two dogs i run with I’m constantly having to roll them off. So if you have any animals that remotely shed this particular product is not a good purchase. In addition to the fact that after I washed them the first time and laid them out to dry they had little balls of fuzz all over them that I had to pick off one by one.
They also seem to really stretch out after wearing them all day. For the price They have become, they should be really amazing. I’m not that impressed with these.

column5: LOVED until working out in them
column6: So when I first tried these on in the store, I was instantly sold. They are by far the comfiest and smoothest leggings I have ever put on! However, the first time I wore these on a run, I spent my whole run pulling the pants as they slid down my waist and legs. When I wore them again to cycling, I had the same issue with the waistband rolling and sliding around. I am so bummed because I absolutely love the look and feel of these leggings. But when it comes to working out in them, keeping the leggings on and adjusted well is all I can think about.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Emilyeb,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your In Movement Tights didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'October 21, 2018'}

column6: The first time i wore these leggings i thought they were the BEST pair i have ever tried on. I was so excited to return and get other colours but after one wear and one wash (following directions) they have piled like crazy. I have a bunch of friends that have these leggings who don't experience the same issue so maybe mine were faulty? Either way, disappointed in this purchase...
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Brianna18,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your In Movement Tights didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'October 21, 2018'}

column6:
Okkk - so I love the Align pant, but I figured I'd try something new (but similar)!
I loved these - the fabric, seam design, flattering fit - BUT the first time I wore them I noticed that the stitching between the legs is off centered/curves to the left, causing extra fabric on the right side and bunching beneath the right cheek. These are just as awesome to me (look and feel) as the Align. Unfortunately the pair I got I can't and won't work out or wear anymore because it's just too uncomfortable and distracting :( . Not sure if I just got an off pair, so maybe just go try them on in store!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear LisBen,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your item didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'October 21, 2018'}

column6: The first time I wore these I was convinced they were the best pair of pants I have purchased from Lululemon. They stayed up and we're very comfortable. I followed the washing instructions and they haven't been the same. The waist band rolls down really easily and they don't stay up as well at the gym.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Nelizabeth89,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your item didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'October 21, 2018'}

column6: I really like them - but I think they need a drawstring waist. They fit really well in my usual size, but sometimes they feel like they're falling a bit. I'd love to be able to pull an elastic ever so slighty to help them stay up. The fabric is a huge win though, and the seams are really flattering.

column5: Comfiest legging but they pill like crazy.
column6: I absolutely adore these leggings but after going through all the washing and drying instructions, they still pilled. They are so comfortable but now they have pilled and it is very noticeable.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi gdaley,\n\nWe're sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We look forward to hearing from you.", 'LL_response_date': 'October 20, 2018'}

column6: These are by far my absolute favorite lululemon leggings. They are comfortable, high waisted, and holds up well in the wash. I have difficulty trying other styles because these are just perfect. I am 5’ 5” 100lbs and wear a size 4 for reference.
These fit like great Lululemon leggings, but the color is just beautiful, rich and not black! Thank goodness
These are the softest pants I own. Love the comfort.

column5: Great pair, few gripes -- nevertheless... great pair
column6: I have two pairs of In Movements and they're pretty much my go to. I did have a problem with one pair unravelling at the butt but Lululemon was quick to fix that issue for me. I love these pants because they're great for lifting. They're completely opaque and you definitely cannot see through them... HUGE PLUS. My only gripe is that these 7/8 are quite long on me and I'm 5'10", which is fine by me but just a warning. These do tend to run a little big and are EXTREMELY high waisted. (Again, I'm 5'10" and these go all the way up to my "under boob"). They do slip down a little and especially on the thighs. Overall, I do love these pants and would recommend them to my friends.

I tried these on at the store and they were tight like the title but when I tried a size up it was too loose so I got the size down. The butt did not wrinkle nor was baggy when I walked when I tried it on so I thought they fit perfectly. However, within the first half hour of wearing them, it already stretched out in the butt area, there was extra room and it wrinkled badly when I walked. Disappointing since I love my other lulu styles I bought and these were definitely not worth the money. Would not recommend.
column15: easily stretches out in the butt
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Once123,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 17, 2018'}

column6:
I originally purchased these pants to replace my Wunder Unders, which were falling apart at the seams and collecting dust like crazy. After literally 10 minutes of wear, I can see that these pants are no different. Everyone complains about the pilling from Lululemon, but to me, the dust/lint collecting is a bigger issue. It makes the pants look old after one wear. For what these leggings cost, I expected so much more.
I can also see why people say they can't stop pulling them up. It's because the crotch/bum area is made for very long torsos, so the crotch ends up sitting low on the average woman (I'm 5'7 and the crotch was low on me - I also sized down per reviews). They also fit strangely, compressing your bum, which make them look unflattering.
I am really sad to see the quality of Lulu leggings go downhill. I have several Lulu pieces from nearly 10 years ago that look almost brand new, including leggings, but all of the purchases I've made in the last 3-4 years have not held up the same way. I am so sad to have to return these leggings. While Lulu makes great sweaters and other pieces, I would say you can find better quality leggings for cheaper elsewhere. It's not worth the headache anymore.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear lulureview12345,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience with the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" and would love to discuss this further. We\'d love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 18, 2018'}

column6: feels hugged but still really comfy, I got 3 different color and waiting for the red ruby to come back!

column5: Ankles were baggy and material was meh
column6: I usually love my tights I get from lululemon and I wanted these to work so badly!! But this time I struck out. The material was not what I expected for the price, It felt like when I ran my hand down the fabric it would get caught/feel itchy which usually happens with cheap tights. And the bottom of the tights were weirdly baggy. I have skinny-ish lower legs which is why I buy 7/8 length and never had a problem with this before. So if you have smaller lower legs, do not get these tights unless you want an uncomfortable amount of fabric at the bottom. I returned my purchase.

column5: Soft material, but pilled very quickly
column6: My friend recommended these tights and when I tried them on in the small store we have in town, I loved them, so I bought them. But after one workout they already pilled between the legs, and were starting to get too loose in the waist area, even after sizing down. After the second workout they were very loose and the pilling was very bad.

column6: I bought these pants, and absolutely loved them! The first couple wears were great! By the 4th wear they would not stay up, I would roll the waist band and they would still sag. Very disappointed in these pants.

I love these tights! I rarely write a review but I bought these tights a week ago and have wanted to wear them almost everyday. I teach yoga 10X a week but work out 5X week and these tights will work with both. Love em. I wear a size 4 and they fit perfectly.

I've loved lululemon leggings for the longest time, and I usually wear a 4. I saw that reviews for this said to size down, so I got a 2. While that felt like a better fit initially, after a single day of wearing these (and one workout), it already feels weird and loose. They're comfortable for wearing at home, but no longer seems like a good fit for the gym or leaving the house. I'm disappointed.

column6: Ce legging est très esthétique et épouse les formes parfaitement. Par contre, j'ai été déçue de constater qu'il faisait des mousses dès la seconde utilisation. Au prix vendu, on pourrait s'attendre à mieux.

Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 12, 2018'}

column5: Size down, and you'll LOVE EM
column6: Glad I read the reviews - I sized down. I'm a size 4 in 95% of lulu, but I ordered both 4 and 2. My typical size 4 was too big, and the waistband would have slid down. The 2 is perfect, and offers great compression at the gym. They don't budge during either cardio, weight training, or yoga. I got the deep red/brown color (black satin), and it's GORGEOUS. I have been patiently waiting for a deep brown color for years.

these pants will stretch a half size on your first wear, so please don't make the mistake I did and go down a size. they might feel uncomfortable in the store, but trust - you will be thankful you did.

I am 5'5" and weight 145lbs. I wear a 6 in most pants. These fit perfectly in store and felt like second skin. After a few hours of wearing them they feel too big and I keep pulling them up on my waist and legs. I wish I had gotten a size 4. Total bummer!

column5: They pilled immediately and won't stay up.
column6: I was excited about these pants, but unfortunately they are not holding up. I have washed them twice and air dried both times, pills on the outside seams???? I'm not very happy with these pants as they also don't stay up, I bought these pants to wear to the gym and keeping on tugging on pants is such a drag. The fabric is sweat wicking and I like the length but unfortunately they are just not holding up to what I expected them to be.
