column6: The bad reviews were a bit discouraging, but don't be fooled, these leggings are amazing. They're the perfect length, no need to cuff for less length (I'm 5'8"/160 pounds and sometimes I get discouraged with leggings that are too short or too long). I wear a size 8 in these. I wear them day in and day out, they're definitely my go-to leggings! They're high wasted and fitted and super comfortable. They're great for yoga, running, hiking or just relaxing. I highly recommend. I can't wait to buy another pair!

I got these leggings as a gift for my birthday and wore them to a cycling class. After one cycling class, I noticed that there was a small hole on them. They are not too tight either, they are very fitted on me which upsets me because I started to love them. I am just upset that there is a hole on them for how expensive they are.

Absolutely loved these tights in the beginning and about a month or two into having them they're absolutely huge. I do like the material and how they didn't pill like others but I think I'd need to size down to get them to last. Disappointed and I wouldn't recommend for the price.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey GreatD13,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear the In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" have not held their shape. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 8, 2018'}

column6: I usually buy the high waist wunder unders but decided to switch it up. I love these pants! They are the perfect length and stay put whether I am practicing or teaching. I have a few pair of the align leggings which feel great but always roll down from the waist while I am practicing yoga. Not a problem with these pants.

I bought these leggings a week ago and have worked out in them four times this week. They have definitely stretched out - I find myself always having to pull them up (which is really annoying to do when working out).
It's such a shame because they fit perfectly when I tried them on in the store. This is actually my first pair of Lululemon leggings and I don't think I'd purchase another pair.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey MOGIRL,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear the In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" have not retained their shape. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 8, 2018'}

column5: yes, It fits like a second skin
column6:
I love this fabrics! not thick and soft. It feel comfortable and is great for my sweaty time.
good length for petite. I'm 5"3 and it stays around ankles.

As we've all noticed Lulu products have gone downhill and continue to. I bought 2 pairs of these - 1 for me (5'8" 130lbs) and 1 for my daughter (5'7" 115lbs). As mentioned in other reviews, they lasted about 3 wears before turning into a saggy mess after 10min of wearing. True for both me and my daughter.
I've been wearing lulu for 10+years and these last 3 years quality has just deteriorated along with their yoga pants.
I have 2 lulu yoga pants from 2011 that are Still holding up and look great. Tank tops and jackets still hold up as neither stretch much when wearing. Over it.
These pants stay put for strenuous work outs!! No adjustments needed. Definitely recommend for all work outs. I’m 5’6” 120 size 4 is what I wear in all pants and these are TTS.

I used to be a die hard align fan, until I put this legging on. Same feeling as align, with some added stitching. These tights feel like they have more support than aligns, if that makes sense. So comfortable and my new go to!

I always have lululemon clothes for the dance, the yoga class, biking, alllll day ! I always had a really really great experience with the fit and material. Sadly this time I didn't had a really good experience. I bought them at the beginning of the summer and they already aren't tight as when I bought them. The other thing is that, there's a spot on the fabrics that is discolored. I wash it again to be sure its not simply dirty. But the discoloration increased. I'm not sure if it can be something under the warranty?
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Magalie,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. We\'ll be following up via email to discuss this further. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 5, 2018'}

column6: I loved these from the minute I put these on. I've never put on a pair of leggings this soft and comfortable.

I ordered a pair online, wore them once and instantly went and purchased a second pair in another color. The fit was great, flattering and comfortable, however, that was short lived. Now, after a couple of washes (and hang dry) they don't even stay up! They didn't hold their shape at all and I find myself constantly pulling up the legs and waist - even when not working out. I have other Lulu pants in the same size that still fit great after several washes. Disappointing that these lost their shape and stretched out so quickly, especially after spending the money on 2 of them.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey tallandawkward,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. I’m sorry to see you’re having some trouble with your gear—that's definitely disappointing. Please be on the lookout for an email headed your way. It'll detail the next steps to take to resolve this.", 'LL_response_date': 'October 4, 2018'}

column5: Very Flattering - For a couple of minutes
column6: These leggings were amazing when I bought them. They are extremely flattering and smoothing, and they look great on. Until you wear them more than once. I hand wash them in cold water and lay them flat to dry, but after wearing them once they just slip all the way down my body. After 15 minutes of walking around they'll slip from my waist to BELOW my hips. Very disappointing, because I loved the way they looked on me.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey seekerofcomfort,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear the In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" is not retaining its shape. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 3, 2018'}

column6:
I have never previously owned a pair of lulu lemon leggings until a pop up store had opened up near my area. I was excited to try them out after hearing so much about them. After having them for less than two weeks I'm sad to say they already have holes on the legs. I have hand washed them separate with cold water and laid them out to dry to maintain the quality of the fabric, but I was sitting on a chair on campus that had rough padded seats but nothing out of the ordinary, only to find holes and snags on the back of my new leggings :(
At $98/ per legging I had hoped they would have lasted longer.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey ShoppingAddict123,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I am sorry your In Movement Tight is not performing as you hoped it would be. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 2, 2018'}

column5: Beware: these leggings stretch out badly.
column6: I bought these leggings to wear this fall. I loved them immediately after trying them on. I ordered a size 4 which I wear in my In Movement cropped leggings. After wearing these leggings for a few hours they started stretching out so badly that I had to go home and change out of them. The waist is falling down, the butt and upper leg is not tight at all and the bottoms are loose and bunch up badly. They look horrible and are now too lose to wear unless I want to pull them up constantly. I was wearing them to run errands, nothing high impact or intense. These leggings are a HUGE disappointment and for the price of them they should not be stretching out this badly. I was told in the store that it was my problem and they could not help me because the sales tag was not attached to them (obviously not since I had worn them out - most ppl remove a big sales tag before wearing something). Save yourself the hassle, the money and the disappointment and skip over these leggings.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey WorkHardAlways,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I am sorry your In Movement Tight is not performing for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 2, 2018'}

column6:
I have done A LOT of research on quality leggings before I purchased any because I wanted to get a pair that were comfortable, durable & would last a long time! After narrowing down the best legging brands to 5 companies, I ended up choosing in-movement by Lululemon!
I'm not sure what's not to love. They are incredibly comfortable & I love the thick (& high) waistband! The only reason I almost didn't purchase them is because I wanted leggings that could hold my phone - only to find out that THESE DO. They have a pocket in the back that can easily hold my iphone 7 (it's a fairly large phone!), which I love.
The only thing I would note about these pants is that you may want to size down. I've been wearing them non-stop for a few days & they are starting to be just a tiny bit loose, but this issue is easily fixed if you size down. Easy peasy. These pants are still amazing (even if you don't choose to size down) & are exactly what I was looking for.
Love these pants & this Canadian company!

I loved the color of these and the feel but that is about it. I have a lot of lulu pants and I specifically buy 7/8 pants because I’m short and they hit at the ankle. These were terrible. I wore them one time and had to pull them up non stop. I have never had that problem with any other pant. They also seemed to be bigger at the bottom of the pant so they did not fit snug at my ankle like my other 7/8 pants so they look terrible. Overall, these were definitely not a pant I would recommend. So sad I wasted my money on these.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi JennaG,\nThanks for taking the time to write a review. I'm sorry to hear that your gear hasn't turned out as expected. We'd love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way.", 'LL_response_date': 'October 1, 2018'}

column6:
You guys... these pants are the holy grail of all lulu leggings!
They are buttery soft like the aligns, but offer more support and forgiveness similar to wunder unders.
I have literally worn these pants for everything - running, lifting weights, hot yoga, kayaking, hiking, chilling - and they hold up to every test with flying colors!
I have them in 'evergreen' and they pass the squat test.
They stay in place, wick sweat, are quick drying, and perfectly breathable for hot yoga (these are my new go-tos for hot classes!).
They have not lost any shape, regardless of which strenuous activity I put them through.
It was recommended that I size down for these pants - I got my usual align size and they fit like a dream!

These leggings are great! I find they provide some compression, so when I first put them on I was a little bit like "oh no" but they fit PERFECTLY! Got them in black and I have pets, so you can see some hair but just swiping it off gets it right off. Would not say it's an issue. Only thing is that I wish the waistband was more gentle on my tummy like the align's, but otherwise, perfect for cardio and for everyday wear!!!
These are my absolute favorite Lulu legging.
These are my favorite lululemon pants so far! They're so comfy!

I bought these last month, and I am so disappointed. I got black and they collect lint/hair like crazy (I've never had lulu's do that before) and they aren't holding their shape which is quite annoying while teaching a fitness class (again, never had this happen before). I have tons of other lululemon leggings and love them all, but these are a definite miss.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Kredgwell,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I am sorry your In Movement Pant is not performing as you hoped it would be. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 2, 2018'}

column6: Could not recommend these more. The fit is perfect and the fabric is so soft and comfortable. I have washed them many times and have never had any problems. Will be buying more pairs in the future!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey LisBen,\n\nWe're sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. Please be sure to give us a call at our Guest Education Centre on 1.877.263.9300 or you can always start a Live Chat with us on our website. We look forward to hearing from you.", 'LL_response_date': 'October 4, 2018'}

column6: They were very cute and comfy however I would probably size down! They were a little big when I put them on and then they stretched out throughout the day. I have never had lulus stretch out before which is why I gave It 3 stars.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Talia70,\nThanks for taking the time to connect. I'm sorry to hear you're having such trouble with your pants! I'd love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. We'll be following up via email to discuss this further. Speak soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'October 1, 2018'}

column6:
These are my first lululemon leggings and I wanted to love them so badly. My sister has several pairs of lululemon's and loves them so I was so excited to get these!
They are super cute on and very flattering. Unfortunately they became loose almost immediately, I have washed them twice both times in cold water, gentle cycle, and I did not put them in the dryer. The first couple of days they were the perfect fit, I actually had help choosing a size from several lululemon employees and we picked the smallest size I fit into. However, now I am constantly pulling them up when I wear them which is so annoying. For the amount of money I spent I would have liked to see better quality.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi samwilde11,\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. It sounds like you know how to take care of your gear, so this shouldn't be happening. Watch out for an email coming your way soon.", 'LL_response_date': 'October 1, 2018'}

column5: Fabric is great, pants are not!
column6: The Everlux fabric is amazing, but these pants need improvement. The waistband is terrible. The seam hits at an awkward place across the lower stomach. They would be so much better if they had a flat, seamless waistband like the Aligns and the Wunder Unders.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Thanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us.\n\nWe\'d love to hear more of your experience with your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". I\'m going to follow this up with an email that outlines how to move towards a resolution.', 'LL_response_date': 'September 28, 2018'}

column5: not the same caliber as other Lulu bottoms of mine
column6: loved the soft feeling of these and was so excited to wear. When I ddi they stretched out ~ 2 sizes in hot yoga. The side seam also ripping out after 2 washes no dryer.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey RAD88,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear the fabric of your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" has not held up for you. We stand behind our gear and want it to perform for you. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'September 27, 2018'}

column6: J'ai acheté ma première paire il y a un an, et j'ai dû la porter pour faire des wod de crossfit, de l'haltérophilie et de la gymnastique, au moins 150 fois. Sans exagérer. Ils sont encore pratiquement comme neufs. La forme est toujours restée intacte, et le soutient parfait. Je les ai même déjà mis par mégarde dans un lavage à l'eau chaude, et rien n'y paraît. Je regarde constamment si vous allez refaire des quantités de grandeur 4 dans le bleu marine car je rêve d'une paire de cette couleur! Merci pour ces vêtements de grande qualité. Ça paraît dispendieux sur le coup, mais je ne regrette aucun dollar dépensé car la qualité est au rendez-vous!

The in-movement and align leggings are my go-tos for hot yoga. I like the everlux fabric because it is thicker than the align fabric so they are a little more forgiving. These leggings are SO comfy and the material keeps you cool in class. One wish for these leggings is that they begin making them with the built in side pockets, like the speed up tight. I did not rate 5 stars because I follow the washing instructions exactly and the threading has begun to unravel, which I am not happy about.

AMAZING! I am in love with these pants!! I usually don't like pants with a seam across the top of the butt, but these are an exception. I m not sure if the fabric is loose or if I lost weight or what the reason was but I originally bought a 6, they got loose after a couple wears and I just purchased a size 4 and they're amazing. They look fabulous on anyone and they feel great, I think its the Everlux fabric that I love so much. The 7/8 length is perfect so they don't bunch up and they aren't a crop. Besides the material and recommending sizing down, there is nothing bad to say about these pants. Wonder Under, Align, and these In Movement are by far my top 3 pairs from Lululemon
These leggings are nothing short of amazing!! They fit so well I had to tell everyone about them! They are true to size and fit perfect in length

I'm curvy hot yoga addict and these pants are unreal. They hold you in and the pant doesn't roll down in between poses. They are so thin it feels like you're not wearing anything. I got them in blush but I want them in black!

column5: Suitable for gym & everyday athleisure wear
column6:
I've had this pair of leggings since April 2018 but didn't get around to writing a review until now! These leggings are fantastic for everyday wear and athletics as well. The fabric is very high quality and provides excellent breathability for me and I'm considering buying a second pair:
PROS; durable, breathable. Fabric has not snagged on anything and is very high quality compared to other items in my closet. Design and stitching of seams is fashionable and pocket on the back is very handy for tucking away my phone during workouts. Washes well if instructions are followed for specified fabric.
CONS; does stretch out over time; waist elastic isn't as snug after several months of wear but is still good enough for my high-impact training sessions. I've noticed minimal pilling right on the inner thighs where the seam meets, but it is not obvious or dealbreaking.
Overall, this piece holds up well over time despite the cons listed above — certainly met and surpassed my expectations!

column5: Great leggings but collects lots of lint and dust
column6: These are great leggings but it collects dust and lint. After going into the wash once, the seams starts piling and makes the whole pant look bad.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey lululemon09,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" is experiencing pilling. We stand behind our product and would love to sort this out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'September 23, 2018'}

column6: I sooo wanted to love these, the fit and feel is amazing and I love the high rise and seam details. I got them in my regular size in a beautiful pink blush color BUT if you sweat even the littlest bit it shows right through!!!I imagine the dark colors are fine but I am sad to not be able to wear these for workouts :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi littlemagic,\n\nThanks for following up with us regarding your In Movement 7/8 Tights. We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. Hang tight for an email coming your way! Chat soon.", 'LL_response_date': 'September 21, 2018'}

column6: I absolutely love these leggings! I was a little hesitant to order them because I have always bought the Wunder Under leggings. These are my new favorite. They aren’t see through, they stay up when running and lifting, and feel amazing.

column5: Love at first sight, but after one wash looks 100 years old
column6:
I am unbelievably disappointed about these pants. I fell in love with them at the store after an employee suggested them for my hot yoga classes. I usually dislike the way I look in leggings and do not feel confident walking around wearing them, but these ones make me feel hugged in all the right places and I absolutely loved wearing them to my hot yoga. HOWEVER... I washed them inside out in a cold cycle with ONLY other lululemon clothes (with same cleaning instructions), cleaned with soap nuts (so very gentle natural soap) and hung it up to dry. Once I turned it back inside in, some of the seams were frayed and coming out and a bit of pilling had started on top of them. I cannot believe I paid this ridiculously high price (125$ with tax) for something that doesn't look high quality after only one wash. It's so annoying because I LOVE these pants. Also something super annoying is that it picks up the tiniest little lint of fabric so I constantly have lots of white lints all over the pants even after washing it.
I hesitated on buying these since a few years back I bought some black wunderunder pants and they pilled like crazy and looked horrible after only a couple of months (I had paid over 100$ too...) and I thought Lululemon was overhyped and just a trendy brand. But after seeing all the yogis in my class wearing lululemon, I thought I'd give it a second chance. Now I've gotten my confirmation that these are not only not ethically made (I haven't found any transparent information on how their products are made, who makes them, where, do they get a fair wage?) but I think they are FAR overpriced. At this price, they should look like new for at least 5 years. I cannot believe I spent so much money on these. I hope Lululemon steps up their game on quality because this is FREAKING ANNOYING...
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi holisticmaya,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on the In Movement 7/8 Tight. We hear where you're coming from and I'm sorry to hear your pants haven't held up for you as expected. We’d like to get to the bottom of this and work towards a resolution, so I've sent you an email to follow up. Talk soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'September 21, 2018'}

column6:
I love everything about these leggings and get so many compliments on the color whenever I wear them. These are so comfortable, really do feel like a "second skin", you can barely tell they're there!
10/10 would recommend.

I teach yoga and try to fit in my own practice as often as possible, and I keep washing these pants as quickly as I can because I don’t want to wear any of my older styles. I have them in two colors and look forward to more dark colors coming out for winter!

I've bought a handful of Lulu leggings over the years and I really like all of them, but I've never been in love the way I am with these leggings. The fabric is amazing - it's not super thick and constricting, but still holds you in. They're also super soft and comfy; I bought them for cycling & plyometric workouts but I've also been wearing them around the house because the fit is so good. I also think the length is perfect - I'm 5' 7" (got a size 8) and they hit me about 2 inches above the ankle. I bought the black, and am already looking into getting another color!!

column5: Wanted to love them, but pilling
column6: I love Lululemon leggings usually and have never really had a problem with any of the ones I've owned until this one. I purchased the antique bark color about a week ago, worn them twice, and already have noticed the seems around the waist are coming apart/starting to pill. I'm pretty disappointed because the fabric is wonderfully soft and the color is beautiful, but I'm sure the pilling is going to get even worse if I wash the leggings.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux.\n\nI'm sorry to hear you're having such trouble with your pants! I'd love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I'll be reaching out shortly to connect.", 'LL_response_date': 'September 20, 2018'}

column6: I purchased 3 pairs of "In Movement" leggings over two months ago. I have not worn them/ taken off the tags until today. The seam at the crotch started to pull apart within two hours of wear (no vigorous activity - walked <1km). It's ridiculous that a brand new pair of leggings would fall apart this quickly- not expecting this type of quality for the price. I'm very dissatisfied with the quality of these leggings.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.\n\nOh dear, I’m sorry to see you’re having some trouble with your gear—that's definitely disappointing. We're eager to make things right because we stand behind our gear, so I'm sending you a follow up email to continue the conversation.", 'LL_response_date': 'September 20, 2018'}

column6: Great for pilates or yoga workouts as they are light weight and stay in place. I am shorter (5'2") and like the 7/8 length as it hits around the ankles.

I love the texture of the pants. The color was just beautiful and the main reason I purchased them. After wearing them, I seem to be having to pull them up all of the time and they bunch at the bottom. I will most likely size down next time. If I knew this in advance, I wouldve got a smaller size in the first place.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear alysslyss,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience with the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" and would love to discuss this further. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'September 18, 2018'}

column6: I love the way these leggings fit! I have had them for a few months and have washed them multiple times and have had no issues with the quality after!

Was very excited about receiving these leggings as I love all my other lulus. Unfortunately these were just not the quality I was expecting , only warn a few times and the seams are already coming upart. This was an disappointing purchase...
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Sandytoes2,\n\nWe appreciate your feedback regarding the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'September 18, 2018'}

column6: My friend raved about LuLuLemon apparel, but I had a hard time buying in to their price point. Until my birthday came along... and I thought I would give them a try. Ladies, these pants are amazing. They feel like butter on my bunz. =) Not only are they soft, they hold their shape, and mine as well. They are totally worth the money and I can officially say, that I'm a believer in LuLu.

These look so very well made. I hope they hold up as well as they look! The first pair were too long. I took them back to the store and the sales staff was super helpful and friendly at the Kukuiula store in Poipu. No problem exchanging for a pair that fir perfectly!
These pants fit great, and they make my butt look great! Super comfortable as well

These are one of my favourite lulu pants!! The everlux fabric is by far the best fabric, soft and tight. I love the nulu and luon fabrics but the everlux is just right.
I normally don't wear any of my lulu leggings to work out in because, no matter how much they say it'll work, none of the ones I have tried so far are meant to be sweat in.
I just wish they had more colours available!!! Need darker colours!!

i absolutely loved these leggings when i bought them around christmas time. they were fitted, snug, and the high rise made it feel like a second skin. recently, the material has stretched out, making them so loose to the point where i have to keep pulling them up every couple minutes. for the price i paid, i didn't expect the quality of these to diminish so soon :(

Okay on a real note, the colour i got (antique bark) is gorgeous. When i first put these on i was inlove. After i wore them to the gym they are officially going to the back of my drawer .... every little bit a sweat showed through and it was so embarassing. I didnt even know my knees could sweat untill i wore these. The fit is nice but im almost just to worried to wear them again..:/

I chose my barre class this morning to wear these leggings for the first time. The material is so soft and buttery. They fit really well. However, once I started sweating in class, I noticed butt/crotch sweat that was pretty obvious. I felt self conscious. They would be fine in a dark color and/or for activities where I don't sweat much (running errands, barre, non-hot yoga) but I can't wear these for sweaty HIIT classes, runs or OrangeTheory. Bummer.
column11: I KEEP MY AGE ON THE D.L.

column6: I have 3 pairs of In Movement pants in both cropped and tights. They've held up to 4-5 gym sessions a week for many months now. No piling and they have retained their shape:) I just wish Lulu would bring back the Deep Phantom colour.

I love these and felt compelled to leave my first review! I can live in these pants, with just the right amount of compression to keep my booty in and stretch that nothing pinches in class. They are great for weight work, barre, pilates and yoga, but I love putting them on for flying and travelling...keeps me warm! I'm normally 5 ft 2 in, 115 pounds, so I got the size 4 25" pants hemmed just a wee bit to get the perfect length. I'm recently into my second trimester and find that the pants still fits! It has enough stretch in them that I can still keep wearing my regular size 4! However may have to upgrade to the aligns soon...
No rolling or adjusting during yoga or cardio.

I own a bunch of different LLL leggings and this is now my new favorite! The Luxtreme and Nulux leggings are a little too shiny for me, so I really love this Everlux mixture. These leggings are super soft and allow a lot of movement. I do agree with other reviewers that they are a little thin and can sometimes show sweat stains, but I haven't experienced anything drastic enough to dislike these leggings. I also love where the 7/8 length hits on your legs. I plan to buy more colors and I highly recommend these!

Very cute and comfy leggings. However, be aware of your leg length when buying leggings. I am 5'4'' and bought a size 6. Although they fit me great, I do have to fold the bottoms up slightly in order to achieve the 7/8 length look. Other than that, they work great for working out, lounging around, and as leggings in fashionable outfit.

I LOVED these for a good 3 months... They were super tight around the top so it wouldn't fall down when I was running, which was great. I bought the mesh bottom ones around January and I wore them until like April, maybe like 6 times max? The seams around the mesh started frilling and pilling, and then to top it all off, theres a rip in the bum area :( Honestly the speed tight was probably the best bet, I really regret buying these
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear PuppyLover6,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We’re sorry to hear you're having such trouble with your pants! We’d love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. Keep a lookout for an email coming your way!", 'LL_response_date': 'September 13, 2018'}

column6:
After falling in love with the Align pants and having the "pilling" problem I was told by a Lululemon representative I was not using the Aligns for the intended purpose. This made perfect sense. So she recommended based on what I told her I use the leggings for (everyday wear, running, and weight training) that the In-movement tights would best suit my needs while also providing the buttery soft feel that the Aligns have.
In the store I fell in love with these tights. They had everything I wanted and they looked amazing.
I am currently 4 hours into wearing the In-movement tights and I have noticed that the material the seam is stitched with is falling apart and fraying. I am super disappointed. After being bummed about the situation with the Align leggings, I specifically asked the rep at the Lulu store what she would suggest given how I use the pants and they have once again disappointed me.
I would not recommend these pants to anyone.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Northof60YT,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We’re sorry to hear you're having such trouble with your pants! We’d love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix. Keep a lookout for an email coming your way!", 'LL_response_date': 'September 13, 2018'}

column6: These tights are incredible, so soft and flattering. they make me look like I have a butt (something i'm still working on at the gym) and I love the high rise. I will be purchasing more in the future, yay! I just wish the ankle area was a tiny bit tighter but I have small legs to begin with.
I've had these for 6+months. Wear them about 4-5 times/month. So far, perfect. Love them.

I bought them in store on the recommendation of an employee. The fabric is very nice but after wearing them for a while the pants stretch out and I had to keep pulling them up for the rest of my workout.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Laurax98,\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. Oh dear, I’m sorry to see you’re having some trouble with your gear—that's definitely disappointing. I’ve sent you an email to follow up and help further.", 'LL_response_date': 'September 12, 2018'}

column6: These are very comfortable and flattering! the 7/8 length is perfect. The only con is it is not as fitted around the ankles as other pairs. But still my favorite pair!

column5: Want to love them but I can't.
column6:
I'm a sweaty gal and I bought a bunch of leggings from Lululemon in the past month. I wanted better workout clothes. I'm learning the hard way that anything that is not black or super dark blue isn't sweat proof from this company. These fit weird in the waistline. I wanted to love them but I hate how they fit.
The material does feel amazing though and the quality is great.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Mintcookies,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way!', 'LL_response_date': 'September 13, 2018'}

column6: Buttery like the Align pant but with more compression. Sexy lines and flattering cut at the ankle. Waistline is not as great as the Wunder Under, but still comfortable. 100% size down. I'm normally a 6 and a 4 is perfect!

I have had these pants for maybe 2 months and haven't worn them that often. I find the stitching on the legs is fraying and looks horrible. They have started to pill on the ankle part as well which has never happened to me before. The material is super soft and the fit is nice but quality is not great. :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Jammer9393,\nThanks for reaching out to share this feedback. We're sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We have sent you an email outlining a few options.", 'LL_response_date': 'September 10, 2018'}

column6:
however!!! you need to buy a size smaller as these WILL stretch out!
bought a 10, told it looked better and after two wears, they stretched in my bum/upper thigh area so much that every time i walked, i was chafing!
took them in the store, measured them against other 10's and sure enough, stretched out by an inch all around.
please note! i am an athletic girl, not a big bum, but i got some muscular legs.
so i feel slimmer girls would not have to worry much about them but if you are weight lifter, focusing more on muscle growth than cardio, i would probably size down.
i have had them exchange it for me in a size 8, so we will see what happens now!
I do love the feel that it is wearing nothing against your skin ...got the green floral pattern
You will not need to adjust the fit during a workout.
Really nice pants, but i ordered them in the colour 'Moss Rose' and they are much more purple than anticipated. Still love the fit and quality but the colour is much different than the picture.
I love how Everlux feels, perfect for yoga or any daily activity. Fabric stays put and it is flattering!

I am in my late forties and just started crossfit in January 2018. I've exercised all my life, but mostly aerobic types of activities so crossfit is tough. I have 3 core injuries: 1) an old compression fracture in my back 2) diastasis recti from 3 pregnancies with large babies and 3) a rib that slips out of place (rarely but extremely painful). To say the least, I need a lot of core support to continue doing the things I love. I'm so happy to have found these high waisted leggings. They support my abdominal muscles and back while keeping my rib in place. They give a smooth sleek look so I don't have to worry about a lumpy stomach look under my fitted tank top. They also have great flexibility in the knee which is helpful for the various lifting movements. The only drawback is the limited colors. I would prefer darker colors and patterns to hide sweat in unsightly areas. As of now, I'm limited to black and navy blue. I would highly recommend these leggings to women of all ages especially if you have had any pregnancies.
column15: would like to see more variety in dark colors and

column5: Another great pair of lulu pants
column6: Very comfortable workout pant. I have several colors. these pants come to my ankle. Bought size 4 which is my normal size in lulu pants. For reference I am 5’2 120lb muscular build. Highly recommend these pants!

I am so in love with these leggings. A sales associate helped me pick these out because I wanted leggings that would be good for everything. I run, jump rope, and weight lift and these move with me perfectly no matter what I'm doing. I don't find myself pulling up on them throughout my workout and they don't pile at my ankles. These are hands down my new favorite Lulu leggings.

I have a ton of lulu leggings and these are by far my favorite I wear these to kickboxing classes everyday and they always stay in place especially while doing condition such as running, burpees, etc unlike some of the pairs I have only thing I would have done differently with these would be on my part would be to get a smaller size!
Perfect for every day with or without a workout. But they make you want to work out.

Everlux fabric feels like align but more durable. You can do so much with this legging like running, sweating, and rock climbing. I am in love with this legging more than align. This legging has nice compression and high waisted to support you when working out. Must buy
This guest did not provide a text review.

I love my new leggings because of the light weight fabric, however, they still hold everything in and make me look my best! The print of the fabric is also super FUN, which is what caught my eye to try them on.
I love the feel, the stretch, and the look. Wish it had more pockets.
column15: attracts cat hair like no other

column6: I LOVE these! I have two pairs and have had no issues over the past few months.They are so comfortable and I love that they have cooling fabric inside. I wear these for spin and pilates, they always stay in place and dry super fast.

I am in love w/ these!! They are great for my Orange Therory workouts, allowing me to move freely, while still enjoying the
“Hugged” feel and NO pilling.

These pants are very comfortable, I wear them specifically for leg day because they allow me to have full range of motion. However, these are not sweat proof! The material claims to wick sweat, but thats not the case. I bought this in the Nocturnal Teal color, and its a fairly dark color and I can still see sweat marks. Definitely embarrassing when doing squats and deadlifts. Also, they are very stretchy so if in between sizes, size down. I found the waistband to be particularly large compared to other Lulu leggings.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Mimi0803,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We're sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix. We'll be following up via email to discuss this further. Speak soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 31, 2018'}

column6: These pants are one of my favorites! I now have them in three colors and they haven't let me down. They show no signs of wear after four months of weekly wear (not at the gym). The only problem I have is the back pocket sometimes slides open and irritates my back if nothing is in it. Other than that, they are super soft like Aligns but don't pill like Aligns- exactly what I needed!!

I always struggle with sizing because I am legit in-between size 6 & 8. I always have to try on both sizes in any bottom before I can decide. Its a challenge because typically size 8 feels better and usually looks better but then as soon as I get doing any type of activity they loosen up and don't stay up. With a 6 sometimes they are tight to the point where I feel (& look) like a stuffed sausage lmao. So I always have to try on both sizes and do some squats, high knees, jumping jacks etc. in the fitting room to see which are going to be better.
For these I got a 6 - they are nice and fitted but not too tight to where I am uncomfortable. I wear them for running and have had no issues with them sliding down or not holding their shape. The pocket in the back fits my phone which I really appreciate.
As for the color, I always get black or patterns to hide sweat marks so I can't comment on others complaints about showing sweat marks.
MOST COMFORTABLE. FIRST LULU PURCHASE EVER AND I AM SWOONING AND WANTING A PAIR OF THESE FOR EVERYDAY!

There’s nothing like Lulu. Love the brand. The colors are pretty and the material is so soft. With that said, these dont make the cut. And I have them in two colors. The blue and the green and both which fail. Looks like I’ve wet myself. Super embarrassing, I cant wear them to class unless I dont plan on sweating.
So sad from such an expensive, reputable company.
Also, the waistband is so tight it gives me a stomache but the next size up are loose around the hips.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Flowandvive,\n\nWe appreciate your feedback regarding the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. We\'re eager to work out a resolution, so I\'m sending you an email to chat more.', 'LL_response_date': 'August 27, 2018'}

column6: Such a great fit and the size chart worked perfectly. I was a little nervous about not getting to try on in store but I used the chart and they fit perfect! Definitely recommend these for working out or just looking comfortable. :)
Amazing fit, snug enough but also so comfortable with a ton of room for movement. Love the pockets.

The product has great shape and design; however, the fabric is horrible. The fabric is tough and collects every piece of lint possible. I cannot get the lint off the leggings. The microfiber in the product attracts any particle it comes in contact with. I've washed the leggings twice and the lint still is attached. Very disappointed in this lulu product.

I’d been hearing about the Wunder Unders and how amazing they are for a long time now, but no one has ever mentioned these pants. I went and bought my first Wunders a couple months ago and grabbed a pair of these just because I liked the color and the employee said they were good for interval training. These are officially my new favorite pants in the entire world. The material is very cool to the touch and amazingly soft. Literally my only complaint is that they seem to run really low in stock so you have to watch closely and jump as soon as a color becomes available in your size. They sell out really fast. I’d buy even more if there were more color options available.
Great workout pants! And very comfortable!

I love the everlux fabric as it seems to be a mix between Nulu & Luxtreme. I am not a fan of the Luxtreme & Nulux fabrics as they are too slippery & shiny. I like Nulu for yoga. And the Luon is great but too heavy for summer work-outs. Needless to say, I was on the look out for a different fabric that wasn't Nulu, Luon, or Luxtreme for cycle & spin classes. Everlux was the option & I am very pleased with the fabric (please make wunder under pants in everlux). I have washed my leggings (I own 3 pair) multiple of times & worn them to multiple of work outs. The fabric has held up. I do like the In Movement 7/8 tight, they are slimming but the ankles do seem a little loose. Overall a great legging that fits true to size.

Perfect length, sooo smooth, luxe fabric is life changing! Keeps tummy tucked with comfortable waist band and controlled fit throughout for great support for any and every type of workout from yoga to plyo’s to running.

I used to be a Wunder Under kind of girl, but this pants are so comfortable and not at all obscene around the crotch area. Perhaps my WUs from 3 years back are of an older design? But these pants, the material is comfortable, sweat wicking, easy to put on, and what a beautiful colour! Also, perfect length for my 156cm.

I got these after I experienced pilling with my Align Pants. These are SO comfortable. While they are a little thicker than the Aligns, they keep you surprisingly cool-even in the summer heat. I love the stitching detail which adds something extra to an everyday black legging. Only "con" is that I'm 5'3 and these fit like a full length legging on me. Doesn't really bother me but good to note! Can't wait to wear these into the fall months.
column15: length is a little bit longer than i'd like

column6: awesome pants to workout in or just casual around the house wear!
column15: the light colors show sweat while working out

column5: Love the look but not functional
column6:
These are beautiful, and I love how high waisted they are. If you're just looking for lifestyle pants I would definitely get these. In terms of fit I would definitely size down.
That said, these show sweat worse than any leggings I have ever tried. I was especially disappointed because they specifically say they're sweat wicking, and I bought these specifically for working out in. These are unwearable for anything remotely sweaty. I've tried them for weightlifting, running, and yoga, and ended up with visible (large) sweat marks that take forever to dry, which is embarrassing. I expected better from lululemon.

column6: I love these tights! Highly recommend!!
Love these-- super soft material. They stay up while running/exercising and are cute for athleisure purposes or for your most rigorous workout.
These are one of my all time favorite pants. I am able to use for every day, workouts, and work attire. I would recommend these to anyone!

These pants are beautiful and very comfortable. The cut out mesh adds a sexy touch. I got these in white which are beautiful but I am super paranoid when I wear them. Every brush up against anything makes them dirty. But I just have to be extra careful

I have a lot of leggings from here but these seemed to get messed up easily. I wore them once and the string on the side now looks really rough and messed up. I was really disappointed because I have not washed them and they were already looking bad, plus they were very expensive :(

column6: I LOVE these pants so much. I'm 5'6, 28 yrs old, 135 lbs, slim body type and I wear a size 6. I participate mostly in Crossfit/ HITT style workout and some yoga. I bought the light blue pair first then bought a black. Oh the fabric, it is so soft and covers you during workouts so well. I haven't had any issues with threads or piling.
These pants felt great and work well for aerials.
It fitted perfectly and the material is very soft.

I love these leggings! The color is insanely pretty, and the everlux fabric makes them fantastic for spin & hot yoga alike. I also really like the amount of compression they have -- hugging but not so tight I can't move easily.

I don’t know why the ratings aren’t higher. Honesty. I got my usual size and it fits great 3 months in. (5’2, 126lbs and muscular build- size 4) it hits right at my ankles and right bellow my belly button. Squat proof. Sweat proof. They don’t slide down anymore than yoga pants normally would. I love these.

Great for travel or hanging about in. Nice and breathable for sure. I did try for a workout but somehow I didn't get that hugged sensation I was looking for, so now these are my travel leggings or for hanging out.
I bought a size 8 by the way, and weight is 155 - 158
I love them! They are my go to workout pants!

I just recently got turned on to the in movement right. I have several co workers who had them so i decided to give them a try. I LOVE THEM. As a fitness instructor they are perfect to teach in. I love how quickly they dey after a workout.

I am obsessed with these. I have two pairs in black and would probably have more but cannot find my size in other colors. I have not had any trouble with them stretching out, but did go down and size. I absolutely love them.

column5: Stitching was too tight and broke
column6: I have another pair with the same exact size, but unfortunately, the first time I put these on, the stitching was too tight and broke and now I have loose threads hanging out. Maybe it was a fluke but now I'm concerned each time I wash them.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Thank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux.\nOh no, I'm sorry to hear your gear isn't performing as expected—I can understand the disappointment. We'd love to chat with you further to gather more information from you and work towards a resolution. We'll be reaching out via email, so keep your eyes peeled on your inbox.", 'LL_response_date': 'August 21, 2018'}

column6: I really love these pants, the fit, the pattern, etc. I normally wear a 4. I purchased the 4, and the second time wearing them, I noticed that they had stretched out and I didn't feel like they hugged me the way they did the first time I wore them. I really hope they don't continue to stretch out.

column6: So soft! It feels like I'm not wearing anything. Haven't sweat too much in these. Not sure if it shows sweat. If you are not sweaty, these leggings are not see through.

These pants are so comfy and soft, I live in these!! The extra seams/lines around the legs and calves are so flattering. I ordered my normal size and it fits TTS. Definitely will be ordering these in more colors. I love the 7/8 length, I’m 5’3” and they are perfect!

I love the everlux fabric. I previously wore the thicker fabrics because I like the compression feel. These are so much lighter and more comfortable. Be careful using oil based products around them though. I got a couple drops of some skincare product on the knee and it hasn't come out.
Love these pants. The fabric is amazing. It’s super wicking and cooling. It’s light and easy to move. Love the seams. Makes me feel skinny and light and free

column5: Finally, something that doesn't fall down...
column6: I am aware that Lululemon is a bit pricey and this is why many people turn away at this brand. However, the price was well worth it, especially since it was purchased as an on-sale item. I have bought many different leggings from other brands and they would all fall down as I was active (I would consider myself a curvy woman and have issues with leggings sliding down as I walk or run). Finally, I found a nice legging that would not do this! Not only this, but these leggings do not feel super thick and feel quite light while still managing to cover everything without becoming sheer. I would say this was an excellent purchase and that anyone should go for it if they are looking for the same things I was looking for.

Ordered these for the detail in the back, very much in love with them. The color and texture are perfect. Added bonus they make your booty look fantastic! Only thing I would do is maybe size down next pair since they seemed slightly loose inside top thigh portion. Overall loved them though.

I was looking to replace my old Inspire pants and asked the sales person for their suggestion and she suggested the In Movement tights. I specifically wanted a pair of pants that I could wear to spin and the sales person said these would fit similar to my inspire pants and the material would not chafe unlike other lulu pants. Well I have worn them maybe 10 times and they are already chaffing in the crotch. I bought two pairs and am really disappointed that for almost $100 the pants are already experiencing problems.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear pdrfly,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" has not met your expectations. We would love to discuss your concerns further. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'August 16, 2018'}

column6: These are snug (very snug!) but amazing leggings. I typically wear a size 4 in the Wunder Under's, I bought these in a 4 and probably could have gotten a 6 but I made them work. They are extremely soft, very stretchy and the perfect high waist for yoga/pilates activities. If you want a little more give, size up, but as always, these are very flattering cut and come in a great color selection!
column15: a bit tighter than other styles

column6: The color!! Oh my gosh the color! Even more stunning then seen on the website. I’m a big fan of these leggings for their high waist and amazing comfortable material. I already have several pairs and would recommend them for any active person.

I LOVE these pants! They are so soft. They are not see-through. Perfect length for my height. And beautiful color. I honestly have not loved a pair of leggings more. This cut and style is amazing. Will be buying more.

This is by far the worse pair of lulu lemon leggings I own! Its very disappointing!
I got excited to try the new blue color. The leggings run loose and the fabric is terrible. After I was done with my workout it had sweat spots all over! I’m a big fan of lululemon and specially their leggings, they hold up perfectly in a tough workout but this one i wouldn’t trust to do my crossfit training, maybe just for yoga. Even the cut was not cery flattering on my body, unlike all my other lululemon leggings :(

column6: I love the look of these leggings but I felt the material was very thin compared to all my other Lululemon leggings .. it fits loose, doesn’t feel like a Hugged fit.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Lgirl,\n\nWe want your gear to support your sweatiest pursuits, but it sounds this isn’t the case for you. We'll be following up via email to discuss this further. Speak soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 14, 2018'}

column6: I love these pants. The fit is absolutely perfect and I am able to an intense bootcamp and not worry if my pants are going to slide down or be uncomfortable. I can run, do burpees, trx, weight train or play tennis in these pants and look amazing. Highly recommend!

My favorite yoga tights so far! Worn 15 times so far and look perfect. No pilling. No see through problems and so flattering! Many compliments from my yoga students. I am 5"11" 150# and size 8 fit perfectly.

I ended up sending them back. I bought the crimson color and was worried they wouldn’t pass the sweat test. I splashed a little water on them and it was very apparent that they were wet.
Cute... comfy, but not as cool feeling as Nulux which is what I was secretly hoping. I will stick with fast and free from now on.

column5: Piling before even finishing the first use
column6: I have bought so many shorts from Lululemon and love the quality. This is my first pair of leggings and I am less than pleased. I have been just lounging around the house in them and they are already piling before their first wash. I have bought tights for less than $10 at forever 21 that were better quality.
