column6: So comfortable. Wear for yoga, running or training.

I ordered these pants in store in the "brilliant blue" color since they did not have my size in stock. I was very excited about them since I loved the fit and color, however, was apprehensive about receiving them after reading so many negative reviews. I just wore them for a workout for the first time and am very disappointed! Like many others have mentioned, the material shows sweat stains in the crotch area. I own at least 10 pairs of Lulu pants and wanted to get a different color this time - extremely disappointed with this purchase.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear fitchick18,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux is not performing for you! There should not be staining like that! Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 12, 2018'}

column6: These tights are hands down the best lululemon tights I have ever owned. I possibly have over 40 lulu tights/pants but these were game changers from the second I tried them on. The everlux material is as if the luon and luxtreme material had a baby lol They’re perfect for leg day, cardio and yoga! On top of that they feel buttery soft but they hold everything in nice and snug. I own every color and have had no issue with them being see through, piling or pulling! I’m a tts 6 but these can get a little loose and I was pulling them up after a wear so I sized down to a 4 and they’re perfect after some movement in them. (5’8” 140lbs) Don’t hesitate on picking these up, let them change your workouts lol

My friend recommended these leggings and I was hesitant because of the price, but I decided to order a pair and try them out. Now I have 4 pair! These are definitely a game changer! They smooth all your imperfections and give you a little extra confidence while working out at the gym. I’m 5’8 , 155 pounds and wear a size 10 in these leggings. You want them to fit tight so there’s no sagging/pulling up every 5 minutes.

So I have like 5 pairs of lululemon leggings and I haven't had an issue until now. I went into a lulu store tried these on in my size (4) and I'm 5'3". I initially tried on the cropped version but I didn't like the hem or the length on me. The gal helping me suggested I try the 7/8 and pinned it up to the perfect length and no weird fabric bunching. The fit was really great and I was in love, no issues, just absolutely in love. I even asked her if I should get a smaller size, but she assured me that the material would not shrink or stretch because of the material. I trusted her and went through with the purchase. I went to pick it up and tried them on at home again, there was weird bunching going on at the knee and the butt area that wasn't there before. Should I have gotten a size 2 since the fabric is going to stretch?!
column14: the material is so soft and comfy
column15: the material seems to stretch out
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi moniichu,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I completely understand why you're disappointed with this and I'd love to help turn this around. I'm going to follow this up with an email that outlines how to move towards a resolution. Talk soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 10, 2018'}

column6: These pants are great! They are a snug fit, I would almost suggest going up a size, however I kept with my normal size and they are great. They are the perfect rise, at or above belly button. Perfect length just above the ankle. Super comfy. Squat proof.

I love Lululemon I have had my wunder under for over a year now without a problem. I have these in the movement tights for less then a month and there is already a hole in the butt. I'm am so sad because I love the feel of these tights more then any other leggings. I believe that 100 dollar leggings should hold up a lot longer then a month.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi kikidouluvme,\nThanks for taking the time to connect with us. It's not good to hear about the hole in your pant. I'd love to help you find a solution, so I've sent an email your way. Talk soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 10, 2018'}

column5: So comfy, but falling apart already
column6: I love how comfy these pants are- I had to wear them out of the store the day I bought them because I loved them so much. I've used them for daily wearers as well as workout pants (running, lifting), and after about 6 months they have started to fall apart at the seams (quite literally). I was able to get the inner thigh seams repaired by lululemon warranty, as they completely fell apart; it was after this that I started noticing a spot where the fabric had been rubbed away for no apparent reason. I had heard so many good things about lululemon clothing, but this sort of easy wearing material does not fit my workout regime at all. Unfortunately, I'm not sure that I can justify spending another $100 on a pair of pants that seem to only last 6 months to a year.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Savy15227,\n\nWe’re writing to follow up on your recent review. We want your gear to support your sweatiest pursuits and it sounds like your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" isn’t up to the task. We’d love to turn this around and get you into gear that works for you. Look out for an email coming your way, chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'August 9, 2018'}

column6:
5’4”- 120 - Thick bum and thighs.
Size 4 fits perfect - true to size
First off I wish the Aligns were made from Everlux! I can wear these through sweat drenched cardio and still not look like I peed my pants! The fit is so flattering, i’ve never had a problem with them coming loose or sagging. I’ve had one of my pairs for almost a year and with the proper care (washing in cold with only other lululemon pants / air dry) they still look brand new, no pilling, no unraveling. Bought them in 3 different colors. Would highly recommend!

I love these so much I have them in 5 colors. I teach Pilates in them and use them for sweaty high-intensity workouts as well. Sweat does show through in the lighter colors but dries quickly. I usually wear a 4 , but in these bc of the length I get a 2.

column5: Accidentally left a review on the wrong product... These pants are comfy but...
column6: I loved these when I first bought them but after a few washes, they started to pill and a few tiny holes came from that around the crotch area. Super disappointed.

column5: Flimsy and Loose waste of money
column6: I bought these in store in a size 4, and I was so excited to wear them because they appeared to fit really well. I washed it exactly as the directions said to, and when I wore them to pilates, I noticed they were a little loser. I ignored it. After pilates, I put them in the wash again using the same instructions. I wore them a few days later, and they were so loose. They were practically falling off. The fabric did not cling to my body, and they were SO unflattering. If I knew this was going to happen, I never would have wasted my money on these pants.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey sberger47,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. I completely understand why you're disappointed with this and I'd love to help turn this around. We'd love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way.", 'LL_response_date': 'August 7, 2018'}

column6: These were the perfect fit. I have never had a pair of pants that fit as comfortable as these do. I can do ANYTHING in them and I do not have to worry about them fitting too tight or feel like it’s “too much material” and I never have to adjust them while wearing them!!

I LOVE these pants. The only reason they don’t get five stars is because of the fit. I tried on these in store in size 2 and they were way too tight so I ordered the 4 ... they have stretched and are looser than I prefer but still doable. I love Lulu but the sizing is so all over the place. For reference I’m 5’6 128 pounds athletic build.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Peho222,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear the In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" has stretched out-not fair! Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'August 6, 2018'}

column6: I love these tights so much!!! Now that I have these it’s hard to wear any other brand. They fit so well and don’t stretch out. Love the high rise, it holds everything in so well!

I was on the fence about purchasing because of some of the reviews but much to my surprise, I love these! Great for workout and just enough compression to hold me in without feeling restrictive. I now own 4 pair. I'm between a size 2-4 and went with the 2.

I loved these tights when I saw them online. Decided to order them in size 2 when I normally wear size 4 b/c all the reviews said they stretch. Well what a disappointment. They are a really weird fit. The fabric feels very cheap/scratchy during cross fit definitely not moisture wicking or appropriate for sweating in. I am 5'3", and they are still pretty long and bunch up oddly around the knee and ankles. This is not the quality I expect from Lululemon especially for the price I paid for these tights.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Amber57,\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts. It sounds like you've had a less-than-thrilling experience and I'd love to help! Keep your eye out for an email from us shortly -- chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'August 5, 2018'}

column6: This tight feels so soft and buttery. I want 800 pair!

column5: I really wanted to like these
column6: I had a gift card to use so I got these. After one wash, the seams on both sides of the thigh are unraveling and a few areas around the ankles. I washed according to care instructions too. Really disappointing considering how much a pair of these pants cost. Seems to me like the high cost of lululemon items do not reflect the quality of materials used, but rather only to turn a higher profit. Not fair for consumers.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey SayFaux,\n\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. Please be on the lookout for an email headed your way. It'll detail the next steps to take to resolve this.", 'LL_response_date': 'August 4, 2018'}

column6: These are some of my favorite workout leggings(strength training, HIIT, crossfit) Even on super hot days, I don't feel hot working out in these. They are very breathable. Sweat does show through on the lighter colors, but thats not a legging flaw. I would highly recommend. These are very durable, and I have not gotten any snags with working out. Love them. I own in a couple of colors already, but will be purchasing more in the future.
column15: wish it made my booty look as good as the aligns

column6: i was hesitant to buy these leggings because of the negative reviews on here but i decided to order these in black and nocturnal teal. I am so happy I did!! The fabric is so incredibly soft and the high waist really lengthens your legs. I wear these mostly for training, although I have also worn them to run errands. The fabric is perfectly stretchy and they do not ride down during workouts in my experience. For perspective, they are slightly less supportive than the Luxtreme fabric which I wear for running or biking but still hold you in great especially with the high waist! These are hands-down my favorite leggings that I have from lululemon!! No trouble with pilling either. I make sure i was all my workout gear cold and hang to dry. I will definitely be ordering more colors in the future!

I needed a new pair of tight for going around so I ordered these. The product is so awesome. Great material and fit just right (reference: I’m 5’5 136lbs. With big booties) I am really pleased that the 7/8 length works out as full length for me! I can’t tell much yet because I only worn them once. I will definitely update after a month of wearing them. But so far so good for now :)
These pants fit a lot tighter than my other size 4's, which is disappointing. Also, lint sticks to them. I haven't really worn them because of these two reasons. I regret this purchase.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey NicoleC123,\n\nWe’re writing to follow up on your recent review. We want your gear to support your sweatiest pursuits and it sounds like your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" isn’t up to the task. We’d love to turn this around and get you into gear that works for you. Look out for an email from us soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'August 3, 2018'}

column6: The garnet color is so beautiful. It's my fav deep read that they make. I just bought them and tried them on for the first time, didn't want to take them off! The only thing is for a shorter person I had to get them hemmed. They hem the pants for free, but the thread they used didn't match the red. I was kind of bummed! For short people the crop length looks better, but sadly they didn't have the crop in garnet. Amazing feel though and I love the top stitching. These and the ALL YOU DO pants are my favorite!

I have a few lulus, and I have the same size in both my align and wunder unders (my go to styles). When I tried on the Everlux at the store in my usual size they fit perfect, as I wore them through out the day, they got looser and the pants got longer. Lol I actually ended up have to roll them up so they still looked like 7/8 style, it was still no big deal to me because I figured I would just exchange them. WRONG. The return policy is insane, unworn and the tags still attached. WHAT. Who walks around with a tag attached, I figured for the cost they would be willing to work with me but sadly not. Long story short, size down or you'll be out 104$

My daughter is 5'6" -- this is her first pair of 7/8 length leggings.
Perfect length!! All other leggings she has to cuff.....

column5: Love the fit and feel, but the material is already wearing away
column6: I immediately loved the fit and feel of these pants; but only after less than 10 wears, the material is starting to wear away near my knee. This is not the quality I expect from Lululemon or from an investment such as these.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey JConquest,\n\nI am sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not performing for you. I would hate if that happened to mine. Keep an eye out for an email from us, chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'August 3, 2018'}

column6: These leggings feel super soft when I put them on! They are really nice. They are a bit loose on me so I would’ve gone a size down. Also, lint and other stuff gets on the leggings easily so always carry a roller.

These are my third pair of the in movement and I can say I’ve never been anymore happier with this purchase! Was afraid the color would be dull but the color is true to the picture! Would high recommended any in movement for comfort and versatility!! I’m 5’3’’ at 104-6 pounds so a four fits comfortably for those that wants to figure out your size!!!

So everyone told me to get the Wunder Unders, and they are amazing, but these top them. I use them for running and cross training (weights, rowing, running, etc). They are so comfortable, no rolling of the waist band and are the only lettings i don't have to pull up ever. I am not a small individual, i have a full waist and larger legs so for me to find some that fit like this are priceless. LOVE THEM!
This design is my absolute favorite! I have this pant in 3 different colors. They are squat proof and the high-waisted feature is very slimming

As a personal trainer and pilates instructor, I am in these pants for 10-14 hours a day. I LOVE them. They provide just enough compression feel while being incredibly comfortable. The fabric is great and the pants stay fit during heavy lifting, cardio and pilates. Would recommend!

Very comfortable!! A pair of these were my first Lulu purchase and I love them for weight training especially. They are okay for cardio, a little thick but I normally warm up with a mile of cardio before weights and its not bad!
I bought these in black. They have an amazing fabric and they look great on. I washed them 2-3 times already with no issues. I hope they hold up. They are the best ones I bought from Lululemon.

column5: Great fit, holds you in and stays put.
column6: First off I love the length of the 7/8. Not too long or short. Second, I love the height of the waist as it snuggles you in and gives an overall flattering look. That being said, it's not too tight and does not loosen as worn throughout a workout. I bought these for tootling around in, but mainly for hot yoga. A side benefit I'd like to mention is that they dry quickly. I will leave a hot yoga class and be able to run errands and not be drenched. They also don't retain a bad smell. ok, yes, I'm probably a bit smelly after hot yoga, but it's not awful and I don't feel self-conscious.

This was my first pair of Lululemon tights because I always thought spending an arm and a leg for yoga pants was a bit ridiculous. I did some research on the Everlux fabric and went ahead and bought these thinking that it wouldn't show SWASS as bad as other cheaper tights from other brands. Well, that's a hard NOPE. I bought the Antique Bark color but halfway into my Barre WARM-UP I had a noticeably visible crotch stain. Looking like you peed yourself isn't a good look especially when you throw down over a 100 bucks for said tights. Yes, they were comfortable but not worth the price when they don't completely wick away moisture. I will be returning these and doubt I'll buy Lululemon again unless they figure out how to make tights that don't show sweat as easily.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear ktu1130,\n\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear your gear isn't performing as expected—I can understand the disappointment. We'll be following up via email to discuss this further. Speak soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'July 31, 2018'}

column6: I was getting bored of wearing black yoga pants. I wanted a color that was dark (slimming) but not purple. The garnet color was a great option. Has interest beyond black, goes with lots of other colors and figure flattering. They fit well and feel good on.

I got these around 2 weeks ago and I just LOVE THEM!!! They fit so nice and do not slide down like the align pants do at all. I wear them to my crossfit training, running and to run errands and will keep purchasing!
Love that they are high waisted, however the quality isn’t long lasting or seemingly great quality. Stretch out fast after one workout and the seams are fraying after a couple months and a wear
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi Plifts,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are sorry to hear that your In Movement Tight is not performing for you, and we would love to help. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 29, 2018'}

column6: These are the best leggings I've ever worn. I have them in several colors, and in the In Movement crops. Waistline is PERFECT, and stitching features make them very flattering. You can barely feel them when they're on...I wear them in Yoga, and in the gym for regular workouts.
Love that they are high waist with hugged sensation. BUT the quality isn’t long lasting. Stretch out fast and the seams are falling apart after a couple months. I guess they are just not meant to be.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey jazmindewey,\n\nThank you for sharing your feedback with us. We're sorry that the quality of the In Movement Tight is not what you expected and we would love to make this right for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way!", 'LL_response_date': 'July 26, 2018'}

column6: I am SO BUMMED about these leggings. I was gifted these for my birthday and the rose color is so, so beautiful and they're crazy comfortable and soft BUT they show every single teeny tiny sweat mark. I wore them to work with the plan to go straight to yoga after work. I ultimately couldn't go to yoga because the sweat from a moderate short walk was so visible, I couldn't bare the thought of wearing these in a sweaty studio and having every sweat mark out there for the world to see. I was embarrassed even walking outside to my car in these. Such a massive bummer!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey sgl87,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. We’d love to turn this around and get you into gear that works for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 27, 2018'}

column6: I bought these pants a few months ago. I have always been an Align gal, but I wanted to try these out since I do a lot of cardio and wanted a sweat-proof legging. Unfortunately, the waist band has stretched out so much that they don't fit me correctly any longer. I air-dry all of my Lulu leggings to avoid these types of issues. I will be sticking with the Align legging from now on.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Jcacc,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are sorry to hear that your leggings are not what you had hoped for, and we would love to help. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 25, 2018'}

column6: I received these in mystic green as a gift a little while ago. When I first put them on it was love! They were really comfy and the colour was gorgeous, and although the upper waist band was a bit narrow and tight compared to the aligns, I was really happy with them.. at first. My second time wearing them was out to take a brisk walk with my dog last week... walk, not run. I felt really sweaty in them and to my horror when I came home it looked like I had peed myself from sweat stains! And this is from just a walk? I can't imagine how many stains I'd having wearing them for yoga, a run, etc. Just sad because these were well over 100$... long time lululemon fan, not at all satisfied with this item! I can't wear them anymore now because of future embarrassment risk!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear jlifts,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" did not perform as expected. We would love to discuss your concerns further. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 24, 2018'}

column6:
They are my perfect tights! They really are like a second skin!
I use them for gym, play tennis, as pijama, everything!
I use size 6 and it fit very well!

When I tried these on in store, I loved the fit of these even better than my Aligns! But after only a few wears (and hand washes!) I noticed the seam is coming apart, and threading is coming out. I have only worn these a few times and not for any workouts, just for an athleisure look, so I was extremely shocked when I saw how quickly they deteriorated.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear rachelx99,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re sorry to hear that the stitching has come undone on your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We would love to discuss your concerns further. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 24, 2018'}

column6: The fabric felt very cheap and not like it would be moisture wicking or appropriate for sweating in. They felt more like some type of polyester/nylon material. I tried a couple different sizes to get the fit right, but it didn't matter--the fabric just isn't right. At 5'3", they were still pretty long too and bunched up weird around the knee and ankles. They just weren't the quality or fit I would have expected from Lululemon and I ended up returning. It's too bad because I was excited about the garnet color. The color was the only thing I liked about the pants. The seams hit along my thighs a bit oddly too and I felt they only accentuated them further. Disappointing overall.

Please be sure to give us a call at our Guest Education Centre on 1.877.263.9300 or you can always start a Live Chat with us on our website. We look forward to hearing from you.", 'LL_response_date': 'July 23, 2018'}

column6: These are completely see-through when you squat or bend over. disappointed.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi abrown1234,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Yikes! That's not good to hear. As it sounds your gear isn't performing as intended, I've sent you an email to follow up.", 'LL_response_date': 'July 23, 2018'}

column6: These were way too long on me! Doesn't seem 7/8th at all.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey KatieHitz,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear the In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux 25" is too long for you. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 22, 2018'}

column6: I wore these pants for the first time today at a spin and bootcamp class and they were perfection. I did not have to pull them up at all! This is a struggle for me with other brands as I have a sprinters body type with bigger legs and small waist. Lulu just fits my body type perfectly and these are my new go to training tights for sure.

column5: Love the Fit and Pant but quality not holding up
column6:
The pants fit wonderfully and feels light and perfect. they look great on as well!!
However after first wear i noticed a pill in the stitching in class and then after a few more wears noticed a few more. These pants should be able to endure a lot more then a yoga class for the cost of them and the brand name. i go to lululemon cause i look for quality and feel i always have to be extra gentle and delicate with all my items from lululemon when they should be carefree when on and able to make it through a simple class like Yoga. I fear wearing these to a more intense class that requires equipment. i own two pairs and my other pair shows the same pilling.
i have an old pair of wunder under and they have held up. i wish lululemon either reflected the change in there price for the change in the material or has material that held up to the price.
otherwise i still buy only lululemon and i hope im not given a reason to change
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Campbell,\nThanks for taking the time to write a review and share this feedback. I want you to know we pride ourselves in creating long lasting gear. It sounds like that's not the case and I'd love to help you find a fix. Check your inbox for an email with some solutions.", 'LL_response_date': 'July 20, 2018'}

column6: These leggings were amazing when I tried them on in store, however I noticed that when I worked out in them the waistband started to slip down and then after a few wears the fabric began to loosen up which was really disappointing.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear racweb00123,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear that the waistband on your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not performing for you! Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 19, 2018'}

column6: I loved these tights when I first put them on. I expected that they wouldn't fit tight, tight and they didn't. Fine. But then I wore and washed them twice (by hand!), and they have stretched out around the bum, waist and ankles. Every wash seems to make them stretch out more. I am so bummed and disappointed, as they are not cheap. I even had to hunt them down, I bought them in midnight navy from a store in the South and had them delivered. Unfortunately, I threw out the tags, etc. because I loved them when I received them. I can't really wear them for workouts anymore, so maybe for bed?? What a waste, I'm truly sad...
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear runn22,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not keeping its shape for you! Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 19, 2018'}

column6: I was so excited for these leggings as I love almost all of my lulu's! I was sad that after wearing them a couple of times they were extremely hot and just didn't breathe well. I continued to walk around self conscious and usually I feel so good in lulu's! These were also a hugeeeee lint magnet, which is a bummer. After the first wear I noticed that they stretch out quite a bit. Maybe I got a faulty pair, but don't waste your money on this pair!

I was excited to get these in the mail since I'm trying to swap out all my old mid rise lulus workout bottoms for high rise. After babies i feel like its such a life saver to get that belly coverage. And for crossfit you don't want to mess with pulling your waist up every 2 seconds. the color is almost like a midnight purple which is pretty. But first thoughts putting them on is they feel cheap. I have under armor pants that fee similar and i can't stand to wear them anymore. The BIGGEST PROBLEM is they are loose. Nothing worse than loose leggings that will become more loose after a work out. I get either a 6 or 8 depending on the fabric and these fit bigger than an 8 would. I don't feel sucked in at all at the waist . They also fit longer than my other 7/8 lulus. If i pull up theres major camel toe and pulling down makes them full length and flare out at the bottom. I would not recommend these at all. Super bummed .
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey swlo,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear the In Movement 7/8 tight Everlux 25" is far too loose of a legging for you. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. we look forward to speaking with you soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 16, 2018'}

column6: I bought these leggings in Kansas City for vacation. very excited. Months later I noticed a hole forming on the lower left thigh, just before my knee. Disappointed, I stopped wearing them, fearing the hole would grow larger.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Bobell,\n\nThanks for taking the time to pass along some feedback on the In Movement 7/8 Everlux 25". I\'m sorry to hear the pants have developed a hole. Keep an eye out for an email headed your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 14, 2018'}

column6: I was so excited to receive this. The dark phantom color is absolutely gorgeous and the material feels so smooth and light. It was recommended to me when I mentioned that the Align pants, although so beautiful and comfortable, were just too delicate for my workouts. I tried them on and right away, I knew I had wasted my money. It felt good on my thighs, but it was loose around my waist and the pants flare out on my ankles. In addition to that, I'm 5'4" and though all my other 7/8 length tights fit almost like a full length, this fits longer for some reason. I tried pulling them up, but then I end up with the appearance of a camel toe and the waistband ends up rolling down when I bend. Another thing is that although I fold the ankles up, the material still flares out which is not a good look. I don't even want to risk wearing them out because everyone else has mentioned the pants stretching out even after a few wears. What a disappointment.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi annasoh56,\nThanks for taking the time to share this feedback. It sounds like the In Movement 7/8 Tight is not performing for you and I'd love to help turn that around. Check your inbox for an email headed your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'July 13, 2018'}

column6: I am a HUGE lululemon Align legging fan so of course I was obsessed when I tried these for the first time. However, the seams on these are already falling apart :( I always make sure to was them carefully and I do very light cardio/weight lifting in these. Honestly, I wear them to/from places rather than working out in them. So yes I am disappointed in the quality of these.

I ordered these tights online and loved the colour as soon as I opened the package (Nocturnal teal). The material also felt nice but once I put them on I was disappointed. I always wear a 6 and these ones were loose. It's supposed to be the hugged sensation fit so I didn't expect compression tights but they were literally loose. I've read previous reviews about them stretching out too, so I know if they're already not tight then they'll be way to big after a workout. Unfortunately this will be another return! Not having much luck with lululemon tights anymore and its so upsetting!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear leigh22,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I am sorry to hear that the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" is not working out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 10, 2018'}

column6: After buying the Align pants for 2+ years, I wanted to try a different kind of 7/8 pant that I could wear for weight training. At first the fit was smooth and sleek, but after just a few training sessions (think plyometrics with incorporated weights) I started noticing the shape was not retaining (dilligently following care instructions), and then just this past week I noticed a hole on the left inner leg area that has extended from the seem! I couldn't believe it. Unfortunately i have already disposed of the tags thinking I was going to keep these long term (based on the initial fittings) and now can't wear them to workout anymore. These are going to have to be pants I use to work in the yard. I should have just stuck with the Aligns had I known quality would be compromised.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear RunnerATX,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re sorry to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" has stretched out. We would love to discuss your concerns further. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 7, 2018'}

column6: The pants fit great when I had tried them on in store but had stretched out significantly. I purchased another pair hoping they would hold up better but that was not the case. The second pair not only stretched but also had a seem that tore open after only a few wears. I really wanted to like this product, but unfortunately can no longer workout in them.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Thanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us.\nWe\'d love to hear more of your experience with your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". Please keep an eye on your inbox as I\'ll be reaching out shortly to connect.', 'LL_response_date': 'July 6, 2018'}

column5: High hopes, met with low tensile strength
column6: These tights look and feel smooth, first couple of wears were amazing. Tights felt good, looked good (according to a couple of unsolicited comments) and preformed well. But then....seams...just started to fray, fall apart and the pants stretched! Instead of making rotations in my gym wear, these tights are now sadly part of my yard work ensemble.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey PandaPower,\n\nThanks for taking the time to pass along some feedback on the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". I\'m sorry to hear that the seams have come undone and the pants have stretched. Keep an eye out for an email headed your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 5, 2018'}

column5: Great for a couple of wears!
column6: I've heard so many raves about these pants and I had to try them out for myself. I was so used to wearing the aligns but I wanted something more durable and meant for high intensity workouts. Although these pants are definitely what I've been looking for, after 3-4 wears, I've noticed that the waist was getting loose and does not have as much compression (I love compression to make me look skinny!!) I find myself constantly pulling up my pants at the waist and the thighs. When I tried it on in store, I was torn between the size 4 or 6 (I am 5'2 and weight 130-135) I am usually a 6 in most bottoms. The size 6 fits but the waist was a tiny tad bit loose but when I tried on the 4, it was too tight and I wanted it to fee like 2nd skin. I've actually recommended these to all my friends so hopefully they don't have the same issues as me!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Lizzza,\n\nThanks for taking the time to pass along some feedback on the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". I\'m sorry to hear the waistband is not holding its shape. Keep an eye out for an email headed your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'July 5, 2018'}

column6: I LOVE these leggings. I wear them for my spin classes, barre classes, pilates, runs, bike rides. literally everything. Ive had the blue tied color for several months now and they are still in perfect condition (i wash it on cold only with other lulu stuff of the same spandex material). I just recently got the black ones, and Im not regretting it one bit. I do regret buying other lulu leggings that are not these. They are so comfortable I feel like im not even wearing anything. They are thin but not see through. high waisted fit is amazing!! when leaning over, they don't fold over--amazing. For reference, I got my usual size 6 (130 lbs and 5'6"). @lululemon,I want these in a charcoal grey and an olive green, Thanks!! ;)

Yesterday I taught my class and ran over to our local Lululemon to snag a pair in sage. I wore them today to take a class on the megaformer. I sweat in that class and figured 2hrs after taking class that my pants would dry. BOY WAS I WRONG! I was so embarrassed when my 3yr old asked if I peed my pants because the sweat left a line across both of my thighs in the front. THESE ARE BRAND NEW! I haven't even washed them yet. I took a picture and will be sending it into customer service with a time stamp of when I purchased yesterday on 7/2 and wore to my class this morning on 7/3. I even have the text to my team not to wear these pants while teaching.

Bought these in Deep Phantom which is a beautiful, dark color alternative to Black. The fabric is very soft and comfortable. They have slight compression, but that is what I wanted for the summer. The high waist feels nice and once I put these on, they stay put during my barre class. I'm 5'4, 120 pounds and size 6 fits me well in these. Planning to try another pair in a different color.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Lisa32,\nWe're sorry you feel that way. We stand behind our quality, and we’d like to work with you towards a solve. Please give us a ring at 1.877.263.9300 so we can make things right. Chat with you soon.", 'LL_response_date': 'July 13, 2018'}

column6:
I was really excited to get these pants in brilliant blue because I had previously attempted to order a pair of Align pants in this color. I put the Align pants in my shopping cart, checked out, payed, & received an order confirmation. Two weeks go buy & no delivery. So, I finally called customer service and they basically said "whoops looks like we didn't actually have them in stock at our warehouse, sorry."
So then, I see that the In Movement pants are available in brilliant blue & immediately order. This time no problem with shipping, availability, etc., and I get them in a couple days, yayy! But, after one wash, these pants have already began to fray at the seam. Super disappointing :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Lyogi,\nThanks for checking in with us regarding the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We\'re bummed to hear of the undone seams you\'ve noticed on your tights and would love to help turn this around. Hang tight for an email coming your way! Chat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'July 1, 2018'}

column6: I was so excited to get these leggings. Looking at them and comparing it to my legs, it looked like a great fit, and the bottom of the leggings seemed to reach right above the ankle, which I like. But, when I tried them on, they stretched out a lot and the bottom almost completely covered my feet. Also, they were a bit loose at the waist and flared out at the top. This was also a smaller size than I usually wear. I really wanted to love these leggings, but they really didn't look attractive all bunched up in certain areas because of the length.

I am a lulu believer, I love the Align and the store in Montclair NJ has the best employees. I was trying to find a more practical pant for my crossfit workout. Love the look and comfort of these pants. They were recommended because the align kept falling during my Crossfit workouts. I felt so sweaty and looked so sweaty - like awkwardly sweaty in my class. I felt super uncomfortable. But they are so comfortable but the sweating was really uncomfortable lol would not recommend if you sweat --> which who doesn't sweat? lol

The fabric feels great and the style is flattering,but after wearing the legging for a short time it totally stretched out and it became baggy. I had to constantly keep pulling it up. Very frustrating
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.\nI\'m sorry to hear you\'re experiencing retention loss with your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We’d like to get to the bottom of this and work towards a resolution, so I\'ve sent you an email to follow up.', 'LL_response_date': 'June 29, 2018'}

column6: I've never believed the "these are falling apart after 2 weeks" reviews until now. I ordered these not even 3 weeks ago and already have loose threads. After 2 weeks of wear and washing correctly, there should not be threads starting to come apart. They're still wearable, of course. But when I spend $98 on something, I'm hoping for better quality. Other than the loose threads, I love these pants! I just don't think I'll be buying anymore.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'We appreciate your feedback regarding the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25".\nWe stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you\'re in gear that is performing well for you. I\'d love to lend a hand and help with some options, so I\'ve sent an email to you outlining the next steps.', 'LL_response_date': 'June 29, 2018'}

column5: Great at first but eventually falls apart
column6: I really wanted to love these. After doing extensive research on which pair of leggings and which material would be ideal for training, I set my mind on these. They were my first lulu investment since 2013!!! They were perfect when I first bought them. Fabric and fit were both amazing. I've had these for a little over a month and have worn them maybe 8 times. I took care of them as instructed, washed with only lulu items and always hung dry them - never in the dryer. Unfortunately the seams are coming apart!! Whenever I put them on I have to avoid threads hanging loose around the leggings in hopes of preventing the threads from coming apart some more. For how much these cost, they don't last as long as you'd expect.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear cefany,\n\nThanks for taking the time to pass along some feedback on the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". I\'m sorry to hear the seams on those pants are causing issues. Keep an eye out for an email headed your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'June 28, 2018'}

column6: When I went into the store and described what activities I do, these were recommended for me. Unfortunately, I don't like the inside lining of these leggings--they feel very hot and they stick to your body making them impossible to remove. Also, they stretch out super easily!!! The seams on the calf have become really stretched out and baggy in just 4 wears. Disappointed in the recent bad quality in a few of my Lulu pairs. I love some of them, and some of them have really missed the mark recently :((((((((
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear MeMe1234,\n\nThanks for taking the time to pass along some feedback on the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". I\'m sorry to hear the pants are not keeping their shape. Keep an eye out for an email headed your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'June 28, 2018'}

column6: Honestly - make everything feel great, they look great on too. Fabric is amazing. I have had these for 6-8 weeks now, probably wear once or twice a week, and wash once a week. The seams are all coming undone in the calf area to the point of a small hole appearing in one location. I am sitting here wondering what to order next, because I love LuLu products.. I just cannot order these, and the Wunder Unders don't seem to hold up against pilling, and there's nothing worse than that.

I love the fit of these leggings. I bought them because of that and the ⅞ length is perfect for my petite body. They look great on, however they wear very easily. I've only had these about a month, only washed a few times, never dried in the dryer, and the seams are already pilling. I had high expectations because of the price tag, as with all leggings made with the Lululemon name. I was let down with this purchase.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey littlelauren,\n\nWe appreciate your feedback regarding the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We\'ll be following up via email to discuss this further. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'June 25, 2018'}

column6: I love the luxtreme fabric. Lightweight, handles sweaty workouts better than any other fabric. That said, the fit has changed over the years, though the size chart and I have not. I would not order without trying on again. These and other leggings fit a full size larger than they did 8 yrs ago. Also, the thread is not good anymore, pills quickly. Color is beautiful and retains its color wash after wash. I'm personally not a fan of the super high waist trend and don't expect my pants to keep my stomach flat.

I absolutely love my Free to Flow leggings from Lulu and went into the store to find another pair only to find out they aren't made anymore. The sales person recommended these In Movement leggings and I'm so glad she did! I have them in two colors and they are the most comfy pants ever. I wear them for weight lifting (squat proof!), for aerial yoga, yoga, you name it! They are a great pant. I do not think there is a problem with the seams at all! I do think the seams attract lint so you kind of have to pick it off once it gets to be too much, but otherwise these are perfect! Once I put these on I forget I'm wearing anything, they are like second skin. Supposedly these are about to be discontinued, so stock up!

I loved the idea of these tights - the lines on the legs were fun and playful but when I wore them for the first time I realized they are made very very small and the "high waist" runs up to my boobs. I am 5'7" so it's not like I am short...I tried rolling them down but they are so dang tight I could not breathe. By the time I wore them it was already close to the end of the return period and I could not make it to the store before time ran out - I have tried wearing them again but after minutes of them being too high for me I get annoyed and remove them - sigh - waste
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Shands23,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. What a bummer, your pants should be helping you with your workout not holding you back! Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'June 22, 2018'}

column6: I absolutely love these tights! I wear these for everything from cardio, to weightlifting, to long study days in the library. I am 5'2, 117lbs and I always wear a 4 in lulu. These fit perfectly. While working out, the tights stay in place and I never have to worry about the waistband falling down. I never put my lulu tights in the dryer, so they stay nice and stretchy. Thanks for making these in more colors! I don't understand how people have such negative things to say about lulu's clothing. I have never experienced problems with seams from any of my lulu tights, and I have a ton of them.
I love Lulu and wanted to love these. They fit so well and are the perfect 7/8 length for tall girls (I'm 5'10"), but the seams are already unraveling. :( Bummer!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us.\nI'm sorry to hear of the seams unraveling that you're experiencing on your pants and can understand why you're not pleased. We're eager to make things right because we stand behind our gear, so I'm sending you a follow up email to continue the conversation.", 'LL_response_date': 'June 20, 2018'}

column6: So super bummed about these. I got them in black and have not washed them yet, worn only 3 times, and the seams are covered in pills/lint from other lulu tops. They look like I've owned them for a long time, color almost looks faded but its probably because every speck of dust clings to them. It's a shame, because the stitching is super flattering and it is a very soft material. I just think they look so beat up and sloppy and that's before even the first wash. Disappointed :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25".\nI\'m sorry to hear you\'re having such trouble with your pants! I\'d love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. I’ve sent you an email to follow up and help further.', 'LL_response_date': 'June 20, 2018'}

column6: I love lululemon and only work out in their leggings. However, these definitely stretched out and I am wondering if this is now a common theme in their leggings and I should size down from now on. They are very comfortable for just lounging around the house, but it's distracting when you need to keep pulling your leggings up during a workout because they are stretched out. I would not recommend for yoga or lifting or running because it will hinder your workout.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey LEXP,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. Nobody likes when their pants stretch out, and making things right for you is our priority. We're eager to work out a resolution, so I'm sending you an email to chat more.", 'LL_response_date': 'June 19, 2018'}

column6: I was very impressed with these leggings when I tried them out in store - I loved the naked sensation and how it felt like everything was tight and compressed. After a few wears however, the fabric bagged out and hasn't recovered its original tightness. Sad to have wasted the money on a pair of leggings that no longer fit and have to constantly be pulled up.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi sheson14th,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix. I\'m going to follow this up with an email that outlines how to move towards a resolution.', 'LL_response_date': 'June 19, 2018'}

column6:
I purchased these pants in store last week. They fit well and the fabric is soft and flattering, however; upon wearing these to the gym I was mortified when the entire back end became transparent while stretching. I bought the appropriate size and both women working at lulu recommended the size I purchased.
Upon further inspection the hem is fraying along the inner thigh. Not impressed for an expensive purchase and disappointed as I have already worn them once and cannot return. Will not be wearing again.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Summertimegirl27,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. Oh no, I'm sorry to hear your gear isn't performing as expected—I can understand the disappointment. Please be on the lookout for an email headed your way. It'll detail the next steps to take to resolve this.", 'LL_response_date': 'June 19, 2018'}

column6: Why all the bad reviews? I'm thinking this is so people can get coupons from Lulu's customer service team because Lulu is so awesome about hooking that up. IDK. I'm a full time fitness instructor in Denver, CO I've tried every brand of fitness clothing imaginable trying to find the perfect pants for teaching yoga, cycling and body sculpt up to 12 to 15 classes a week. I change yoga pants 3 times a day. No other brand compares to Lulu, the worst of their pants are better than the best of any other brand hands down. These are my new favorites they work for everything and this print is so adorable. I've washed mine and they are just fine they are not pilling or anything. I did go size 2 instead of 4, I'm a true size 3 as I'm 5'9" 128lbs I usually prefer 4s because of my bigger legs but my waist and hips are truly a 2 which makes sizing difficult. Size down in these. I read through these reviews and can't believe what some of these people are saying. I've got no skin in this game of buying pants, Lulu does offer me a discount for being an instructor but so do all the other companies and yet I still stand behind their products 100%.

I was thrilled to find such a comfortable pant in such a fun print. I'm a newer Lululemon customer, and I'd heard such great things - that the quality was worth the price. I was on board when I bought them but after only a few weeks, they're not what they were. The fabric / seams aren't holding up. I'm disappointed because I'd counted on these lasting a long time. For the price, and the quality I was expecting, these pants are a huge let down.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi WildRose1,\nI'm sorry to hear you're having such trouble with your pants! I'd love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I'll be reaching out shortly to connect.", 'LL_response_date': 'June 17, 2018'}

column6: I loved these so much as soon as I tried them on. They are a more supportive version of the aligns but after the first wear, the seams at the waist started becoming undone. Also sad that this happened 1. during my first wear and 2. when I wore them casually, not even for a workout! Now the top of the waist just keeps rolling down.

column6: When I first bought these, I loved them. They fit great, wicked away sweat, and looked awesome on both during workouts and on study days. However, after about a month I started noticed seams ripping apart on the bum and hip areas. I know I bought the right size and am just disappointed that I spent over $100. I love the other colours too but won’t take the chance on these again.

column6: I just started buying lululemons and fell in love with these pair of leggings/pants right away! They were so soft and comfortable and hugged you in all the right places. Not even a month later the seams on the side were coming undone and finally formed a hole! Since these were my first pair I made sure to follow all the instructions for washing them. I am very disappointment since they are so comfortable and came in my favorite color maroon. But for paying over $98 dollars I was expecting much better quality :(

Chat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'June 11, 2018'}

column5: $98 and the stitching is coming undone!
column6: I give it 3 stars because the pants themselves are buttery soft, very comfortable to wear and are the best gym pants. After reading all reviews I decided to give them a try despite all the negatives. After 5 months the seam is coming undone in the buttocks area. For $98 I expect high quality pants, however, I have experienced poor quality. I am disappointed for these pants were my favorite.
column14: comfort softness and easy to move in
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Thanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25".\n\nI completely understand why you\'re disappointed with this and I\'d love to help turn this around. I\'d love to lend a hand and help with some options, so I\'ve sent an email to you outlining the next steps.', 'LL_response_date': 'June 11, 2018'}

column6: I bought 2 pairs of these leggings after trying them in store and falling in love. Not even one month, and a few wears, later the seam has started to come apart in multiple areas. I used to have leggings from lulu that lasted years, now they cant even last a month. Seeing as these leggings run over $100 per pair they should be of excellent quality but I and very disappointed and do not intend on buying anymore.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi NursingA,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We want your gear to support your sweatiest pursuits, but it sounds this isn’t the case for you. Please be on the lookout for an email headed your way. It'll detail the next steps to take to resolve this.", 'LL_response_date': 'June 10, 2018'}

column6: I've had my pair for about two months and have religiously taken care of them the way the instructions say and yet the stitching has come undone and they are looser than when I first purchased them. I'm so disappointed since I fell in love with them when I tried them on. It's beyond my belief that for the price I paid for them, the stitching lasted two months while my cheap (but cute) leggings from old navy that were $30 are still perfect after two years of harsh washing and drying in the machines. I wish there was an option to upload images.

J'ai acheté ces pantalons de yoga lululemon il y a deux mois environ et après quelques fois porté, la couture de derrière au niveau des fesses a commencer à se découdre. Très décevant étant donner que ce sont des lululemon et considérant le prix, je m'attends à plus de qualité!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Bonjour marieelb21,\nMerci beaucoup d'avoir pris le temps de nous contacter à propos de votre expérience. J'entends votre déception et j'adorerais vous aidez. Gardez un œil sur un courriel à venir avec quelques solutions!\nOn parle plus tard.", 'LL_response_date': 'June 7, 2018'}

column6:
I was looking for long black tights to wear on a normal everyday basis. I've had these tights for a month and a half and I hand washed it only twice in cold water. I saw all the reviews so I was extra careful that I didn't damage these leggings... since you know you don't want to pay this much for them and throw them away soon after.
I've worn Lululemon for the last 8 years of my life, and I can agree with everyone here that the quality has gone down. Maybe it is a combination of expanding in different countries / outsourcing material from somewhere else. Every item that I purchased at Lululemon between 2010-2013, I put it in the washer AND even the dryer, no problem. It's only now after 5-8 years of wearing them that the stitches are starting to unwind itself. It seems totally reasonable, and I think I got my wear out of all of them.
I went into Lululemon, and with the help of an associate I purchased this. The associate recommended this for every day wear and I thought they were great. The material wasn't too thin and it seemed durable. Every time I washed it (ONLY two hand washes), my tub was filled with black-ish water. Great.. the color was coming off and my leggings were slightly faded. Not only that, some of the stitching on the left side of my thighs were unwinding itself.
I am so disappointed to say the least. Would I purchase anything at regular price ever again? Definitely not. Lululemon started from the bottom and reached the top, and now I feel as though they are not maintaining their excellent quality anymore.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi AliceL,\nI'm sorry to hear of the fading and stitching unraveling that you're experiencing on your pants and can understand why you're not pleased. We hear what a frustrating experience this must be and have sent an email your way so we can do some digging into this.", 'LL_response_date': 'June 6, 2018'}

column5: 2 months later they're so stretched out
column6: When I got these pants I thought they were the best I've ever owned. My first Lulu purchase and I was so excited! The pants seemed to fit like a second skin, they were tight and very flattering. 2 months later they're so stretched out they don't hold up anymore during my yoga practice (I wear them 1-2 times a week). I loved the high waist but it's starting to roll down as soon as I move. I'm so bummed out! Unfortunately, I live in Europe and got these on vacation in San Diego, so I can't even go to the store to ask for advice. Maybe if I got them a size smaller they would still fit, but the sales rep assured me they wouldn't stretch out and I should buy my regular size (8). I don't know if I would recommend these pants anymore, but if you want to try them order one size down!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi MayaAbby,\nThanks for taking the time to connect and share this feedback. I'm sorry to hear that your gear hasn't performed as intended and I'd love to help you find a fix. Keep an eye on your inbox for an email headed your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'June 4, 2018'}

column6: For someone who loves to read reviews to truly get an idea if I should buy the product, I really want to be honest with this review. I was really excited about these because they were my first ever purchase and I expected them to last me a really long time, especially for the price I paid for them. I wear them a few times a week and after I just take them out of the wash I find that the stitching has unraveled in the entire front seam after only 2 months since purchase. I'm really disappointed because I expected them to last longer and this is the second pair that I have already had to return for this issue. These leggings are very comfortable though and I would say a stronger fabric than the aligns, but definitely have the compression feel to them. And these can be used for any type of workout from my use with them. I truly wished they worked out for me.
column14: compression feel very soft and comfortable
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi kfw2000,\nThanks for taking the time to share this feedback. It's not good to hear about the stitching on your In Movement 7/8 Tight. I'd love to help you find a solution, so I've sent an email your way. Keep an eye on your inbox!", 'LL_response_date': 'May 31, 2018'}

column6: I own two pairs of the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux and I couldn't be more pleased! These leggings are great for working out (Beachbody On Demand/BBG/Elliptical/Indoor Cycling) and running errands alike. They hold you in well and the fabric is just sooo soft! I am dying for a pair of these in Vintage Rose - please add this color to the 7/8 lineup!
column15: threading unravels easier than my other pants

column6: I purchased these tights two months ago. After a few times wearing them they stretched out a ton, leaving room in awkward spaces that I never experienced before in my other Lululemons. Very disappointed because I absolutely love the fabric and the style. Had higher expectations for the In Movement Tight.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey AshJane,\nOh no, I'm bummed to hear you're not loving your In Movement 7/8 Tight! I'd love to work with you towards a resolution -- keep your eye out for an email coming your way shortly! Chat soon.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 29, 2018'}

column6: The sales rep who helped me pick out the right leggings for my day to day and professional use assured me these leggings would be just perfect. At first wear they were, fitting perfectly snug and were extremely comfortable. I brought them on vacation with me and on my second wear I found myself having to consistently tug them up. The waist band does not stay up- I have a sagging crotch after taking just a few steps in them and every time I stand up. I thought maybe after washing them as per the instructions, they might get their shape back however they are still way too lose around the waist. These leggings look great and at first they feel great, however they definitely have lost their shape way too quickly.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey hway,\nOh dear, I totally hear you, what's the point of pants if they don't stay on! I'd love to work on finding a resolution with you, keep an eye out for an email coming your way! Chat soon.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 29, 2018'}

column6: I bought these in persian blue after speaking with an associate in the store and confirming they would not show sweat. I do barre for my workouts, so we discussed that although its not a cardio intensive (aka super sweaty) workout, I was concerned some sweating might show through. Since these are made for yoga and lower impact workouts, she assured me they'd be great. I loved the material and color so I went for it and wore them not even 30 min after purchasing them to a barre class. Well.......it was horrible. My friend in the class actually told me it was distracting how clearly you could see the sweat. Butt sweat everywhere. It was so embarrassing. So upset I spent $100 on these and can't return them. I can't even wear them to yoga. I've got nearly 20 pairs of lulu pants and I've never had this problem.

Let me start off by saying I LOVE Lululemon workout pants for lifting, yoga AND Running. These pants looked great when I initially bought them, and felt even better. Just after one workout, the pants totally stretched out (I bought a size 6), and the top waist band started to roll inwards and the ankle part of the pants became very baggy. I feel as if these pants totally went from leggings to joggers within a 1 hour workout (probably should have ordered a size 4). Way stretchier than I thought, so I would say order one size down.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi LAnn121,\nThanks for taking the time to connect with us. It's not good to hear that your gear has stretched out. I've sent an email your way with some solutions - chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'May 28, 2018'}

column5: Cute pants but don't hold up
column6: I wear these pants for daily living and barre, and the seams are becoming completely undone on the inside. They also loosen up as you wear them which isn't supposed to happen with nice leggings. They held up well for a few months but the fabric and seams are low quality. I wish they lasted longer cause they're super cute!

I love the design and fabric of these leggings, but I've only had them for a week or so and already it's become loose. I'm constantly pulling them up, and whenever I walk, I can feel the fabric around my ankles shifting around. Initially, I ordered both sizes 4 and 6 online, and ended up returning the 4 because it felt way too tight and the 6 was the perfect fit. Considering these pants became so loose after a couple wears is disappointing..
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi there sl46,\n\nThanks for reaching out. I'd like to ensure your gear is providing long-lasting performance and lend a hand with your experience. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I’ll be reaching out to you shortly!", 'LL_response_date': 'May 25, 2018'}

column6: I love these pants! They are so flattering. Please consider making them in white!!!

column5: Sturdier, more athletic version of the Align pants
column6:
After purchasing a pair of Align pants and the stitching turning fuzzy, I was on the hunt for a pant similar in feel but with better material and longevity.
As soon as I tried these on I knew I had to buy them. They are so comfy with almost an airy feeling. They are stretchy and non-restricting, while also providing some shape and a secured feeling.
After wearing them to a workout for the first time, I couldn't help but notice that the edges of the key card slot in the back were a bit sharp when moving around. After taking them off after my workout, I noticed I had a bit of an irritation on my skin where the key card slot had been. Maybe it's just the pair that I got, but it's really upsetting because I love the fit of these so much!
column15: key card slot is a bit irritating

column6: I love how these feel so soft against my skin, but my only complaint is that the type of fabric tends to collect dust and hair like crazy! If you have a pet that sheds hair, have fun with hairy leggings! Otherwise these are great, especially for yoga or running. They stay up really well, no sliding down.

column5: Good but have become so stretched out
column6: I am always a size 6 in lulu bottoms, and when I tried these on in my regular size I loved the way they fit so much that I bought two pairs! They come up to a nice, flattering level on me and I really like the material. Unfortunately, they become so stretched out after a few hours of wear that I am always pulling them up. I bought another pair in a size down and they have been great, but I'm left with leggings that I can't wear. For some reason the black pair became especially stretched.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey monyyc,\nOh no, I'm sorry to hear you're having such trouble with your In Movement 7/8 Tight! I'd love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution -- keep your eyes out for an email coming your way, shortly!", 'LL_response_date': 'May 22, 2018'}

column6: I’m an athletic build and got a size 2. I have a size 2 align legging and it fits great. However, these won’t stay up. I love how high they are but they just won’t stay up. I like the material. It’s unfortunate that I have to keep pulling them up during my workouts. I expect a lot more from lululemon. I only wore them once so I can imagine how much looser they will be once I wash them. Darn!!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Jlibs,\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. I completely understand why you're disappointed with this and I'd love to help turn this around. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I'll be reaching out shortly to connect.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 21, 2018'}

column6: I love the fit and the material and I'd love to buy more of these. However, they are poorly made. The seam at the crotch started to come apart after only one wear. Then the seam at the inner thigh area, and after that it is the seam around knee. Each time I put them on I find a new place the seams come apart. I'm still wearing my lulu pants from 2012 and they are good. I got these last month and honestly I don't know how long they are going to last.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi CATQ,\nThanks for taking the time to share this feedback. I completely understand why you're disappointed with this and I'd love to help turn this around. Watch out for an email coming your way soon.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 21, 2018'}

column5: right size when i bought them now theyre way too big
column6: I bought these because i loved the feel of the fabric but within 5 wears they were waaaay too big on me, im not sure why, its a shame because now i never wear them because they look ugly because they are too large on me

I had mine for only a week before they felt way to big on me! I ended up going back and getting a smaller size!
I love the feeling though, and they are great for cardio/ spin classes! No balling at all!

I purchased these tights in my usual size just over 6 months ago and for the first couple of washes and wears they fit great, they were my favourite leggings! After this point they started to bag out significantly and now I can't wear them to workout without having to pull them up constantly. Were so good in the beginning but now they are not a favourite.
column19:
{'LL_response_content': 'Dear Victoriaaaa,

Thanks for making time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". I'm sorry to hear your gear isn't performing as expected—I can understand the disappointment.

I’ve sent you an email to follow up and help further.', 'LL_response_date': 'May 19, 2018'}

column6:
These were my first pair of lulu's and I was happy with how they fit in store. I usually run about a size 8, so that's what I got. I went home, and with a few wears they stretched out to the point where the waist band creates a ring around me and doesn't touch my waist. My pants also have a few holes in the left knee, but only on one layer. The leggings are wonderful until they stretch, and i'd recommend going a few sizes down.
Had them for a while, maybe 6 months.
