I'd like to ensure your gear is providing long-lasting performance and lend a hand with your experience. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I’ll be reaching out to you shortly!", 'LL_response_date': 'May 18, 2018'}

column6: Loved these leggings when I got them at first, they fit perfectly. But after wearing them only a few hours they started to stretch out in the most uncomfortable way. I feel like if you sized down in these you might like them more, but with this particular fabric/fit combination I wish I had thought to sooner. Wish I'd stuck to my usual Aligns!
I love lulu but the quality in the pants is not the greatest. I washed them once, hung to dry and there already Piling and coming apart in the seems :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi there CEEdee123456798,\n\nThanks for sharing your feedback. That doesn't sound right and I would love to help. Keep an eye out for an email with some solutions coming your way.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 18, 2018'}

column6: I loved these pants when I purchased them, they fit great and hugged just right. until I wore them for the second time and it felt as if they had completely lost their shape, I am not constantly yanking them up because they feel so loose. not impressed considering the amount I paid for them...
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi kjdmb12,\n\nThanks for reaching out. I'd like to ensure your gear is providing long-lasting performance and lend a hand with your experience. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I’ll be reaching out to you shortly!", 'LL_response_date': 'May 18, 2018'}

column6:
I am usually and 8 in Lulu
Get a size down!!! They are very stretchy!
But once you get the smaller size they fit great!
I have not worn them a lot yet to see what people are saying about them get more and more loose.
Hoping since i got the size down that they will last!
They are super cute and my butt looks great in them!

column5: Loved at first but was super dissapointed
column6: These tights have a super flattering fit and the material is really soft and comfy. However, after only a few wears ( not even a wash ) the seam inside the waist had completely fallen apart. Fast forward- I am now on my THIRD pair of these tights and keep having to exchange them due to this problem, although I have been following washing directions exactly. When I attempted to exchange these today I tried to exchange them for a different style, as these appear to all have this defect, but was treated quite rudely by the employee and said this wasn't allowed ( although I have been told in the past that store credit can be given ). I have many tights from Lululemon that I absolutely love but wouldn't recommend these at all.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi claire8537,\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We're sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I'll be reaching out shortly to connect.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 17, 2018'}

column6:
I might have never written a bad review even I have 30+ lulu products in my wardrobe. I love every pair I have and treasure them with right ways to manage them.
This one, however, made me disappointed so much since the day1.
It doesn't hold your body so well and most importantly attacks dust crazy.
Every time I wear this for the class, I feel so embarrassed and run away from the class after it's done. It's even worse around your bum area that it kinda makes me look really careless person too.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi Samishoo,\nThanks for taking the time to connect. We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix. Watch out for an email coming your way soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'May 17, 2018'}

column6: I absolutely love all of my Lulu's, I am a trainer and I wear them every single day and have never had a problem, I take very good care of all of them. Unfortunately it was not the case with these pants, in the store they fit like all my other leggings did, wonderfully, but after the first time wearing them they got extremely baggy, and no I did not lose any weight or body fat nor do I put them in the dryer. In less than a month of purchase and probably 3-4 times of wearing them all around the calf and ankles it got loose and the fabric actually stretched and I have to roll them up at the ankle to have them not hang over my shoe. Seams are also fraying.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi KambriaJ,\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. Oh no, I'm sorry to hear your gear isn't performing as expected—I can understand the disappointment. Hang tight for an email coming your way! Chat soon.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 14, 2018'}

column6: I was looking for a pair of tights that would be ideal to lounge around in and wear to yoga - the educator at my local Lulu store suggested the In Movment tights because of how soft and flexible they were. I tried them on in my usual size and loved the fit and feel, so I ended up purchasing them. What the educator failed to mention was the sizing. I have never had an issue with sizing before but these tights run big! They were practically sliding off of me during my yoga class. I wish I would have known to size down... If you are conisdering investing in these tights, definitely size down, or else you're wasting your money.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi LexaB,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I completely understand why you're disappointed with this and I'd love to help turn this around. We’d like to get to the bottom of this and work towards a resolution, so I've sent you an email to follow up.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 14, 2018'}

column6: I am so disappointed in these; I bought them based on a recommendation from a Lululemon sales associates and she said they felt hugged in but she recommended to size down. I went back a week later to purchase and had another sales associate tell me not to size down. I followed her advice. I bought in a size 4 and while they felt nice and hugged in initially, within a couple hours of running errands they were bagged out near the calf and knees. Really disappointed to have spent this much money on pants that don't even feel secure enough to wear to yoga.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey YogaGal227,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm bummed to hear about you're experience with our pants. Please be on the lookout for an email headed your way. It'll detail the next steps to take to resolve this.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 16, 2018'}

column6: Heard so many great reviews about this brand and wanted to give it a try. The fit of these leggings are wonderful. It is a very soft material and it conforms very well to your body. The color was perfect too. However, I was very disappointed with the quality of the material. I wore it once and realized it had a hole on the side at the stitching interface. For the amount of money invested in these leggings, I had higher expectations for these.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey there shortstuff2041,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your experience with us! We're bummed to hear about the hole in your In Movement 7/8 Tight and would love to turn this around. Keep your eyes peeled for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'May 13, 2018'}

column6: I was so excited when I bought these in the store, they where comfy they hugged the right places, then I went to take them off and heard a rip... The waist seam was ripping in many places. I was so sad and disappointed in Lululemon if I pay $108 for a pair of tights, obviously, you expect them to last a very long time. I wish I could still return but the store near me seems to run out of colours very easily, also I've only worn these 3 times!! Such a disappointment
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Yellow44,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your experience with us! We're sorry to hear about the seam in y our In Movement 7/8 Tight. We always want your gear to perform for you, so keep your eyes peeled for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'May 13, 2018'}

column6: These pants completely stayed put during a burpee box jump workout today. I was thoroughly impressed. I didn't have to tug or pull them up at all. I was a little unsure when I first tried them on as they felt a little snug. They have a decent amount of compression overall and are very secure around the waist, much different than my usual aligns. After one wash they relaxed just enough to make them perfect. I use these for CrossFit workouts. 5'5", 147lbs, muscular/athletic build, ordered a size 6 (same as aligns).

I ordered these tights when I was abroad and was SO excited to come home and try them on. I ordered the Blue Tied color which is gorgeous, and I fell in love with the fabric initially. They quickly became my favorite and most comfortable pair of Lululemon pants that I have owned (5+ pairs). I wish I could still say the same. Over the course of the last month of normal wear & tear, there is now a small hole in the middle of the calf, and the material seems to be pilling and snagged all over the front of the thigh. I never wear these for rigorous activities and am so upset that my favorite pair of leggings have fallen apart so quickly. I've never had problems with my other Lululemon products so this has been a major let down. Overall design and feel of the product would be rated 5 stars, but the issues with the material leave me with a 3 overall.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Rawirth,\n\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. I’ve sent you an email to follow up and help further", 'LL_response_date': 'May 10, 2018'}

column6: I was a little apprehensive to get these after reading some of the reviews and i wished they had pockets... but i am soo glad i got these- i loveeee them. They are soft like the aligns, but better for sweating. I really want another pair, but I'm waiting on more color options (army green... hint... hint...). Ive washed them a couple of times and they have been fine and I've done cardio and yoga in them- both times they were fine. I think the sweat does show, but if I'm working out i expect to be sweating and assume it will show in most pants that aren't black... As for fit i can see what people are saying about them getting a little loose, but honestly for me it isn't bad... so 10/10 just need more colors.

I purchased these tights two months ago. After a few times wearing them they stretched out a ton, leaving room in awkward spaces that I never experienced before in my other Lululemons. Very disappointed because I absolutely love the fabric and the style. Had higher expectations for the In Movement Tight.

I was really loved these leggings at first. I have short legs so I decided to get the 7/8 length. I really fell in love with these leggings. Then they started PILLING VERY BAD. After probably about 4 washes (cold water, without drying), the crotch and ankles became very baggy. Threads on the sides of the pants started getting loose. After about a month of having them, using them only for school and lounging, they got a hole. So for 98$ I am really not sure if I'm ready to buy another pair of Lululemon leggings.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi KyWard,\nThanks for taking the time to share your experience. I'm sorry to hear that your gear is not performing for you! I've sent an email your way so we can find a solution together. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'April 17, 2018'}

column5: Not Worth it After Two Wears
column6: I loved these pants the minute I tried them on and even asking around, my friends said they had lasted so long and loved them as well. Therefore, after buying them in the store (to make sure I had the right fit) I was quite disappointed that after two wears and a wash (I wash all my lulu lemon leggings together), the pilling had started. Additionally after a couple more washes, the leggings tore within the thigh. Maybe it was the pair I bought, but it's an understatement to say that I'm hesitant to buy another pair of lulu leggings again, as I certainly feel like my money was wasted!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey DomT,\nThanks for taking the time to connect. It's not good to hear about the pilling on your gear and I'd love to help turn this experience around. Keep an eye out for an email with some solutions headed your way.", 'LL_response_date': 'April 17, 2018'}

column6: These are a nice fitting pant and true to size. Very light weight and comfortable. The only negative is that they are lint magnets. I had them on for five minutes and they were covered in lint and hair. I have pets and was hoping they would be like the full luon material.. Still a nice pant though!

I wanted to love these pants. They were on sale, they fit amazing, make my bum look nice and they are so soft. The problem is they are not sweat resistant, and when I'm working out, you can see the sweat, especially in the crotch area, and is sooo embarrassing! I am a work out addict. I hit the gym, run, spin and do yoga (including hot yoga), so good leggings are very important to me, and now I can only use these for casual wear. So disappointing.

column6: Fabric/feel of these are amazing, so comfortable. The stitching is really flattering. However, I've worn them 5 times and they stretched out. A lot. They now awkwardly bunch at my ankles. Very disappointed about that. I'm still giving them 3/5 because they are so soft and (were) cute (until they stretched). I suggest getting like a size or two smaller. I'm 5'9" 170 and purchased size 10

column6: bought these off the we made to much and ordered my normal size. needless to say they are one of my favorites yet ! they don't stretch out after 30 minutes of working out and they are great for running too ! i tend to do activity that is a mix of different workouts and movements and these are right for all of them. i would order more if i needed any more pairs of leggings !

I bought these thinking they would be better than the align pants - but they're not! I love lulu, but these pants are just eh.. They're comfortable for the first couple of times you wear them, but after 3-4 wears they were pilling and stretched out. Spending this much $$ on a pair of pants should last for a couple of years, not just a month.

column6: I ordered an 8, I may need to size down but the fit - in the inseam - isn't good. Lululemon is notorious for getting the fit, in the um...inseam right and these are crooked so to speak. I pulled them up, then down, then up and it just isn't working. The fabric though is beautiful and the lines in them are very flattering but unfortunately these just don't quite work. My friend ordered them though and they were great on her, so it may just not be a great fit for me. These are going back.
I have these in another color and they are my all time fav! Just purchased the mach blue and the fit is off. Bought in my same size but these ones don't stay in place like my previous pair. :(
column15: fit-too big in the crotch and leg

column6: These were my all-time favorite Lululemon pants until about the fourth wear when they got saggy in the rear and the stitching on my calves started to unravel. I even sized down a size like the saleswoman told me to and they STILL lost shape. I'm disappointed because of how much I loved them at the start–they held everything in just right yet still moved with me.

column6: Loved the fit and design of these leggings so much! They fit well, and the fabric is so soft. But the FIRST day I wore them the stitching at the wait band started coming undone... I've only worn these leggings twice ever and they look like I've had them for two years. They constantly have dust all over them, even after using a lint roller they still aren't completely dust/lint free! I can't get over how dirty they look from doing nothing at all while wearing them. I wanted to love them soooo much... I just can't. I've been a long time lululemon wearing (over 9 years), and I can't help but notice the quality just keeps getting worse and worse.

column6: I absolutely love every item I have purchased from Lululemon but I am really sad with this purchase. I have asked people who own this item and they also agree with me that it irritates their skin, so its not my skin that is just sensitive. Also, all the other Lululemon leggings I own have been so comfortable and look good on me but this makes me look frumpy and short. Also, nothing ever sticks to my other black leggings except this one! It attracts so much dust. It is just sitting in my closet and I have only worn it less than 5 times. What a waste of money!

column6: I bought these tights because the salesperson told me that they were ''super fit'', that they kept their shape and that they perfect for movement activities. When I tried them at the store, I totally agreed with the salesperson: the fit was great and I just loved them. However, after only 2 washings, I realized that they have gotten loose and the stitching have come apart at the hips, even though I followed the washing instructions. I gotta say that I'm a bit disappointed about that if we consider the price of these tights...

column6: My first pair of lululemon, the size is not fit, too big for me. The biggest problem is that it attracts fur. Disappointed in the quality of the pants especially for the price paid, expecting better.... :(

When I first tried these pants on I was in love. They feel more sturdy than my aligns but are still so soft and the seams are really flattering. Unfortunately after wearing them to the gym for the first time they got so stretched out and were covered in lint. They look like I've had them for 10 years! I washed them following the care instructions and wore them to yoga a couple days later and had the same problem. I am so bummed because I thought I was going to love these pants but now they just sit in my dresser. If you're okay with the lint situation, I would definitely recommend sizing down in these.

column6: Really Disappointed with these leggings! I bought them in January because my friends raved about them! I didn't wash them until yesterday because I had heard horror stories about how these leggings fall apart when you wash them. Well, the horror stories are right! I washed them once and the seams are starting to fall apart and the fabric is junk. They were great when I initially bought them and didn't wash them, but now that I did they do not look like a pair of "high quality" leggings. I am not one to typically complain because I feel like it's a waste of time; however, I feel the need to since I paid $100 for them when I should have just bought cheaper ones. Loved them at first, but the quality shouldn't wear off after one wash! I washed it as directed and air dried them and they still got wrecked! Super disappointed and upset with the quality.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Odie328,\n\nIt's certainly a bummer to hear that your gear isn't working out for you. I can understand that this would be troubling. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'April 10, 2018'}

column6: Purchased these in my regular size 6 as the employees said to get your usual size. I tried on in store and they seemed to fit. I wore them once to yoga and they do stretch out! The crotch seems to sag and you have to keep adjusting them/pulling them up. SO SIZE DOWN ONE! These are super flattering and I really like the material. They do attract lint but a little less than the Aligns. Wish they offered exchanges even after one wear because you don't truly know if they are right until you wear them for a workout. Really want the size 4 and they would be my new favorite but cannot just purchase another pair because they're an investment. Sizing should be CONSISTENT throughout so people don't have to deal with these issues.

bought these pants a couple weeks ago and love them, however, after only wearing them a couple times, the stitching has unravelled at the waste. Disappointed in the quality of these pants especially for the price paid.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi sam909,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I would love to know more about what's going on with your gear. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'April 10, 2018'}

column6: Right after I purchased these leggings, I noticed immediately that the interior lining at the waistband was messed up, so it never lied flat and always made the leggings look wrinkled. I took them back into the store and got them exchanged, but the problem is even worse with this new pair. The lining is even more uneven, and although I got the same size, this pair is not tight at all and let go almost immediately. Disappointed in this purchase, as these are really expensive and I wanted them to last me a long time.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi cg2018,\n\nIt's certainly a bummer to hear that your gear isn't working out for you. I can understand that this would be troubling. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'April 10, 2018'}

column6: have had the leggings for around 3 months, worn a handful of times and minimally washed, seams are already coming undone and off around the waist of pants. would not buy again.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi krobe055,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I would love to help you out. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'April 10, 2018'}

column6: I loved these pants but on the 3rd or 4th day of wearing them, I had to constantly pull them up. I made sure I had the right size by asking the sales person to confirm, but I guess they stretched anyways. Also, the threading is already coming undone. Very unhappy with the quality considering how much I paid for them. They are extremely comfortable though.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey jmlst233,\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". Super bummed to hear you\'re not happy with your tights anymore and I\'d love to help turn this around. Talk soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'April 8, 2018'}

column6: These are my new fave lulus! The high rise actually stays high rise during all my workouts (plyos,running,lifting) I was actually surprised how well they stayed up during a run. They did kind of stretch a bit around the bum and knees, but if I sized down I feel like they would be too tight and not perform as well- or be see through. They're SO comfortable and make the booty look great!! For reference I'm 5'4 and 140lbs (smaller waist, big butt and thighs) and size 6 fits like a glove. RECOMMEND!!!

column5: Looooved them until they stretched out an entire size or more
column6: I've had the worst luck with lulu pants the past several months and have constantly had to return my purchases due to poor quality. As a result I lost faith in the brand and was so disappointed! However, I bought these recently and absolutely loved them. The high waist band is very flattering and so comfortable and they didn't fall down. I've had them about a month and now they feel like they have stretched out to a size 10 (they are a 6). The crotch sags down and I'm constantly pulling them up. Really disappointed and desperately wish I had bought a size down. I would recommend these but definitely size down!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey MW2018,\nThank you for taking this time to share your feedback with us. It\'s no good to hear that your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25" aren\'t fitting like they used to. Hang tight for an email coming your way! Chat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'April 8, 2018'}

column6: I bought these leggings the other day and was excited about them due to the great fit and soft fabric.. however, after wearing these twice the stitching is already unraveling.. they're never even been washed before! They also attract lint like none other but I was going to overlook that fact. These leggings are not worth the price.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Janette,\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. We definitely don\'t like hearing you\'re having issues with your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25", and I\'d love to help turn this around. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email.', 'LL_response_date': 'April 8, 2018'}

column6: I bought these at the store because the ed said they were like aligns but with an extra layer which was good for weight lifting and not having any issues with being see through. When I first wore them they were amazing, it was like I was wearing nothing. After a time or two of wearing them to the gym and while running, some of the seems began to come undone. When I wash them it is on the most delicate setting and they are never dried, yet every time I was or wear them more seems become undone and I can no longer wear them. I truly loved the way these pants felt and maybe I just got a bad pair but unfortunately, they are not able to be worn anymore.

I got this in size 6 since the last 2 pairs in size 4 that I got (lead the pack tight "28" and motionful 7/8 tight "25") came too tight on the waist like i had a difficult time wearing them and it gives me a muffin. I have over 20 pairs of lulu and i am a consistent size 4 except i noticed the last 3 pairs were tighter than the usual. The size 6 of this was ok in the beginning definitely, but what i found weird is the left side knee down was loose like theres space while the right side fit was nice. After a couple of hours they were baggy. I looooove lulu in general and I rarely complain but when you pay for over $100 for a pair you would expect quality to be great and consistency in sizing be present.

column5: I love these! Nice fabric and fit.
column6: I don’t know why there are such bad reviews of these pants. They are so flattering and comfortable. They stay up and fit great. I have 3 colors. Not tight in the ankle which can bother me with other pants. Annoying that Lululemon is always sold out in most colors of their pants. I’d like a couple more colors in these and the align pants.
I had high hopes for these leggings- haven't even had then 6 months and they are completely ripped at the crotch. So so so disappointed with the lulu quality!

column5: Love the feel, not the lint
column6: When I tried on these pants in the store, I fell in love with the softness of the fabric and the way they looked on. My only concern was that I did not want to buy leggings that would pill, as I have been through that issue before with some of my other lulu leggings. The employee I talked to ensured me that these would not pill because of the Everlux fabric, which is similar to the Luxtreme, and I was satisfied with that. Upon my first wear, I noticed that these leggings pick up EVERY piece of dust and lint that is even in the air. While I love the way they feel on, half way through the day I look like I have rolled around in dust!! It was incredibly disappointing to me and as much as I would like to recommend them for their overall softness and feel, I cannot because of the poor functionality of the fabric.

Loved these pants when I saw them on sale online... bought other pants (the studios and aligns) in the same order. These ones were very disappointing. If you are bigger than a size 4 don’t buy... the shape is just awful. I only have a small tummy but the way the band is it shows it and gives a camel toe. Loved the other pants I got, hate these. :(
column9: ANNAPOLIS VALLEY, ANNAPOLIS, SUBD. B, NS B0S 1M0, CANADA

We look forward to hearing from you.", 'LL_response_date': 'April 22, 2018'}

column6: I love lulu I stand by there gear for the most part 100 percent. But these leggings I have had since January and have only worn them a max of 4 times and the seams are unraveling and there is a hole in one of the seems. It is sad because i always upkeep my lulu leggings but these ones just didn't last. A waste of my money for sure.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey cheerleader19,\nOh no, I\'m sorry to hear your gear isn\'t performing as expected—I can understand the disappointment. We\'d love to hear more of your experience with your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". Please be on the lookout for an email headed your way. It\'ll detail the next steps to take to resolve this.', 'LL_response_date': 'April 4, 2018'}

column6: I have multiple pairs of Lululemon leggings (that I love!) and was excited about the look and fit of these when I bought them, however, after wearing them one time, they started to show everything. At one point they collected so much lent that my mom and sister asked about it and when I told them they were Lululemon leggings, they were shocked. I wanted to love these leggings. :(

Please be sure to give us a call at our Guest Education Centre on 1.877.263.9300 or you can always start a Live Chat with us on our website. We look forward to hearing from you.", 'LL_response_date': 'March 31, 2018'}

column6: I love these leggings so much! I have many different pairs of leggings from Lulu and these are my favorite so far. They are extremely comfy!! They are so soft and they feel like you are wearing nothing. A bit different from the Align's because there is a little more to them which makes it so that they don't feel like if you bend over everyone will see your bare skin. The stitching on them is also EXTREMELY flattering! Even if you don't have much of a booty, you will definitely feel like you have some curves wearing these babies. I love them so much I made my roommate go buy a pair. Fingers crossed they hold up and I have no problems in the future!

I was recommended these by the store associate as well and eventually ordered them off line because I loved the color and the look. However, as said in previous comments, after one wear the waistband has extremely stretched out and I have to continuously pull them up through my workouts, or even just wearing them around the house. This is pretty disappointing as they were so expensive. I do love the color and fabric, just wish the waist was made stronger.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey soph9,\nOh no! We definitely hear your disappointment with the performance of your In Movement 7/8 Tight and would love to help. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way with some solutions -- chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'March 30, 2018'}

column6: I fell in love when I tried these tights. In the change room the fit was honestly so perfect that I ended up buying a black pair and the blue tied pair in size 4 (Which is what I always get in tights). I bought them, give or take a week ago and after 2 uses the crotch area and well as upper hamstring/lower glute area (on both pairs) got loose. These tights I was told were supposed to have a "hugged" sensation and all though they were around my waist, calve, and quad, they loosened everywhere else. I would not recommend if you wanted a hugged sensation all around, especially glute area.

So first off, the first time I wore these leggings the seams puffed up a little bit. Slightly bothered, but it's fine. The leggings are still functional.
These are super comfortable, and I'm a fan of the waistband because it provides more tummy control in my opinion, however the MATERIAL LOVES LOVES LOVES DUST AND LINT AND ANYTHING FLOATING IN THE AIR AND ON SURFACES. I sat on my bed and now all of the lint is stuck on my legs so it looks like I have a crazy amount of fur all over my legs. I placed the leggings on my counter and it picked up a film of dust that I didn't even know was there?
I probably wouldn't rebuy these leggings and will continue to wear them, I'll just carry around a lint roller.

column5: Size down and these will be your favorite workout pants
column6:
By pure luck I went to try these pants on at my local Lulu store and instead of grabbing a size 6, I accidentally grabbed a size 4. I didn't even know that they were a size 4 until I asked the sales woman if they should be a challenge to get on and if she thought the pair I had on were too snug. Her response to me was "we always say the workout begins with trying to put your pants on". Not sure if the smaller size was right I went ahead and grabbed a 6 and found that the size 4 felt better and more secure. So I bought the 4 and put them to the test in my Crossfit workouts. Through jumping rope, squatting, running, and climbing ropes these pants have been AMAZING!! They completely stay in place and don't stretch out over the hours I wear them. So many of my other Lulu pants are size 8's and I'm constantly pulling them up during workouts. And now I know that they are falling down because they are the wrong size!!! I've been reluctant to get my pants too snug because I'm always afraid that if they are too tight the seams will begin to pull out. But now I feel like I've had the a-ha moment like all those ladies had when Oprah told them they were wearing the wrong bra size! I've been wearing the wrong size of pants and I have a whole drawer full of pants that feel terrible to wear after knowing what the right size of pant feels like during a workout!!!
I've noticed a lot of people giving these pants a lower rating because they feel like they stretch out during a workout. I think you have to get a size smaller than normal in these pants and if you do you will love them. They stay in place without cutting into my waist and the seams are flattering on all areas of the lower half of the body. I find myself constantly washing these pants so I can wear them more than once a week because they really are the best pants I've gotten from Lulu.

I was suggested to try these from an associate in the store. I needed tights that were durable enough to withstand cardio but dont have that compression feel, and fit more like an Align pant. These are it! Love em! They are high waisted, which is my jam, the material is soft and smooth but cooling. I get full range of motion no matter what im doing! I typically wear a 6 in aligns and got a 6 in these too. I think they are more flattering than wunder unders because of the stitching lines.

column5: So comfortable and flattering BUT did not last long :(
column6: A friend recommended these to me, and I finally bought some. I tried them on at the store and got the black ones, and I LOVED THEM. Afterward, I went home and wore them for the rest of the day, but when I went to change that night I noticed the seam on the top waistband had started unraveling and everytime I wear them now they seem to become a little less secure. Such a bummer now that they might not last very long :( just wish they were sown with better quality.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey annbvander,\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We\'re sorry to read of your experience with this item and would love to discuss this further. Hang tight for an email coming your way! Chat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'March 26, 2018'}

column6: I was super hesitant to purchase these tights after reading the reviews. However I really needed a pair that was good for both yoga and workouts and I loved the feel of these in the store, so I went ahead and got them. I sized down because of the reviews and to make sure they would stay fitted. After wearing them today after only one wash (cold delicate and hang to dry) I am saddened that I too experienced major stretching to the point where I had to pull them up every few minutes. Very disappointing for tights this expensive. Furthermore the thing about attracting lint is very true. All in all I very much regret purchasing these tights and I wish I would have listened to the reviews and gotten my favorite align pants instead.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi dolcedk,\nOh no! We definitely hear your disappointment with the performance of your In Movement Tight Everlux 25" and would love to help. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way with some solutions!\nChat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'March 25, 2018'}

column6:
I am a many years Lulu customer and i reluctantly concede a decline in quality in some products/areas which in reviewing this product i will not detail. But I still buy, wear and enjoy the brand because no other gives me the fit and fuction that lulu does even so.
I love these pants. The big test for me is when i don’t remember or want to take them off when i get home. They feel that good. I’ve used mine for spin, kettlebell, yoga, biking around, trapeze. I went from spin to the weight room feeling dry which is pretty amazing. For yoga they perform and feel like the awesome aligns but with more compression in the waist/belly area (and of course, more versatility). I take off one star because i feel the need to snug them into my crotch or else they will bag a bit there, but once adjusted pretty much stay put. i never ever feel they fall or move at all from my waist which almost any other bottom will do in trapeze.
On one quality note, I have in 8 years of buying Lulu and really beating it up bicycle commuting, i have never had seams fall apart. Not sure what is up with that with other customers but never an issue for me and not in these pants. I started wearing Lulu bottoms in 4 and shifted to size 2 at some point, under advisement. Works for me. I'm 118 and 5'6" with smaller hips to waist.

I got these leggings and I was IN LOVE with them. They fit perfectly and they are great to work out in. Then after only wearing them two times they started getting lint balls where the seams are on the side. This is REALLY aggravating because they were REALLY expensive and I expected them to not look old and worn after wearing them two times... I really love the way these leggings look and feel. I wanted to buy more lulu leggings to workout in, but for the price i'm really disappointed that they are already looking worn:( Also they seemed a little short for a 7/8, but i understand because I have long legs, so that wasn't a big deal.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hello ohKay,\n\nOh no, I'm sorry to hear your gear isn't performing as expected—I can understand the disappointment. I'm going to follow this up with an email that outlines how to move towards a resolution.", 'LL_response_date': 'March 24, 2018'}

column6: To be fair, these tights are super comfortable, but apart from that, they are not great. When I tried them on in the store, they fit wonderfully. I usually get a 6 in leggings and that's the size I bought. The 4 was a bit too tight, but the 6 fit great. After wearing them to my first workout, I was extremely disappointed. They constantly fall down and I spent a lot of my time trying to hoist them back up. They just won't stay put during use. If I didn't take the tag off of them, I would have returned them. I'd suggest getting another style of leggings.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey princessmia,\n\nThis definitely doesn't sound right. We stand behind the quality of our gear and would love to know more about your experience with this. Keep your eye out, an email is on its way.", 'LL_response_date': 'March 25, 2018'}

column6: I have always wanted to buy a pair of lululemon leggings brand new so I saved up gift cards and money to finally buy a pair. I made sure to look into the exact pair I would want and decided on getting these. I think my pair may be a dud and I am very disappointed. I have only worn them a couple of times but they seem to sag in the crotch area, the seams are already pulling, and they also seem to be cropped far too short to be considered 7/8 length. I would expect the quality for such a pricey pair of leggings to hold up especially since I have only worn them 2 times.

I ordered these pants in a size 4 initially, however, the waistband is tighter than on leggings such as the aligns or wunder unders, and fit a bit too snug. I was excited when my size 6 arrived in the mail and fit perfectly, but quickly became disappointed after wearing them for only a few hours. These pants constantly fall down and are not comfortable at all to wear for any sort of activity, even walking. Such a shame to spend so much money on a pair of leggings that will not be worn.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Havahug,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts today. We stand behind the quality of our gear and will be in touch shortly via email to follow up and help!\nChat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'March 21, 2018'}

column6: I got these pants in black in my regular size. I love them. I have washed them already a few times with my other lulu gear and no issues in terms of wear so far. These leggings are so flattering and feel amazing. I love the high waist and I had no issues with sliding down while I was working out. While I was in a kickboxing class, it literally felt like I was wearing nothing. They are so soft, smooth and sweat wicking! These are now my favourite pair of lulu leggings and I own at least 10 other styles. The only downside is that fluff does stick to the fabric a little bit but its pretty minimal. I am planning on buying another pair in the future!

column5: I wanted to love these leggings...
column6: When I tried these on they fit like a glove and was so excited to wear them to the gym. However during my FIRST workout I was constantly pulling up my leggings from the legs and could feel them falling down... The fabric is soft and comfortable, I love where the pocket is, but they're so loose! I feel at this retail price point this is unacceptable. I've worn them, so I can't even return them. These are my third pair of lululemon leggings, first two being the align, which I love, so I thought I'd give these a try. Very disappointed...
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Rioux12,\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux. I'm sorry to hear they didn't perform as expected. We'll be following up via email to discuss this further. Speak soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'March 20, 2018'}

column6: I was super excited for my first pair of Lulus after hearing tons of positive reviews. These fit like a glove and feel awesome during my workouts but I'm disappointed that after only a few wears I'm already seeing the seams come undone and the quality of the fabric wearing away :( I've been sure to wash them as per the directions and was just not expecting them to wear so quickly.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi racheltf12,\nOh no, I'm sorry to hear your gear isn't performing as expected—I can understand the disappointment. To carry on this conversation, we've sent you a follow up email.", 'LL_response_date': 'March 19, 2018'}

column6:
I am not sure about the negative comments for these pants. This was my first purchase and I'm impressed! I'm petite so these pants are more of a full than 7/8th on me.
Con: It can be a struggle to pull them up through the hips, and the stitching is not durable. They break easily if no pulled up in a certain way.
Pros: Once in place, it does not move! I have worn them for HIIT, weight training and yoga. Even my Nike training pants don't stay in place like this does. I can't speak for sweat staining (maybe because I have the dark berry shade) but it doesn't feel uncomfortable with sweat (I don't sweat as much). Flattering fit and the high waist is also very comfortable.
I could see myself wearing them all day had taking them on and off been a little easier, but maybe that's why they are perfect for working out (at least for me).

A recent Lulu convert and have loved my Align and Fast and Free products; these pale in comparison. Several seams along waistband, inseam, and ankle started pulling after just one wear in the car. The in-store staff easily swapped for another pair, however, with just two wears I’m again experiencing undoing of seams, pilling, fading, and stretch (despite hand washing and drying). These are poor quality in comparison to other stellar items I’ve owned (from Lulu and elsewhere). They collect dust/hair immediately, looking faded and inexpensive. Disappointed with the purchase given such a high price point. Can only wear these around house- unfortunately would not recommend.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey rmw925,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I\'ll be reaching out shortly to connect.', 'LL_response_date': 'March 15, 2018'}

column6: I loved the color I was able to get them in (Aeon) However the fabric attracts every piece of lint and fuzz making it impossible to keep them looking nice. They are also pilling pretty badly between the legs even though I have only worn them for everyday use a few times (no working out) which is pretty disappointing. For the money I wish I had just stick with the Wunder Under in Luxtreme. Most of my purchases have been made in store so its easier to know exactly what your getting that way I guess it makes me think twice about purchasing online and the closest store is unfortunately about 2 hours away!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey ALLAJ,\n\nI'm bummed to hear of the pilling you're experiencing with our pants. We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix. I’ve sent you an email to follow up and help further.", 'LL_response_date': 'March 15, 2018'}

column6: I tried these on in-store a few weeks ago and loved the fabric and fit. After one wash (cold, delicate cycle, hang dry), they stretched out just a bit but still fit decently well. I wore them again today after a second wash and couldn't believe how differently they now fit--saggy in the butt/thighs and gaping in the waist. I had to pull them up after every single set of exercises and every few minutes during stationary cardio. Certainly not the quality I expected, especially at this price point.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey emgoblue,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts on In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. We have sent you an email outlining a few options.', 'LL_response_date': 'March 15, 2018'}

column6: Whatever they did to change the material is AMAZING. The new pair I just got is smoother and doesn't pill like my first pair of these did. It holds in my stomach and thighs perfectly without being too tight or suffocating. I love the super high waist, very flattering in crop tops. I also wear these to spin and to the gym and have minimal issues with having to pull them up all the time. My normal size 6 is a little snug on me which is actually perfect because the waist isn't super stretchy so I feel tight.

I got these pants a month or so ago in store, full price, and they were great the first few wears, however after washing them only a few times (cold wash and hang to dry) they no longer fit because of the amount they've stretched. I wanted to love these pants as I do my other lulus, and I did the first few wears, but unfortunately I no can no longer wear them as they don't stay up due to the fabric giving and stretching.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey ernie97,\n\nWe appreciate your feedback regarding the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I\'ll be reaching out shortly to connect.', 'LL_response_date': 'March 14, 2018'}

column6: I have bought a lot of lulu leggings, and these are currently my favorite pair. I got them when returning another pair that I didn't like because they wouldn't stay up on my waist while running.These do have a slighty tighter waist when getting over my butt and hips, but the waist band doesn't fall at all while I'm running or in hot yoga. I got the black, and wear them casually too. They do collect some lint around the waist band, but I haven't experienced any actual pilling. Though, all my leggings collect lint.

column5: Stretched out, seams pulling, and itchy pocket...
column6: I bought myself this pair of leggings full-price in-store in January after a salesperson highly recommended them. I'm usually a 6/8, but she recommended I try on an 8. Loved the leggings initially in the dressing room and bought the 8. Fit well and looked beautiful. I have now tried to wear them 3 different times, and they stretch out so much while wearing that I am constantly pulling them up. I have washed them only a few times (machine wash cold with other Lulu items and hung dry), but I have noticed that the seams have started to pull. Also, I find that the the back pocket for your phone itches my lower back while working out. Beautiful soft material and love the colour, but am really disappointed as I rarely buy myself Lulu anymore and was looking forward to spoiling myself. My older leggings have held up much better than these and I have had them for years. Would not recommend this tight. :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey kenziekennedy,\n\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. We hear where you're coming from and I'm sorry to hear your pants haven't held up for you as expected. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I'll be reaching out shortly to connect.", 'LL_response_date': 'March 13, 2018'}

column6: I purchased my leggings in the nocturnal teal color in size 8. I am normally an 8 in my other lulus and these fit perfectly. I love the compression feel on the stomach area, and the color is the perfect pop of color without being too loud and drawing too much attention to my legs. My only wish is if they could have the gusset seams that the align pants and all the right places pants have, as these give slight camel toe! That won't stop me from wearing them though, can't wait to see how these hold up.

These are amazing!! I wear size 6 in all bottoms, and size 6 in these are perfect for me (5'8, 145, slim/athletic build). The fabric is comfy like nulu, soft to touch like luon and durable like luxtreme. Heaven!! I got Black and Redwood. I will be buying more.

column5: like em, but attract a lot of lint
column6:
These are nice for hot yoga, breathable material, fit me well. My only issue is they always attract so much lint and hair :(
I like them, but they're not my favorite pair of lulus.
I looove the nocturnal teal color though, I wish more pairs came in it!

column5: Great leggings for all the time
column6: I bought these leggings in Mystic Green and I am totally in love with the color. I tried the Wunder Under Full-On Luxtreme tights first because I didn't want the "athletic-looking seams" on these leggings and didn't like the material so I bit the bullet and got these instead and I love them. These bottoms are so, so soft and couldn't be happier with the switch. I wear these often and haven't noticed any stretching or other signs of wear so I'm hoping that means they will be part of my wardrobe for a long time! I have washed them already a few times (according to the tag instructions, of course!) and they have come out perfect every time. They do a great job of wicking away moisture and keeping me dry and comfortable. I prefer my leggings to fit comfortably and snug but not tight so I purchased a size 6 (hips measure about 36 inches) and they're perfect--I'm not tugging anywhere during the day at all. Also, being on the shorter side, these bottoms are true pants on me (they reach my ankles and don't bunch up--I am about 5'2"). If you're on the fence this is your sign--Buy them!

column5: Great pants that stretched out way too much
column6: When I first got these, I was super excited to use them. The fabric was super soft, but seemed more durable than the Align pants. I couldn't wait to use them at the gym. After only a few workouts, it feels like the pants have stretched out to the point where they look awful. I bought my usual size, but I should have definitely sized down. They sag in the bum, crotch, and the leg area. The fabric gathers and bunches and is very unflattering, and I am constantly pulling them up. I think they may have been an OK pant in a smaller size, but unfortunately no one told me to size down when I bought them. They have gone unworn for weeks now and I am so upset.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey booboo93,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry you\'ve experienced retention issues with your In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25", that is definitely a bummer and I totally feel for you here. We\'d love to discuss this further with you. Look out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'March 10, 2018'}

column6:
I have been wearing lululemon bottoms for years on and off. This was a recent addition on top of my aligns, speed up, fast and free, and studio pants.
Before purchasing, I've tried all of the styles that I don't own and decided on this based on educators' recommendation and feel. I genuinely loved this at first.
However, these stretched out, lost its shape and feel after 2 wears - and I didn't even wear it to the gym, just as "pants" running errands, going to school, work, etc.
I washed these according to instruction - in cold water, without fabric softener and only with other lululemon leggings with similar fabric.
Now its a size bigger, doesn't feel like its holding in anything, and slide down.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey infinitize,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the In Movement 7/8 Tight *Everlux 25". We hear where you\'re coming from and I\'m sorry to hear your pants haven\'t held up for you as expected. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email.', 'LL_response_date': 'March 7, 2018'}

column5: Love the feel, not the fit (wish I would have sized down)
column6: I was so excited to purchase these pants when they first came out. I tried them on before purchasing and went with my normal size 8, but I wish I would have sized down in these. I absolutely love the feel of the fabric and the light compression. After wearing these a couple of times, the fit started feeling funky. They seemed stretched out and I am CONSTANTLY pulling them up. So even though I purchased them to practice hot yoga I don't wear them... it's so annoying to be constantly adjusting your pants when you're trying to focus on your flow. I think a smaller size would have worked better in the long run. I wore them recently to teach vs. practice, but still have the same problem with having to pull them up. My "In Movement" pants keep moving where I don't want them to move instead of staying put and moving with me. So if you're in between sizes, I'd definitely recommend sizing down.
column15: fit after wearing a couple of times

column5: Not my favorite Lulus - odd fit on me + stretch out during my workouts!
column6:
Just got these and wore them for the first time today. I was in between sizes in this style (I normally wear a 4 in most leggings (Aligns, Wunder Unders, Fast and Free etc.) but occasionally a 6 in things like the Train Times) - my normal size 4 was a little uncomfortable around my butt with the stitching so I sized up to a 6 which fits okay, a little big but I had no choice as I didn't want to be uncomfortable. Now I am thinking maybe I should have stuck it out because after my first workout in these I am done with them. They really stretched out throughout the day wearing them but ESPECIALLY once I started sweating in my gym session at night. They are a slick feel inside the pant and they kind of just slid down my body the more I moved.
These just may not be the right cut for me for a legging. Really sad about it as I have over 40 pairs of Lululemon leggings and this is one of a handful that just isn't working for me. I don't feel like I should have to buy a pair and be uncomfortable until they stretch out which is why I sized up but the waist is so big on these and they aren't as stretchy as some of the other fabrics. Also with the back slit pocket I have a lot of extra material in the waist in the back. I just have a larger butt and hip area in comparison to my waist. Not sure if it's the material or the cut that doesn't work for me but any ladies with a similar body type (bigger butt/hips/thighs) may find they have this same issue.
On a positive note...they don't feel like they will pill - or if they do it won't be for many wears. Did about 25 mins of cardio in these as well as wearing them all day and not a fabric ball in sight!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey yesThatholly,\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts. It sounds like you've had a less-than-thrilling experience and I'd love to help! Keep your eye out for an email from us shortly -- chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'March 4, 2018'}

column6:
These tights are awesome but I do have few tips. First, I would definitely size down if you are between two sizes - I am either a 6 or 8 in everything lululemon, and wear a 6 in anything nulu/nulux (aligns, WUs and fast & frees); I'm an 8 in anything full-on luxtreme (train times, speed up tight, etc). I've tried these on in store in both 6 and 8,
and the 6 is definitely a better fit, especially since there's no drawstring to tighten the waist. I'm 5'6, 150lbs, waist 28" and hips 38" so I do have a small waist compared to my hips. The In Movement tight in size 6 perfectly hugs my waist and my muscular calves & thighs, and the length is just right. I've worn these for HIIT where I'm jumping all around and then for weight lifting and they are PERFECT, do not budge and the sweat-wicking capability is awesome. I spilled water all over them and it dried within minutes! I love the Everlux material and find it way superior to the Nulux. Please make more tights in Everlux!!! Anyway, the stitching has held up so far but I've just hand washed them and hung to dry a few times, so I'll keep an eye out for any quality issues there. LAST BUT NOT LEAST: Sheerness. We all hate leggings that are sheer/don't pass the squat test, right? Well - I tried these on in "nocturnal teal" and black in the store, and BOTH were sheer on the booty in a full squat in a size 6. When I sized up to an 8 they were less sheer but the waist was loose and I knew they would stretch out quickly. I took the chance and ordered them in nile blue and the dark red shade online, and both of those are NOT sheer at all in a full squat. My suspicion is the darker colors are more prone to sheerness on a full booty (lol) so just take that as a warning if you like a snug fit & have a slightly larger than average behind. Oh I also picked up the black & white chirasu print in store recently and they are great too! The print does look a little stretched out over my curvier areas but not in a very obvious way, and they are not see through in a full squat either. Hope that helps!
column14: dries quickly nice snug fit sculpts body
column15: some colors (black noc teal) more sheer in squat

column6: hold their shape, no slipping while working out. absolutely love these leggings!! i have them in 2 colours and will probably soon own them in 3 or more! hope they always carry these leggings. only downside is they don't have pockets other than a small backside waistband pocket. other than that love love love them and would totally recommend to anyone!

column5: Stretched out after a couple wears
column6: Loved the way these fit and felt when I first got them. However, I wore them twice before I constantly needed to pull them up mid class. They have lost its shape very quickly and do not hold up well. I can only imagine what they'd be like if I wore them to a bootcamp/crossfit class. Really disappointed.

column6: I bought two pairs of these leggings and both fit well on first try, I love the 7/8 tights and the colours, but they ended up getting very loose and I am constantly pulling them up. The seams on the waist band of one pair fell apart after the first day of wearing them. I wouldn't buy these ones again, I would stick with the Wunder Unders or Speed Up tight.

column6:
Tried these pants on and fell in love! I thought they were very flattering, comfortable material and hugged my body in all the right spots.
The downfall, I noticed the pants stretch out about half a size or more after 2 high intensity workouts. It's to the point where the crotch area drops about 4 inches and sags..

For reference I am a size 2, so I don't believe I can go any smaller.

column5: Not as great as I had hoped
column6: While I really loved the feel and fit of these leggings when I first tried them on, after wearing them a couple of times to my hot yoga classes, I found that there were a few flaws that stood out to me. First of all, they are very thin, thinner than my beloved align leggings, and they really do show everything. Secondly, while they may be sweat resistant, I still found that sweat would show through in certain spots which are never a good sign. Thirdly, I can already tell that the tights, as well as its seams, are getting loose which is unfortunate. These are definitely not worth the expensive price. I will have to stick to the aligns.

Speak soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'March 2, 2018'}

column6: Felt good when I first put them on so I took the tags off. Now regretting that because they fit much looser than my other pants of the same size and they fall down constantly... I think they'd be good pants if I sized down.

By far my favorite pair of leggings to spin in, coach in, and work out in. They are snug yet breathable. I highly recommend these for anyone working out indoors or outdoors - especially someone who does cardio at high intensities.

I wanted to give these leggings another try but have failed once again. When I try these leggings on initially, they fit perfectly in the store. Once I wash them they become very baggy. I even wash these separate from my other lulu pieces. All pieces always on the cold delicate cycle, as instructed. Some say try sizing down, but I do not feel comfortable in the ones that are a smaller size. I wish they did not change after washing, because I absolutely love them when I try them on at the store :(

column5: One of my faves so far!
column6:
recently had to replace a pair of my lulu leggings due to pilling, and an educator ended up choosing these for me in black. so far, I am OBSESSED, but time will tell!
I have had them for a few weeks, and they have been washed. they seem to be holding up well so far. The In Movements are SO soft, feel like I am wearing nothing, and stay up way better than many of my other pairs of leggings. have recommended to both of my sisters :)
As far as I can tell, they are true to size.

I'm disappointed by the poor quality of the stitching, and hope that lulu will take them back even though they are worn once. Not impressed.

I just got these pants today & couldn't wait to wear them to my Muay Thai class.
They stayed put the entire time, I did not have to pull them up or down...which is VERY rare with any pants in my case.
They are light, soft and hold you in.
I LOVE them, I am buying more this week as they are the best in my "gym pants" wardrobe.
STRONGLY RECOMMEND.

They are so soft and comfortable I love them except for the fact that I wore them one time and washed them (in cold water with only other lululemon and no fabric softener) and one of the seams completely fell apart. column5: These are my favorite lulu pants for reformer pilates!
column6:
These are my favorite pants to wear to reformer pilates, hands down! Unlike the Wunder Unders which occasionally shows sweat (ahem, you know what I mean), these don’t have that problem. They’re soft, flattering, and perfect for any pilates based activity (or yoga, for that matter). There’s no zippers or buttons or odd seams which might cause discomfort during rolling exercises. They’re just the right amount of compression, not too much.
I’ve owned multiple pairs of workout leggings over the 15 years I’ve spent teaching in the fitness industry, and these are my absolute favorites!

I'm extremely partial to the Align Pant & Crops, however I branched out and bought a pair of the In Movement 7/8 Tight Everlux. The feel is pretty similar to the Align and even has a better look, but be prepared to carry a lint roller with you if you purchase these in the color black. Absolutely everything sticks to them! I had to lint roll my pants before attending yoga because I was embarrassed by how much lint got stuck in between class and yoga practice. I've owned these pants for months and I think I've worn them just around three times. It's a shame! Also, in the short amount of times the pants have been exposed to light wear, they've managed to snag at the top creating a loose string. I love Lululemon and I believe they sell better pairs of pants for the same amount of money.
The pant is really cute, however I find that they are not practical. I never find myself wearing these and that is why I am leaving a review.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey klscq9,\nThanks for taking the time to share this feedback. I sometimes have an issue with gapping at my waist, but these fit very well and I like the waistband pocket in the back. Already ordered them in another color. Definitely recommend!

However, after wearing them to one barre class they've become saggy and are too loose around the waist and ankles. I cannot wear them to work out in and considering the return policy am stuck with expensive tights I cannot wear.

column6: Who doesn't love the feel of Align pants - well these feel just like them! So so soft and I love the color I got, Mystic Green. It's so pretty and feels amazing. I'm so happy, I want all the colors!

I have been buying workout/lounge pants from Lulu for 5 years and these pants are by far my favorite. I am 5'3", 130 pounds and the 6 fits great (my size in all Lulu items). The waist is high (belly button area) which is great because they stay up - I am not hiking them up every ten minutes. They are sweat wicking - and I sweat a lot - so that's saying something. They look really nice too, I get lots of compliments on them. I use them for: yoga, running, barre, and lounging (also very comfy). Great job Lulu!

I bought these pants about 2 weeks ago and I've literally worn them every time I go to the gym. They are super soft and it feels like I'm not wearing anything at all. They are also squat proof, which I absolutely love. I have washed them a couple of times (I always let them air dry) and they still feel and look great. The only reason I gave this a 4 star rather than a 5, is because I feel like I could have sized down from a 6 to a 4 since the waist part is a little loose and I keep having to pull them up. With that being said, I would recommend sizing down.

Let me tell you I WAS IN LOVE with these from the moment I put them on, they are so comfortable perfect in all the right places...but like I have read on other peoples reviews the right leg is ALREADY fraying and the seams in the crotch on the front from the first time I put them on. SUPER DISAPPOINTED! I was seriously about to go back and buy all the other colors- but then this happened. For the amount of money spent they are not worth them already being frayed especially from just wearing them around and not working out.

column5: Horrible Material, Even Worse Customer Service
column6:
Short Story: The material is awful. It's sticky, holds in heat and leaves VERY visible sweat marks.
Long Story: I bought these last week for yoga/hot yoga/running. I wore them for the first time today and the fabric was awful. It held in heat, sweat, etc. It wasn't at all breathable or sweat wicking and generally lacked in every area that Lululemon pants are usually known for. I went online to set up an exchange/return and was told that since I wore them, they won't do anything. I talked back and forth with Customer Service, explaining that the fabric wasn't performing well, and they said
"This may not be the decision you wanted to hear, but that is our return policy! If there is anything else you need help with, please don't hesitate to contact us via Email, Live Chat, or Telephone 1.877.263.9300.
Best Regards,"
Soooooo diappointed.

column6: I am an avid Lululemon supporter and I was on the fence about buying these in the first place but decided to give them a try. The Everlux fabric feels great but it collects soooo much lint, hair and other particles. I am a little bit of a neat freak so I knew from the start that it would bother me. I wore them one time at the gym and also found that they stretched out after a few hours. I called my local Lululemon store to see if I could still return them (I had the receipt and price tag but had already taken out the tag with the size on it) and they told me that they could not be returned even though I had worn them once. column6: I was SO excited to grab myself a pair of these pants last weekend. I am a size 4 in EVERY pair of lulu pants and these do not fit! They are way too big!! A great pair of pants and they are SO soft but the sizing is off! They fit much larger than any other pair of pants I own. Super disappointing as I was looking forward to trying a new pair.

I have this in two colors. I really enjoy the feel and it is sweating wicking for the gym. However, I do think the stitching is a bit high in the back so it is unflattering on my rear. But they are functional for my activity. Love the everlux fabric!

These tights are everything you'd want in a tight: soft, flattering, and SO cute, with all of the colors that they come in. I bought them in black and was so excited to wear them to the gym. I got there and was in the middle of a workout with my boyfriend, when he asked me if I knew my pants were see through. I was absolutely mortified!!! Thankfully, lululemon is always great with customer service. I was able to return them with no problems, but I am still disappointed in the quality of these when I was so excited to wear them.

These are the perfect cross between the Align pant (they have that super soft, "naked" feeling material) and Wunder Unders. They're super comfy, have a slightly hugged feeling, and are appropriate for moderate exercise. I'm 5' 6" and these are exactly the length I usually have full-length pants cropped to, they hit me just above the ankle.

I've bought multiple pants from Lulu before but this is the first pair that I've seen with such low quality. I've worn this pair of pants exactly twice: once around the house, and once outside to run errands. By the second time I put them on, the stitching on the seam in the waist came loose. I have two spots with a long strand of stitching that I cannot cut since it will keep pulling, and they are too long where it gets caught and will continue pulling. I did not even put it in the wash once yet and I'm scared to now, since it will continue to pull the seam. I'm very disappointed with this pair of pants.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey Tamzzz,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts with us today. We stand behind the quality of our gear and will be following up with some solutions via email.', 'LL_response_date': 'February 11, 2018'}

column6:
I am on my third wear of these leggings and I am a very satisfied customer. I’m a college student and I bought them to wear around campus and for group fitness classes. This is my second pair of Lulu leggings; the first being a black pair with side pockets. I am 5’3” with an athletic build, and I wear size 6 jeans in several brands. Lululemon’s size 6 has proven to be accurate for my body. I am also pleased with the pant length. Usually I find myself cuffing my jeans, but I don’t like to do so with athletic pants. These leggings hit right above my ankle bone which I find stylish, preferable, and most importantly-unnecessary to cuff.
As previously discussed, I enjoy taking group fitness classes and these leggings are a great addition to my workout collection. So far I have only worn them in the winter and while they wouldn’t be considered as winter attire by themselves, I can walk to my fitness and academic classes while still being reasonably comfortable. Normally I prefer to wear shorts while working out, but I have found them to be breathable enough that I can get through class while maintaining a comfortable temperature. I have only worked out in them once, but they did a satisfactory job of wicking away sweat considering how damp indoor group fitness classes get.
Also, as far as comfortable on-campus attire, these are the softest pair of leggings I own, even when compared to other reputable brands such as Victoria Secret, Nike, and Under Armour. This brand of leggings also keeps their shape after continuous wear, while still being extremely flexible. Nothing is more annoying than constantly having to pull up your leggings throughout the day. So far this has not been a problem.
In regards to durability, as mentioned before, I was very content with the black pair I had previously purchased. Even after numerous wears and washes in the last year, the black has stayed at its darkest shade and the stitching has held up. Speaking of color, the “mystic green” in the photo of the pair I most recently purchased is extremely accurate to the real color. I find it to be a very attractive neutral shade, which is great if you are looking for a pair of leggings that you can match with several tops.
I’ve only had this new pair of leggings for a month, but I anticipate this pair also holding up. Although they are a higher-end legging, I consider them to be a worthy investment and as well as a wardrobe staple. I hope you found this review helpful, and that if you choose to buy this product you are equally satisfied.

Bought these pants a couple of weeks ago, so i've only worn them about 3 times. I love the color and feel!! They are super soft, stretchy and oh so comfortable. Even my yoga teacher has the same pair and she was raving about them too. My disappointment/complaint is that the stitching is unraveling at the waist on the inside seam???!! Disappointed that i paid over $100 and they are falling apart after a few wears! I also ordered the crop version earlier this week (before i noticed this), so hoping they don't start doing the same!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Nashville,\nThanks for connecting with us. I'm so sorry to hear your In Movement 7/8 Tight is not holding up for you. column6: I decided to listen to the sales girl who recommended I size down. They were a bit tight on the first wear but I would say they stretch out 1/2 -1 full size. I haven't wasn't yet so I can't comment on the seams or pilling. Super comfy so far. Seems to be anything the align pant is made out of ( nulu,nulux,everlux) stretches out.

I purchased two pairs on the in the Movement 7/8 pants. I loved the way they felt at first and the style and color selection. After wearing them to the gym and working out with them they collect so much lint and do not give enough support for me with my workouts. I am disappointed with these pants.
column14: the feel and color choices and style

column6: J'aime énormément ce pantalon! Il est super doux et tres confortable. Il ne ramasse pas la poussière et sèche rapidement. J'ai autant le mettre pour le gym que pour sortir de la maison. Par contre, je crois qu'il est fait plus grand que les autre legging. Quand je cours il descend. Je vais m'en commander d'autre mais un point plus petit. Je suis taille 8.

I am a devoted lulu customer and my most recent obsession is the Align pant, which I have bought in multiple colors, but I can't do cardio or workout in them, so I wanted a pant with a similar feel to wear to the gym. I tried the In Movement pant on in the store and really loved the way they felt so I requested my husband get me a pair for Christmas, which he did. Within an hour of wear, they are so stretched out and falling down. I really needed to size down in this pant, which is such a disappointment because now I have a pair of $98 pants that I can not use.

column5: Own 5 pairs already and keep going!
column6: I LOVE these pants - literally have gotten rid of all other pants and even like them more than my align pants (which I thought nothing would ever top). They fit like a glove, they dont slide down or fold over (the waistband is really sturdy and doesnt roll down like my align pants do when I'm in the middle of some yoga pose), and they feel amazing. Oh and the lines on them make your legs look amazing. I do have to say, my black pair though for some reason just keeps stretching out... they are like loose in the upper thigh area and I have to wash them every time I wear them to shrink them back up... I usually don't dry my lulu pants, but this pair I have to because they get so stretched out. The black pair was the first pair I bought, and my other colors I've gotten since then have been fine so maybe it's just a fluke? Either way, kind of a bummer about those, but oh well. I obviously love them so much I keep buying more...

column6: I love these pants! They are soooo buttery soft and they hug every curve perfectly. I wear these to workout with my trainer at the gym, squats, kettle bell swings, lifting heavy, HIIT, everything and they are awesome. I also wear them to spin class and they make me feel great. Basically, these pants are wonderful and if you take care of them, they will last. (I'm hopeful) Gentle wash and air dry. Simple. The only sad thing is I've started to lose some weight (which is good) but now my pants are starting to get loose but of course that's not the fault of the pants. Anyway, highly recommend!

Wow, these are buttery soft and the mach blue is such a beautiful color. However after such a short amount of time these leggings have already started to tear apart at the seams. I don't know what to do, because I love them but it's not right that this high price does not reflect the quality.
